Ako kagezigwa na Mwenembago kwa ikipindi cha siku malongo mane. Mna ikipindi chose acho hadile kinhu chochose, avo vizimalile siku azo, nzala imuluma.
Abaho Mwenembago kamulongela Yesu, “Kamba gweye kwa Mwana wa Mulungu, dilongele dibwe dino digaluke gate.”
Lakini Yesu kamwidika, “Maandiko Gang'alile golonga, ‘Munhu hawa mgima kwa kuja kwiiyeka!’ ”
Abaho Mwenembago kamsola Yesu mbaka uchanha ng'hani, kamulagusila undewa wose wa mwiisi kwa mwanza umoja.
Mwenembago kamulongela Yesu, “Nokugwaa ukulu na utajili wose uno, kwavija vose va mmakono gangu, na niye nodaha kumgwaa munhu yoyose inimulonda.
Nokugwaa vinhu vose vino, kamba wahanitambikila.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Maandiko Gang'alile golonga, ‘Mtambikile Mndewa Mulungu wako, na umsang'hanile heyo yaiyeka!’ ”
Abaho Mwenembago kamsola Yesu mbaka Yelusalemu, kamwika uchanha ng'hani kuna ikiswili cha ing'anda ya Mulungu, abaho kamulongela Yesu, “Kamba gweye kwa Mwana wa Mulungu, ilagaze mwenyego hasi kulawa hano.
Kwavija Maandiko Gang'alile golonga, ‘Mulungu kowalagiza wasenga zake wa kuulanga wakukalize!’
Na vivija golonga, ‘Wokupapa mmakono gao, sekeuilumize magulu gako mgamabwe!’ ”
Lakini Yesu kamwidika, “Maandiko Gang'alile golonga, ‘Sekeumgeze Mndewa Mulungu wako!’ ”
Mwenembago viyamambukize kumgeza Yesu kwa kila nzila, kamuleka mbaka kipindi kiyagwe kinogile.
Abaho Yesu kabwela isi ya Galilaya, nguvu ya Loho Yang'alile ikala hamoja nayo. Mbuli zake zibwililika mziisi zose za mmabehi.
Kakala yofundiza mna zing'anda za kumpula Mulungu na kila munhu kamgwaa nhogolwa.
Abaho Yesu kachola Nazaleti, hanhu kuyakulile. Mna isiku ya Kubwihila, kengila mng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu kamba viyatendaga. Kema yasome Maandiko Gang'alile.
Kagweleligwa kitabu cha mtula ndagu wa Mulungu Isaya, kakifungula na kona hanhu handikigwe,
“Loho wa Mndewa Mulungu kamgati mmwangu, kwavija kanisagula niwagalile wanhu wakiwa Mbuli Inogile. Kanituma niwapetele wagodekigwe kamba wolekesigwa, na waja wasuwameso walole, na kuwakombola waja wadununzigwe,
na kuwalongela kamba saa ivika ya Mndewa kuwakombola wanhu zake.”
Abaho Yesu kakigubika ikitabu, kakibweza kwa msang'hanaji, abaho kakala hasi. Wanhu wose wakalile mng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu wamulola Yesu bunhuu.
Nayo kasonga kuwalongela, “Chandikigwe muno, lelo kilawilila kamba vimuhulike.”
Wose wamtogola na wakanganya mbuli zake zinogile ziyalongile. Walonga, “Vino ino siyo mwanage Yusufu?.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nojuwa monongela ulonzi uno, ‘Mganga, ihonye mwenyego! Gose gatuhulike kugatenda ako Kapelinaumu, vivija gatende na hano ukayako.’ ”
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Nowalongela ukweli, kuduhu mtula ndagu yotegelezigwa ukayake.
“Nhegelezeni, ona kukala na wagane wengi mwiisi ya Izilaeli mna ikipindi cha Eliya. Kipindi acho, mvula haitowile miyaka midatu na nusu, kukala na lufilili lwa nzala mwiisi yose.
Lakini Eliya hatumigwe bule kwa munhu yoyose iyagwe mwiisi ya Izilaeli, ila kwa mgane imoja yakalile Selepata, mwiisi ya Sidoni.
Vivija mna ikipindi cha mtula ndagu wa Mulungu Elisha, kukala na wanhu wengi wakalile wolumwa utamu wa dikulu mwiisi ya Izilaeli. Lakini kuduhu munhu yoyose iyagwe yahonyigwe, ila Naamani yaiyeka, munhu wa isi ya Siliya.”
Wanhu wakalile mng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu wagevuzika ng'hani viwahulike avo.
Wenuka, wamulava kunze kudibuga jao dizengigwe uchanha kukigongo, wamgala mbaka mwiingema ya kigongo acho, walonda kumpigisa hasi.
Lakini Yesu kabita hagati ya lunhu luja, kalawanya.
Abaho Yesu kachola kudibuga da Kapelinaumu mwiisi ya Galilaya. Mwiisiku ya Kubwihila, kakala yofundiza wanhu.
Mafundizo gake gawakanganya wanhu wose, kwavija kakala kolonga kwa udahi.
Mng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu kukala na munhu yeli na kinyamkela. Kalila kwa sauti ng'hulu,
“Oii! Kolonda kututenda choni, Yesu wa Nazaleti? Vino kwiza kutukoma? Nokujuwa, Gweye kwa ija Yang'alile wa Mulungu!”
Yesu kamkomhokela ikinyamkela ija, “Nyamala! Mulawe munhu ino!” Kinyamkela kambwanha hasi munhu ija mgameso gao, abaho kamulawa bila kumulumiza.
Wanhu wose wakanganya ng'hani na wailongela, “Mbuli gani zino? Munhu ino kana nguvu na udahi wa kuwakomhokela vinyamkela, nao womtegeleza!”
Avo mbuli za Yesu zibwililika kila hanhu mwiisi ija.
Yesu kalawa kuna ing'anda ya kumpula Mulungu, kachola ukayake Simoni. Mkwe wa kitwanzi wa Simoni kakala yolumwa homa ng'hali, avo wamulongela Yesu yamuhonye.
Yesu kamcholela, kema behi na lusazi lwa mtwanzi ayo, kaikomhokela homa imulawe. Homa imulawa, bahaja mtwanzi ija kenuka, kasonga kuwasang'hanila.
Zuwa vidihongile, wanhu wose wakalile na watamu wawagala kwa Yesu, nayo keka makono gake uchanha mwa kila munhu na kuwahonya wose.
Vinyamkela wawalawa wanhu wengi na kuguta, “Gweye kwa mwana wa Mulungu!” Yesu kawakomhokela na kawagomesa kulonga, kwavija wamjuwa kamba kakala Kilisito.
Imitondo yake, Yesu kasegela kudibuga, kachola hanhu kuduhu wanhu. Wanhu wasonga kumzahila, na viwamone, walonda kumgomesa sekeyachole.
Lakini Yesu kawalongela, “Vivija nolondeka kuwapetela wanhu wa mmabuga gayagwe Mbuli Inogile ya Undewa wa Mulungu, kwavija acho kiyanhumile Mulungu kukisang'hana.”
Avo kawapetela wanhu mzing'anda za kumpula Mulungu mwiisi yose ya Yudea.
Siku dimoja Yesu kakala yemile mumgwazo wa lamba da Genesaleti. Wanhu wengi wakala woisung'ha sung'ha wategeleza mbuli ya Mulungu.
Yesu kazona ngalawa mbili zikalile mwiingema ya lamba, zilekigwe na wavuwa somba, wakalile wosunha mizavu yao.
Yesu kengila mwiingalawa imoja ikalile ya Simoni, kamulonda Simoni yaikwese mgamazi. Abaho Yesu kakala mwiingalawa, kafundiza lunhu luja.
Viyamambukize kufundiza, kamulongela Simoni, “Kwesa ingalawa mbaka kuna gamazi mengi, abaho gweye na wayago mupigise mizavu yenu muvuwe somba.”
Simoni kamwidika, “Go mkulu, tusang'hana ng'hani kilo kigima lakini hatupatile kinhu bule. Lakini kamba gweye kolonga avo, nogela mizavu yangu mgamazi.”
Wapigisa mizavu yao, somba wengi wanamata mbaka mizavu yao ilonda kudegeka.
Avo wawakema wayao wakalile mwiingalawa iyagwe weze kuwataza. Wayao weza na wazimemeza ngalawa zose mbili, zose zikala zimemile somba mbaka zilonda kudidimila.
Simoni Petulo viyachonile kija kilawilile, kamfugamila Yesu mmagulu, kalonga, “Mndewa, segela haulongozi wangu, niye nimema nzambi!”
Simoni na wayage wakanganya ng'hani mbuli ya somba wengi wawapatile.
Vivija wayage Simoni, Yakobo na Yohana, wanage Zebedayo, nao wakanganya. Yesu kamulongela Simoni, “Sekeudumbe. Kulawa sambi kokuwa mvuwaji wa wanhu.”
Wazilava ngalawa zao kunze mumgwazo, wavileka vinhu vose, wamkweleleza Yesu.
Yesu viyakalile kudibuga dimoja, kukala na munhu imoja yakalile na utamu wa dikulu. Viyamonile Yesu, kaibwanha hasi, kampula, “Go mkulu, wahalonda, kodaha kunihonya!”
Yesu kagolosa mkono wake, kamkwasa. Kalonga, “Nolonda, hona!” Bahaja utamu wa dikulu umulawa munhu ija.
Yesu kamulagiza, “Sekeumulongele munhu yoyose, lakini goga inzila mbaka kwa mulava nhosa ukailaguse, abaho kalave nhosa kamba viyalagize Musa ili kutenda kila munhu yatogole kamba kuhonyigwa.”
Lakini mbuli za Yesu zibwililika kila hanhu. Wanhu wengi weza kumtegeleza na kuhonyigwa mitamu yao.
Lakini Yesu kacholaga hanhu kuduhu wanhu na kampula Mulungu.
Siku dimoja Yesu viyakalile kofundiza, Mafalisayo wayagwe na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wakala aho. Wakala walawile kila buga mwiisi ya Galilaya na Yudea na kulawa Yelusalemu. Nguvu ya Mndewa ikala hamoja na Yesu kuwahonya watamu.
Wanhu wayagwe weza kuno wampapa mulusazi munhu yaholole. Wageza kumwingiza mng'anda wamwike haulongozi wa Yesu.
Lakini hawapatile nzila ya kumwingiza mng'anda, kwavija kukala na lunhu lwa wanhu. Avo wamsola mtamu wao, wamgala uchanha kukiswili, watobola zonzo. Abaho wamuhumulusa na lusazi lwake mbaka hagati ya lunhu lwa wanhu, wamwika haulongozi wa Yesu.
Yesu viyone kutamanila kwao, kamulongela munhu ija, “Mbwigangu, nzambi zako zigeligwa kumgongo.”
Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wasonga kuiuza, “Munhu gani ino kolonga mbuli za kumuliga Mulungu? Mulungu yaiyeka ayo yodaha kuzigela kumgongo nzambi za wanhu!”
Yesu kajuwa viwagesile, avo kawalongela, “Habali mogesa avo?
Choni kibuhile, kulonga, ‘Nzambi zako zigeligwa kumgongo,’ hebu kulonga, ‘Ima utembele’?
Lakini nolonda mujuwe kamba Mwana wa Munhu kana udahi mwiisi wa kuzigela kumgongo nzambi za wanhu.” Abaho kamulongela munhu ija yaholole, “Nokulongela, ima, papa lusazi lwako, uchole ukayako!”
Bahaja munhu ija kenuka mgameso ga wanhu, kapapa lusazi lwake mumo muyatambalale, kachola ukayake kuno komtogola Mulungu.
Wanhu wose wakanganya ng'hani na kudumba! Wamtogola Mulungu walonga, “Lelo tona unzonza!”
Abaho Yesu kachola na kamona mbokela kodi yakemigwe Lawi kakala mng'anda ya kusolela kodi. Yesu kamulongela, “Nikweleleze.”
Lawi kenuka, kaleka kila kinhu, kamkweleleza.
Abaho Lawi kamtendela Yesu nyimwili nyimwili ng'hulu ukayake. Vivija kukala na wabokela kodi wengi na wanhu wayagwe wagonekigwe.
Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wayagwe wakalile aho wawauza wanahina wa Yesu, “Habali moja na kung'wa hamoja na wabokela kodi na wanhu wotenda nzambi?”
Yesu kawedika, “Wanhu wagima hawalonda mganga, lakini waja weli watamu womulonda mganga.
Sizile kuwakema wanhu wogesa wanoga, lakini niza kuwakema waja wene nzambi waleke.”
Wanhu wayagwe wamulongela Yesu, “Wanahina wa Yohana Mbatizaji wofunga kuja miyanza mingi na kumpula Mulungu, na wanahina wa Mafalisayo wotenda vivo, lakini wanahina zako woja na kung'wa.”
Yesu kawedika, “Vino mogesa wanhu wagonekigwe kuna idizengele wodaha kufunga kuja kipindi munhu yosola kahamoja nao? Havidahika bule!
Lakini kipindi chokwiza, munhu yosola vonda yasegezigwe kumwao, baho wofunga kuja.”
Abaho Yesu kawalongela lusimo luno, “Kuduhu munhu yokanha kilaka mkiwalo cha sambi na kukika mkiwalo cha umwaka. Yahatenda avo, kokinanga kija kiwalo cha sambi, na kilaka acho honda kiigale na kiwalo cha umwaka.
Vivija kuduhu munhu yogida divai ya sambi mna mifuko ya ng'hwembe ya umwaka. Kwavija yahatenda avo, divai ya sambi yoitula mifuko ayo ya umwaka, divai yokwitika, na mifuko yobanangika.
Divai ya sambi yogidigwa mmifuko ya ng'hwembe ya sambi!
Kuduhu munhu yolonda divai ya sambi yahamambukiza kung'wa ya umwaka. Kwavija kolonga, ‘Ya umwaka inoga ng'hani.’ ”
Mna isiku imoja ya Kubwihila, Yesu kakala yobita mmigunda ya uhemba. Wanahina zake wasonga kubena mikungwi ya uhemba, wagafigisa mmakono gao na kuja mhule zake.
Mafalisayo wayagwe wawauza, “Habali motenda kinhu kigomesigwe mna isiku ya Kubwihila?”
Yesu kawedika, “Vino mweye hamusomile kija kiyatendile Daudi na wayage viwakalile na nzala?
Daudi kengila Mng'anda ya Mulungu, kasola magate galavigwe kwa Mulungu, kagaja na vivija kawagwaa wayage. Malagizo gawagomesa wanhu wayagwe kuja magate gago ila kwa walava nhosa waiyeka.”
Abaho Yesu kamambukiza kwa kulonga, “Mwana wa Munhu ayo Mndewa wa siku ya Kubwihila.”
Mna isiku iyagwe ya Kubwihila, Yesu kengila mng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu na kafundiza. Baho kukala na munhu imoja, mkono wake wa kudila ukala uholole.
Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wayagwe wakala wozahila kilamuso cha kumtagusa Yesu, avo wakala womulola wamone kamba komuhonya munhu mwiisiku ya Kubwihila.
Lakini Yesu kawajuwa viwagesile, kamulongela munhu ija yaholole mkono, “Ima wize hano haulongozi.” Munhu ija kenuka na kwima hagati.
Abaho Yesu kawalongela, “Nowauza, vino Malagizo getu gotulonda tutende choni mwiisiku ya Kubwihila? Kutenda ganogile hebu kutenda gehile? Kuhonya ugima wa munhu hebu kuukoma?”
Yesu kawalola wanhu wose wakalile aho, abaho kamulongela munhu ija, “Golosa mkono wako.” Munhu ija katenda avo, na mkono wake uhona kabili.
Lakini wanhu wagevuzika ng'hani na wasonga kuilongela wamtende choni Yesu.
Kipindi kija Yesu kachola kuna ikigongo kumpula Mulungu, kakala ako kilo kigima kompula Mulungu.
Imitondo yake, kawakema wanahina zake, kawasagula longo na wabili mna idibumbila jao, kawagwaa twaga da watumigwa.
Watumigwa awo wakala Simoni, ayo Yesu kamkema Petulo na Andeleya mdodo wake, Yakobo na Yohana, Filipo na Batulumayo,
Matayo na Tomaso na Yakobo mwanage Alufayo na Simoni yakemigwe Zelote,
Yuda mwanage Yakobo na Yuda Isikaliote yamuhinduke Yesu.
Yesu viyahumuluke kukigongo hamoja na watumigwa zake, kema hanhu hagoloke hamoja na wanahina zake wengi. Lunhu mkulu lwa wanhu lukala aho kulawa isi yose ya Yudea na buga da Yelusalemu, na kulawa mhwani ya isi za Tilo na Sidoni.
Weza kumtegeleza Yesu na kuhonyigwa mitamu yao. Vivija wanhu waja wakalile wogazigwa na vinyamkela weza na wahonyigwa.
Wanhu wose wageza kumkwasa Yesu, kwavija nguvu ya kuhonya ikala ilawa kumwake na kuwahonya wose.
Yesu kawalola wanahina zake, kalonga, “Mmweda mweye muli wakiwa, kwavija Undewa wa Mulungu uli wenu.
Mmweda mweye muli na nzala sambi, kwavija mokwiguta! Mmweda mweye mulila sambi, kwavija modeng'helela!”
“Mmweda mweye kamba wanhu womwihilani, wowalema, wowaliga na kuwalonga vihile kwa mbuli ya Mwana wa Munhu!
Deng'heleleni na kuvina vonda galawilile, kwavija mwikiligwa nhunza ng'hulu kuulanga. Kwavija vivo wahenga zao viwawatendele watula ndagu wa Mulungu.
Lakini mogaya mweye muli matajili sambi, kwavija mmala kupata deng'ho jenu!
Mogaya mweye mwigute sambi, kwavija mokona nzala! Mogaya mweye museka sambi, kwavija moiyalala na kulila!”
“Mogaya mweye kamba wanhu wose wowagwaa nhogolwa kwavija wahenga zao vivija wawatendela vivo watula ndagu wa uvizi.”
“Lakini nowalongela mweye munitegeleza, wanogeleni wamwihileni, muwatendele ganogile waja wowatendela gehile.
Muwatambikile waja wowaduila, na muwapulile kwa Mulungu waja womonelani.
Munhu yonda yakutowe kanza dimoja, muleke yakutowe kanza diyagwe vivija, kamba munhu kokuboka koti jako, muleke yasole na shati jako vivija.
Munhu yahakupula kinhu mgwee, na munhu yokuboka vinhu vako, sekeulonde yakubwezele.
Avo watendeleni wayagwe gaja gose gomulonda mweye kutendeligwa.”
“Kamba mweye mowanogela wanhu wowanogela mweye waiyeka, vino motenda kilozo gani? Hata wanhu wene nzambi wowanogela waja wowanogela hewo!
Na kamba mowatendela ganogile waja wowatendela ganogile waiyeka, vino motenda kilozo gani? Hata wanhu wene nzambi wotenda vivo!
Na kamba mowakopesha waja waiyeka mutamanila wodaha kuwabwezela, vino motenda kilozo gani? Hata wanhu wene nzambi wowakopesha wayao wotamanila wodaha kuwabwezela kikija kiwawakopeshe!
Lakini mweye wanogeleni waja womwihileni na muwatendele ganogile, muwakopeshe wanhu bila kutamanila kubwelezeligwa. Abaho nhunza yenu yokuwa ng'hulu, na mweye mokuwa wana wa Mulungu yeli Uchanha Ng'hani. Kwavija heyo kanoga kwa waja weliduhu nhogolwa kumwake na wanhu wotenda nzambi.
Muwe na bazi kamba vija Tata yenu viyeli na bazi.”
“Sekemuwataguse wayagwe, Mulungu honda yawataguse mweye. Sekemuwalaumu wayagwe, na Mulungu honda yawalaumu mweye. Mugele kumgongo nzambi za wanhu wayagwe, na Mulungu kogela kumgongo nzambi zenu.
Muwagwee wayagwe, na Mulungu kowagwaa mweye. Na mweye mobokela kibaba kimemile na kusindiligwa mbaka vokwitika mmakono genu, na vose vonda mudahe kuvigoga. Avo, vija vimuwapimila wayagwe, Mulungu nayo kowapimila vivo.”
Abaho Yesu kawalongela lusimo luno, “Msuwameso hadaha kumulongoza msuwameso miyage. Yahatenda vivo, wose wabili wolagalila mdikolombo.
Kuduhu mwanahina yombanza mfundiza wake. Lakini kila mwanahina yahamambukiza mafunzo gake, koigala na mfundiza wake.
“Habali kolola kibanzi kili mdisiso da ndugu yako lakini hulola biki dili mdisiso jako?
Hebu kodahaze kumulongela ndugu yako, ‘Chonde, leka nikulave kibanzi kili mdisiso jako,’ kuno gweye ung'hali hunajona biki dili mdisiso jako mwenyego? Gweye kwa mnafiki! Tanhu lava biki dili mdisiso jako, abaho kodaha kulola goya na kulava kibanzi kili mdisiso da ndugu yako.
“Mbiki unogile haudaha kulela matunda gehile, hebu mbiki wihile haudaha kulela matunda ganogile.
Kila mbiki wojuwika kwa matunda gake goulela, kwavija hudaha kubawa ngama mumkese hebu kubawa fulu kuna ivisolo va miba.
Munhu yanogile kolava ganogile mwiingama yake inogile ili muumoyo wake, lakini munhu yehile kolava gehile mwiingama yake ihile ili muumoyo wake. Kwavija munhu kolonga gaja gamemile muumoyo wake.
“Habali monikema, ‘Mndewa, Mndewa,’ kuno hamugatenda gaja goniwalongela?
Munhu yoyose yokwiza kumwangu na kutegeleza mbuli zangu na kuzigoga nowalagusila kaigala na choni.
Kaigala na munhu yozenga ng'anda yake yahimbile hasi ng'hani, keka chandusilo chake mdibwe. Mvula ng'hulu viitowile, mazi gaitowa ing'anda, lakini hagadahile kuitigisa kwavija ikala izengigwe goya.
Lakini munhu yoyose yotegeleza mbuli zangu na kolema kuzigoga, kaigala na munhu yazengile ng'anda yake bila kuhimba chandusilo. Mvula ng'hulu viitowile, mazi gaitowa ng'anda ija, nayo igwa na kubanangika!”
Yesu viyamambukize kuwafundiza wanhu, kachola Kapelinaumu.
Ako kukala na mkulu imoja wa wakalizi gana wa Kilumi yakalile na msang'hanaji wake mtamu ng'hani, na kalonda kufa. Nayo mkulu ayo kakala yomnogela ng'hani msang'hanaji ayo.
Mkulu ayo viyahulike mbuli za Yesu, kawatuma wavele wayagwe wa Wayahudi wampule Yesu yeze kumuhonya msang'hanaji wake.
Avo wamcholela Yesu, wampula ng'hani, wamulongela, “Munhu ino kofaya umtaze.
Kowanogela wanhu na vivija katuzengela ng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu.”
Avo Yesu kachola nao. Viyakalile behi na ng'anda ya mkulu ija, mkulu ija kawatuma mbwiga zake wamulongele Yesu, “Go mkulu, sekeuigaze kwiza ukae, kwavija niye sifaya gweye wingile mng'anda yangu,
vivija niiyona sifaya hata kwiza kumwako. Lakini longa mbuli iiyeka, na msang'hanaji wangu kohona.
Kwavija naniye vivija na hasi ya udahi wa wakulu na nina wakalizi hasi yangu. Nahamulongela ino, ‘Chola!’ nayo kochola, nahamulongela iyagwe, ‘Izo!’ nayo kokwiza, vivija nahamulongela msang'hanaji wangu, ‘Tenda vino!’ nayo kotenda vivo.”
Yesu viyahulike avo kakanganya ng'hani, kahinduka, kalulongela lunhu lwa wanhu lukalile lomkweleleza, “Nowalongela, sinamona munhu yeli na tamanilo kulu kamba dino, hata mwiisi ya Izilaeli!”
Wanhu waja watumigwe wabwela kuna ing'anda ya mkulu ija, wamvika msang'hanaji ija kahona.
Kumwande, Yesu kachola kudibuga dimoja dikemigwe Naini. Kailongoza na wanahina zake na lunhu mkulu lwa wanhu.
Viyakalile habehi na ulwivi mkulu wa kwingilila kudibuga dijo, wanhu wapapile maiti ga mbwanga wakala wolawa kunze kudibuga, wochola kuzika. Mbwanga ayo yafile kakala mwana yeli yaiyeka wa mtwanzi yakalile mgane. Wanhu wengi wa buga ijo wakala hamoja na mtwanzi ayo.
Mndewa Yesu viyamone mtwanzi ayo, kamonela bazi, kamulongela, “Sekeulile.”
Abaho kagenda, kalukwasa ulusazi luwaitambalize maiti ya mbwanga ija. Wanhu walupapile ulusazi luja wema. Yesu kalonga, “Mbwanga! Nokulongela, lamuka.”
Mbwanga ija yafile kalamuka, kasonga kulonga. Abaho Yesu kamgwaa mama ija mwanage.
Wanhu wose wengila bwembwe na wamtogola Mulungu. Walonga, “Mtula ndagu mkulu wa Mulungu katulawilila hamwetu! Mulungu keza kuwakombola wanhu zake!”
Mbuli zino za Yesu zenela mwiisi yose ya Yudea na isi zili mmabehi.
Wanahina zake Yohana Mbatizaji wamulongela Yohana mbuli zose zino. Nayo kawakema wanahina zake wabili mna iwanahina zake,
kawatuma wachole kwa Mndewa wakamuuze, “Vino gweye ayo ija iyalongile Yohana Mbatizaji kokwiza, hebu tumbete iyagwe?”
Viwavikile kwa Yesu, wamulongela, “Yohana Mbatizaji katutuma tukuuze, kamba gweye ayo ija yalongile kokwiza, hebu tumbete iyagwe?”
Kipindi kikija Yesu kawahonya wanhu wengi wakalile watamu, wakalile wogaya, wakalile na vinyamkela na kawatenda wanhu wengi wakalile wasuwameso walole.
Avo Yesu kawedika, “Bweleni mkamulongele Yohana gaja gomuhulika na kugona, wasuwameso wolola, mbetembete wotembela, na weli na utamu wa dikulu wohonyigwa, na wanhu hawahulika wohulika, wafile wozilibuka, na wakiwa wopeteligwa Mbuli Inogile.
Kamweda munhu ija yeliduhu shaka na niye!”
Wanahina wa Yohana viwasegele, Yesu kasonga kululongela lunhu luja mbuli ya Yohana, “Vino vimucholile kuluwala, muchola kulola choni? Muchola kulola lusanze vilutigisigwa na beho?
Vino muchola kulola choni? Muchola kumulola munhu yavalile viwalo vinogile? Wanhu iwovala viwalo vinogile, weli na ugima wa kubwihila wokala mzing'anda za wandewa!
Nongeleni, vino muchola kulola choni? Muchola kumulola mtula ndagu wa Mulungu? Ona, lakini mona vingi ng'hani kubanza mtula ndagu wa Mulungu.
Kwavija Yohana ayo yalongigwe mna Gamaandiko Gang'alile, ‘Mulungu kalonga, nomtuma msenga wangu yakulongolele, yaitande nzila yako.’ ”
Yesu kamambukiza kulonga, “Nowalongela, Yohana ni munhu mkulu kubanza munhu yoyose yakalile mwiisi. Lakini yeli mdodo Muundewa wa Mulungu ni munhu mkulu kubanza Yohana.”
Wanhu wose wamuhulike, hata wabokela kodi, wamtogola Mulungu kamba kanoga na wakala wabatizigwe na Yohana.
Lakini Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa walema kutenda ga Mulungu, kwavija walema kubatizigwa na Yohana.
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Vino niwasimulile kwa lusimo gani wanhu wa lukolo luno? Vino waigala na choni?
Waigala na wana wadodo wakalile mdigulilo. Kibumbila kimoja chokikemelela kibumbila kiyagwe, ‘Tuwatowela gombe sugu, lakini hamuvinile bule! Tuwembila nyila za kuindilo, lakini hamulilile bule!’
Yohana Mbatizaji keza, kafunga kuja na hang'wile divai, mweye mulonga, ‘Kana kinyamkela!’
Mwana wa Munhu keza, kaja na kung'wa, mweye mulonga, ‘Muloleni munhu ino! Mmelo na mulevi, mbwiga wa wabokela kodi na wanhu waja wotenda nzambi!’
Lakini nzewele ya Mulungu yokoneka inoga kwa wanhu waja wose woitogola.”
Mfalisayo imoja kamgoneka Yesu yakaje nayo lujo lwa ichungulo. Avo Yesu kachola kuna ing'anda ya Mfalisayo, kakala na kuja.
Kudibuga dija kukala na mtwanzi imoja yakalile yotenda nzambi. Kahulika kamba Yesu kakala yoja mng'anda ya Mfalisayo ayo, avo kasola nyhupa ya alabasita imemile mavuta gonung'hila goya ga bei ng'hulu.
Kema kukisogo, habehi na magulu ga Yesu kolila, mahozi gake galagalila mgamagulu ga Yesu. Abaho kagahangusa magulu ga Yesu kwa mvili zake, kaganonela na kagagidila mavuta.
Mfalisayo ija viyone avo, kailongela, “Maza munhu ino yakalile mtula ndagu wa Mulungu, yahamjuwile mtwanzi ino yomgoga kavilihi, yahamjuwile kamema nzambi!”
Yesu kamulongela, “Simoni, nina mbuli ya kukulongela.” Simoni kalonga, “Ona, Mfundiza, nongela.”
Yesu kasonga kumulongela, “Kukala na wanhu wabili wakopile sente kwa munhu yokopesha sente. Imoja kakopa sente magana matano, na iyagwe kakopa malongo matano.
Wose wabili hawadahile kumulipa, avo munhu ija kawalekelela wose. Vino nani mna iwanhu waja yonda yamnogele ng'hani munhu ija?”
Simoni kamwidika, “Vinikona niye kokuwa ija yalekeleligwe sente nyingi.” Yesu kalonga, “Kulonga goya.”
Abaho kamuhindukila mtwanzi ija na kamulongela Simoni, “Komona mtwanzi ino? Niza kuna ikae yako, hungwelele mazi ga kusunha magulu gangu, lakini mtwanzi ino kagasunha magulu gangu kwa mahozi gake na kagahangusa kwa mvili zake.
Gweye hunibokele kwa kuninonela, lakini mtwanzi ino halekile kuganonela magulu gangu tangu vinizile.
Hunibakile pala jangu mavuta, lakini mtwanzi ino kambakaza magulu gangu mavuta gonung'hila goya.
Nokulongela, nzambi zake nyingi zigeligwa kumgongo, lekaavo kalagusa unogelwa mkulu. Lakini munhu yoyose yeli na nzambi kidogo zigeligwe kumgongo, kolagusa unogelwa mdodo.”
Abaho Yesu kamulongela mtwanzi ija, “Nzambi zako zigeligwa kumgongo.”
Wanhu wayagwe wakalile hamoja na Yesu muulujo, wasonga kuilongela, “Ino munhu gani yodaha kuzigela kumgongo nzambi za wanhu?”
Lakini Yesu kamulongela mtwanzi ija, “Kutamanila kwako kukukombola. Genda moyo uholile.”
Hamwande Yesu kafunga mwanza, kabitila mna gamabuga na vijiji kowapetela wanhu Mbuli Inogile ya Undewa wa Mulungu. Wanahina zake longo na wabili wachola nayo.
Watwanzi wayagwe wakalile walavigwe vinyamkela na kuhonyigwa mitamu yao vivija wamkweleleza. Watwanzi awo wakala Malia, yakemigwe Magidalena, ija yalavigwe vinyamkela saba,
Yoana mwehe wake Kuza yakalile msang'hanaji mkulu mna ikae ya mndewa Helode, na Suzana, na watwanzi wayagwe wengi. Watwanzi awo wakala wosola vinhu vao na kuwataza Yesu na wanahina zake.
Wanhu wagendelela kwiza kwa Yesu kulawa kila buga. Lunhu mkulu viluitig'hane hamoja, Yesu kalulongela lusimo luno.
“Kukala na munhu kachola kuhanda mbeyu mumgunda wake. Viyakalile komiza izimbeyu, mbeyu ziyagwe zilagalila mnzila, wanhu wazibojoga, na ndege wazija.
Mbeyu ziyagwe zilagalila mdibwe hali na udongo kidogo. Vizotile, zinyala kwavija udongo ukala waduhu unyefu.
Mbeyu ziyagwe zilagalila mna ivisolo va miba. Miba ikula na izizonga zimbeyu.
Mbeyu ziyagwe zilagalila mna udongo unogile. Zikula na kulela mbeyu nyingi kubanza zija zihandigwe, kila mbeyu ilela miyanza malongo longo.” Yesu viyalongile avo, kalonga kwa sauti ng'hulu, “Munhu yeli na magwiti, yahulike!”
Wanahina zake Yesu wamuuza fambulo da lusimo luno.
Yesu kawedika, “Mweye mutendigwa kuzijuwa mbuli zifisigwe za Undewa wa Mulungu. Lakini kwa wanhu wayagwe, nolonga kwa simo, muladi walole lakini sekewone, na wategeleze lakini sekewajuwe.
“Dino ijo fambulo da muhandaji, mbeyu ni mbuli ya Mulungu.
Zija zilagalile mnzila zolagusa wanhu waja iwohulika mbuli ya Mulungu, lakini Mwenembago kokwiza na kuisola mbuli ayo mmizoyo yao muladi waleke kutogola na kukomboligwa.
Mbeyu zilagalile mdibwe zolagusa wanhu waja wohulika mbuli ya Mulungu na kuibokela kwa kudeng'helela, lakini mbuli ayo haika mizizi mgati mmwao. Woitogola kwa kipindi kidodo, lakini wahagezigwa woileka mbuli ayo.
Mbeyu zilagalile mvisolo va miba zolagusa wanhu waja wohulika mbuli ya Mulungu, lakini viwogendelela, Mbuli ayo yozongigwa zongigwa na magayo, na utajili, na kudeng'helela vinhu va mwiisi. Wanhu awo hawalela bule matunda gonda gakangale.
Lakini mbeyu zilagalile hali na udongo unogile zolagusa wanhu waja iwohulika mbuli ya Mulungu na kuika mmizoyo yao na kuitogola, wofunga umoyo mbaka wolela matunda.
“Wanhu hawabwinha taa kuigubika na kikalango hebu kuika muuvungu wa lusazi. Lakini woika hana ikingolobweda, muladi wanhu viwokwingila wone mulenge.
“Kinhu chochose kifisigwe chokwikigwa hanhu hazelu, na kinhu chochose kigubikigwe chojuwika na kugaligwa hana umulenge.
“Avo muiteganye na gaja gomuhulika, kwavija munhu yeli na kinhu kokongezeligwa, lakini ija yeliduhu kinhu kobokigwa hata kija kidodo kiyogesa kanacho.”
Mamake na ndugu zake Yesu wamcholela, lakini hawadahile kumvikila habehi mbuli ya lunhu lwa wanhu.
Munhu imoja kamulongela Yesu, “Mamako na ndugu zako wema kunze, wolonda kukona.”
Yesu kawalongela wanhu wose, “Mamangu na ndugu zangu ni waja woihulika mbuli ya Mulungu na kuitenda.”
Siku dimoja Yesu kakwela mwiingalawa hamoja na wanahina zake, kawalongela, “Tuloke umwambu.” Avo wasonga umwanza.
Viwakalile muumwanza, Yesu kawasa. Bahaja nyukwanyukwa da beho disonga kubuma mna idilamba, na ngalawa isonga kumema mazi, avo wose wakala mdizumozumo.
Wanahina wamgendela Yesu wamulamusa, wamulongela, “Go mkulu! Go mkulu! Tofa!” Yesu kalamuka, kadikomhokela beho na ng'humbi ya mazi. Vose vinyamala na kukala tuluu.
Abaho kawalongela wanahina zake, “Tamanilo jenu da kwahi?” Lakini awo wakanganya na kudumba, wailongela, “Ino munhu gani? Kodikomhokela beho na ng'humbi, navo vomuhulka!”
Yesu na wanahina zake wavika kuna imhwani ya isi ya Wagelasi, muumwambu wa lamba kulawa Galilaya.
Viyahumuluke mwiingalawa, kamting'hana munhu imoja yeli na vinyamkela, yalawile kudibuga. Miyaka mingi munhu ayo kakala havala kiwalo wala hasinya ukayake, lakini kakala yokala kuna gamapanga.
Viyamone Yesu, kaibwanha mmagulu ga Yesu, kaguta mizangi yolonga, “Gweye Yesu! Mwana wa Mulungu yeli Uchanha Ng'hani! Kolonda kunitenda choni? Nokupula, sekeunidununze!”
Kalonga avo kwavija Yesu kakala yamulagize ikinyamkela yamulawe munhu ayo. Miyanza mingi kinyamkela ayo kakala yomkumba munhu ayo. Hamoja wanhu wakala womgodeka mng'anda kuno makono gake na magulu gake gagodekigwa minyololo na mhingu, lakini kakala yokanha, na kinyamkela ayo kakala yomkimbiza mbaka kuluwala.
Yesu kamuuza munhu ija, “Twaga jako nani?” Kamwidika, “Twaga jangu Lunhu.” Kalonga avo kwavija vinyamkela wengi wakala wamkumbile.
Vinyamkela waja wampula Yesu sekeyawagale kuna dikolombo dikulu.
Habehi na aho kukala na bumbila kulu da nguluwe wakalile woja kukigongo. Avo vinyamkela wampula Yesu yawatogolele wawakumbe nguluwe. Yesu kawatogolela.
Vinyamkela wamulawa munhu ija, wawengila nguluwe. Bumbila jose da nguluwe dihumulukila mwiingema ya idilamba, wengila mdilamba, wose wafa mgamazi.
Wanhu wakalile wowadima nguluwe awo wachona acho kilawilile, wakimbila na wazibwililisa mbuli azo kudibuga na mvijiji.
Wanhu wachola kulola kija kilawilile. Viwavikile kwa Yesu, wamona munhu ija yalavigwe vinyamkela kakala mmagulu ga Yesu, kavala viwalo, kana nzewele zake. Wanhu wose wadumba.
Na waja wayonile mbuli ayo, wawalongela wanhu vija munhu ayo yakalile na vinyamkela viyahonyigwe.
Abaho wanhu wose wa isi ija ya Wagelasi wampula Yesu yalawanye, kwavija wakala wadumbile ng'hani. Avo Yesu kakwela mwiingalawa na kulawanya.
Munhu ija yalavigwe vinyamkela kampula Yesu wachole wose. Lakini Yesu hamtogolele, kamulongela,
“Bwela ukayako ukawalongele wanhu gose gayakutendele Mulungu.” Avo munhu ija kachola kila hanhu kudibuga dija, kawapetela wanhu mbuli zose ziyatendeligwe na Yesu.
Yesu viyabwelile mwambu uyagwe wa lamba, wanhu wambokela kwa deng'ho kwavija wose wakala wombeta.
Abaho keza munhu imoja, twaga jake Yailo. Munhu ayo kakala mkulu wa ng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu. Kamfugamila Yesu, kampula yachole ukayake,
kwavija mndele wake yeli yaiyeka kakala mmabehi kufa. Mndele ayo kakala na miyaka longo na mibili. Yesu viyakalile kochola, wanhu wakala womsung'ha sung'ha kila mwambu.
Mna dibumbila dija da wanhu, kukala na mtwanzi imoja yakalile na utamu wa kutumika kwa miyaka longo na mibili. Kakala yamambukize vinhu vake vose kwa waganga, lakini kuduhu munhu yadahile kumuhonya.
Mtwanzi ija kamcholela Yesu kukisogo, kakwasa mhindo ya kiwalo cha Yesu, bahaja kutumika kuleka.
Yesu kauza, “Nani yanikwasile?” Wanhu wose wabela. Petulo kalonga, “Go mkulu, wanhu wose wakuzunguluka na kukusung'ha sung'ha.”
Lakini Yesu kalonga, “Kuna munhu kanikwasa, kwavija nihulika nguvu zinilawa.”
Mtwanzi ija viyone hadaha kuifisa, keza yogwaya, kaibwanha mmagulu ga Yesu. Baho mgameso ga wanhu, kamulongela Yesu habali kakwasa mhindo ya kiwalo chake, na vija viyahonyigwe bahaja.
Yesu kamulongela, “Mwanangu, kutamanila kwako kukuhonya. Chola moyo uholile.”
Yesu viyakalile yang'hali yolonga, msenga kulawa ukayake Yailo keza, kamulongela Yailo, “Mndele wako kamala kufa, avo sekeumgaze Mfundiza.”
Lakini Yesu viyahulike avo, kamulongela Yailo, “Sekeudumbe, gweye togola tu, mndele wako kohona.”
Viyavikile kuna ing'anda ya Yailo, Yesu kawagomesa wanhu sekewengile hamoja nayo, ila kengila na Petulo na Yohana, na Yakobo na tatake na mamake mndele ayo.
Wanhu wose wakala wolila na kumuyalalila imwana. Yesu kawalongela, “Sekemulile, kwavija imwana hafile bule, kawasa tu!”
Wanhu wose wamseka kwavija wakala wajuwile imwana kakala yafile.
Lakini Yesu kamgoga mkono, kamulongela, “Mwanangu, lamuka!”
Ugima wake umbwelela mndele ija, bahaja kalamuka. Abaho Yesu kawalagiza wamgwee lujo.
Tatake na mamake wakanganya ng'hani, lakini Yesu kawagomesa sekewamulongele munhu yoyose kija kilawilile.
Yesu kawakema hamoja wanahina zake longo na wabili, kawagwaa nguvu na udahi wa kulava vinyamkela na kuwahonya watamu.
Abaho kawatuma wachole wakawapetele wanhu usenga wa Undewa wa Mulungu na kuhonya watamu.
Kawalongela, “Sekemusole kinhu chochose muumwanza wenu. Sekemusole mkongoja, wala mkoba, wala lujo, wala sente, wala viwalo vibili.
Ng'anda yoyose yonda mwingile na kugonekigwa, kaleni mumo mbaka vonda musegele mna idibuga dijo.
Wanhu wahalema kuwabokela, segeleni buga dijo na kung'huseni timbwisi dili mmagulu genu kiwe kilaguso kamba wawatendela nzambi.”
Wanahina wafunga mwanza, wabitila vijiji vose wowapetela wanhu Mbuli Inogile na kuwahonya wanhu kila hanhu.
Helode yakalile mndewa wa Galilaya, kahulika mbuli zose ziyatendile Yesu. Kanyawanyawa ng'hani, kwavija wanhu wakala wolonga Yohana Mbatizaji kazilibuka kulawa kwa wafile.
Wanhu wayagwe walonga Eliya kalawilila, wayagwe walonga imoja wa watula ndagu wa Mulungu wa umwaka kazilibuka kulawa kuna iwanhu wafile.
Lakini Helode kalonga, “Yohana nimkanha dipala, vino ino ayo nani inihulika mbuli zake?” Nayo kalonda kumona Yesu.
Watumigwa waja viwabwelile, wamulongela Yesu kila kinhu wakitendile. Yesu kawasola, kachola nao waiyeka kuna dibuga dikemigwe Betisaida.
Lakini wanhu viwajuwile avo, wamkweleleza Yesu. Nayo kawabokela, kalonga nao mbuli ya Undewa wa Mulungu na kawahonya waja wakalile watamu.
Zuwa vidisongile kuhonga, wanahina longo na wabili wamcholela Yesu, wamulongela, “Walongele wanhu wachole kuna ivijiji na migunda ilibehi na hano wakazahile lujo na hanhu ha kuwasa, kwavija hano hatwili twa kuluwala.”
Lakini Yesu kawalongela, “Mweye wagweleleni lujo waje.” Lakini wao wamwidika, “Tuna magate matano na somba wabili tu. Kolonda tuchole tukawagulile lujo lunhu lose luno?”
Wambigalo waiyeka wakalile hanhu aho wakala wovika elufu tano. Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Walongeleni wanhu wakale mna ivibumbila va wanhu malongo matano.”
Nao wanahina watenda vivo. Wanhu wose wakala hasi.
Abaho Yesu kagasola magate matano na somba wabili, kalola uchanha kuulanga, kamgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu, kagabanzula gamagate na iwasomba, kawagwaa wanahina zake wawagwelele wanhu.
Wanhu wose waja na kwiguta. Wanahina zake wasola vigelo longo na vibili vimemile vinhu visigale.
Siku dimoja Yesu kakala yaiyeka kompula Mulungu. Wanahina zake wamcholela, nayo kawauza, “Vino wanhu wolonga niye na nani?”
Wamwidika, “Wanhu wayagwe wolonga gweye kwa Yohana Mbatizaji, wayagwe wolonga kwa Eliya, kuno wayagwe wolonga gweye kwa imoja wa watula ndagu wa Mulungu wa umwaka yazilibuke kulawa kwa wafile.”
Yesu kawauza, “Na mweye molonga niye na nani?” Petulo kamwidika, “Gweye kwa Kilisito, wa Mulungu.”
Abaho Yesu kawagomesa wanahina zake sekewamulongele munhu yoyose mbuli ayo.
Vivija Yesu kawalongela, “Mwana wa Munhu kolondeka yadununzike ng'hani, na kulemigwa na wavele na wakulu wa walava nhosa na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa. Kokomigwa lakini siku da kadatu kozilibuka.”
Abaho Yesu kawalongela wanhu wose, “Munhu yoyose yolonda kunikweleleza, yaileme mwenyego, yaidikwe msalaba wake kila siku, yanikweleleze.
Kwavija munhu yoyose yolonda kuukombola ugima wake mwenyego kowagiza, lakini munhu yoyose yowagiza ugima wake mbuli ya niye, koukombola.
Vino munhu yahapata kila kinhu mwiisi, lakini kowagiza ugima wake, munhu ayo kopata choni?
Kamba munhu konyonela kinyala niye na mafundizo gangu, Mwana wa Munhu nayo yaheza muukulu wake na wa Tatake na wasenga wa kuulanga wang'alile komonela kinyala munhu ayo.
Lakini nowalongela ukweli, wanhu wayagwe wemile hano honda wafe mbaka wawone Undewa wa Mulungu.”
Vizibitile siku nane toka yalonge mbuli azo, Yesu kawasola Petulo na Yohana na Yakobo kachola nao kukigongo kumpula Mulungu.
Viyakalile kompula Mulungu, kihanga chake kigaluka, viwalo vake vikala vizelu chuwee!
Bahaja wanhu wabili wakala aho wolonga nayo. Nao wakala Musa na Eliya,
wakoneka muukulu, wakala wolonga na Yesu mbuli ya ifa yake yonda yaimambukize ako Yelusalemu.
Petulo na wayage wakala wokuluza. Viwalamuke, wawona ukulu wa Yesu na wanhu wabili wemile nayo.
Wanhu waja viwakalile wosegela, Petulo kamulongela Yesu, “Go mkulu, vinoga tweye tukale hano! Tuzenge viheha vidatu, kimoja chako, kimoja cha Musa na kimoja cha Eliya.” Petulo kakala hajuwa bule kija kiyolonga.
Petulo yang'hali yolonga, wingu dilawilila, diwagubika na kungugu jake, wanahina wadumba ng'hani wingu dijo vidiwagubike.
Sauti ilonga kulawa mdiwingu, “Ino ayo Mwanangu inimsagule. Mtegelezeni!”
Sauti ayo viinyamale, Yesu kasigala yaiyeka. Wanahina wanyamala tuluu, na kipindi kija hawamulongele munhu yoyose kija kiwone.
Imitondo yake Yesu na wanahina zake wadatu wahumuluka kukigongo. Lunhu mkulu lwa wanhu luiting'hana na Yesu.
Munhu imoja mna ulunhu kaguta, “Mfundiza! Nokupula undolele mwanangu, mwanangu yeli yaiyeka!
Kinyamkela komkumba na komtenda yagute nyangi, komgela kisango kuno kolawa miholovu mumulomo. Kogendelela kumulumiza na hamuleka hima bule!
Niwapula wanahina zako wamulave kinyamkela ayo, lakini hawadahile bule.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mweye lukolo luliduhu kutamanila na lwagile! Nokala na mweye mbaka lini? Nogela kitumbe kumgongo mbaka lini?” Abaho kamulongela munhu ija, “Mgale hano mwanago.”
Mbwanga ija viyakalile komwizila Yesu, kinyamkela kambwanha hasi na kamgela kisango. Lakini Yesu kamkomhokela kinyamkela, kamuhonya mbwanga ija, na kamgwaa tatake.
Wanhu wose wakanganya kwa udahi mkulu wa Mulungu. Wanhu viwakalile wang'hali wokanganya mbuli ziyatendile Yesu, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake,
“Sekemuisemwe mbuli inilonda kuwalongela! Mwana wa Munhu kogeligwa mmakono ga wanhu.”
Lakini wanahina zake hawajuwile fambulo da ulonzi awo. Ukala ufisigwe kumwao avo hawadahile kuujuwa, nao wadumba kumuuza Yesu.
Wanahina wa Yesu wasonga kuibamilila wao kwa wao nani yeli munhu mkulu viweli.
Yesu kakijuwa kiwakalile wogesa, kamsola mwana mdodo, kamwika behi nayo.
Abaho kawalongela wanahina zake, “Munhu yoyose yombokela mwana ino kwa twaga jangu, konibokela niye, na munhu yoyose yombokela niye, kombokela ija yanhumile. Kwavija munhu yeli mdodo vimwili, ayo munhu mkulu kubanza wose.”
Yohana kamulongela Yesu, “Mndewa, tumona munhu kolava vinyamkela kwa twaga jako. Tumgomesa kwavija halawa mkibumbila chetu.”
Yesu kamulongela Yohana na wanahina wayagwe, “Sekemumgomese, kwavija munhu yoyose hamwihilani mweye miyenu.”
Kipindi cha Yesu kugaligwa kuulanga vikikalile mmabehi, kagangamala, kachola Yelusalemu.
Kawatuma wasenga wamulongolele wachole kuna ikijiji kili mwiisi ya Samalia kumtandila kila kinhu.
Lakini wanhu wa kijiji cha Samalia hawambokele Yesu, kwavija wajuwa kamba kakala kochola Yelusalemu.
Wanahina zake, Yakobo na Yohana viwone avo, walonga, “Mndewa, kolonda tulagize moto kulawa kuulanga uwasakaze wose?”
Yesu kahinduka kawakomhokela. Kawalongela, “Hamujuwile bule loho gani imulinayo, kwavija Mwana wa Munhu hezile kuubananga ugima wa wanhu lakini keza kuukombola.”
Abaho Yesu na wanahina zake wachola kuna ikijiji kiyagwe.
Viwakalile mnzila, munhu imoja kamulongela Yesu, “Nokukweleleza kokose konda uchole.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Vizongo wana mhango na ndege wana mvulu, lakini Mwana wa Munhu kaduhu hanhu ha kubwihila na kutambalala.”
Yesu kamulongela munhu iyagwe, “Nikweleleze.” Lakini munhu ija kalonga, “Go mkulu, beta tanhu mbwele ukae hamzike tatangu.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Waleke wanhu wafile wawazike wanhu wafile wayao. Lakini gweye chola ukawapetele wanhu Undewa wa Mulungu.”
Munhu iyagwe kalonga, “Go mkulu, nokukweleleza, lakini beta tanhu halulage lukolo lwangu.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Munhu yoyose yokwaluka kulima abaho kolola kukisogo, hafaya Muundewa wa Mulungu.”
Abaho Mndewa Yesu kawasagula wanhu wayagwe malongo saba na wabili, kawatuma wabili wabili wamulongolele kila kijiji na kila hanhu kuyalondile kuchola.
Kawalongela, “Kuna ndiya nyingi lakini wasang'hanaji wadodo. Mpuleni Mndewa wa indiya yawatume wasang'hanaji mumgunda wake.
Gendeni! Nowatuma mweye kamba ng'hondolo mna iwambwizi.
Sekemusole mfuko hebu mkoba hebu vilatu. Sekemwime na kumulamusa munhu yoyose mnzila.
Ng'anda yoyose yonda mwingile, tanhu mulonge, ‘Tindiwalo dikale mng'anda ino.’
Kamba hana munhu kodinogela tindiwalo, tindiwalo jenu dokala nayo, kamba kuduhu munhu yodinogela tindiwalo, tindiwalo jenu dowabwelela.
Mkale mng'anda ayo, diyeni na kung'wa chochose chonda wawagwelele, kwavija msang'hanaji kolondeka yapate malipo gake. Sekemuhamehame kulawa ng'anda imoja kuchola iyagwe.
Buga jojose donda mwingile na kubokeligwa, diyeni vija vonda wawagwelele.
Wahonyeni watamu weli kuko, na muwalongele, ‘Undewa wa Mulungu wa behi yenu.’
Lakini buga jojose donda mwingile na wanhu wolema kuwabokela, laweni mumo, na vimubita kuna zinzila zao, mulonge,
‘Hata matimbwisi ga buga jenu gatunanahile mmagulu getu togakung'husa kiwe kilaguso kumwenu kamba mututendela gehile. Lakini mujuwe kamba Undewa wa Mulungu wa mmabehi!’
Nowalongela ukweli, mna isiku ya nhaguso, Mulungu kolagusa bazi ng'hani kwa wanhu wa buga da Sodoma kubanza wanhu wa buga dijo!
“Kogaya gweye buga da Kolazini! Kogaya gweye buga da Betisaida! Maza unzonza utendigwe kumwenu mweye wahatendigwe mna gamabuga ga Tilo na Sidoni, wanhu zake wahalekile mwaka nzambi zao na kuvala magunia na kuibakaza mitozi, kulagusa kamba waleka nzambi!
Mwiisiku ya nhaguso, Mulungu kolagusa bazi ng'hani kwa wanhu wa mabuga ga Tilo na Sidoni kubanza mweye.
Gweye buga da Kapelinaumu, vino kolonda kuinula mwenyego mbaka uchanha kuulanga? Mawe! Kohumulusigwa mbaka kowochola wanhu wafile!”
Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Munhu yoyose yowategeleza mweye, konhegeleza niye, na yoyose yowalema mweye, kondema niye. Na munhu yoyose yondema niye, komulema ija yanhumile.”
Abaho wanhu waja malongo saba na wabili wabwela kuno wodeng'helela. Walonga, “Mndewa, hata vinyamkela watutegeleza vituwakomhokele kwa twaga jako!”
Yesu kawedika, “Nimona Mwenembago kolagala kulawa kuulanga kamba lumwesa.
Tegelezeni! Niwagwaa udahi, avo modaha kukanyaga mgendela hasi na inge na kuzihuma nguvu zose za Mwenembago. Kuduhu kinhu chonda kiwalumize.
Lakini sekemudeng'helele kwavija vinyamkela wowategeleza, ila deng'heleleni kwavija matwaga genu gandikigwa kuulanga.”
Kipindi kija Yesu kadeng'helela kwa udahi wa Loho Yang'alile, kalonga, “Tata, Mndewa wa kuulanga na mwiisi! Nokutogola kwavija kuwafisa mbuli zino wanhu weli na nzewele na ubala, na kuwagubulila wana wadodo. Ona, Tata, vino vivo viulondile.
“Tatangu kanigwaa vinhu vose. Kuduhu munhu yamjuwile Mwana ila Tata yaiyeka, na kuduhu munhu yamjuwile Tata ila Mwana na waja wose Mwana yawasagule kuwagubulila wamjuwe Tata.”
Abaho Yesu kawahindukila wanahina zake, kalonga nao kinyelegezi, “Wamweda wanhu wose wovona vinhu vimona mweye!
Nowalongela ukweli, watula ndagu wengi wa Mulungu na wandewa walonda kuvona vimona mweye, lakini hawavonile bule, na vivija walonda kuhulika vimuhulika mweye, lakini hawahulike bule.”
Munhu imoja yagajuwile goya Malagizo ga Musa, kachola kwa Yesu yamgeze. Avo kamuuza, “Mfundiza, vino nhende choni niupate ugima wa mazuwa gose?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Vino, Malagizo golongaze na gweye kogajuwaze?”
Munhu ija kamwidika, “ ‘Mnogele Mndewa Mulungu wako kwa moyo wako wose, na kwa loho yako yose, na kwa nguvu zako zose, na kwa nzewele zako zose,’ na ‘Umnogele miyago kamba viuinogela mwenyego.’ ”
Yesu kamwidika, “Kulonga goya, tenda vivo na gweye kokuwa na ugima.”
Lakini munhu ija kalonda kuilagusa kamba kanoga, avo kamuuza Yesu, “Vino miyangu ayo nani?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Munhu imoja kakala kolawa Yelusalemu kochola Yeliko. Mnzila, wabavi wamgoga, wamboka vinhu vake, na kumtowa, wamuleka habehi na kufa.
Abaho mulava nhosa imoja kakala yohumuluka kubitila nzila iija. Viyamone, kainega, kabitila kumgwazo.
Vivija Mlawi imoja viyavikile aho, kamulola munhu ija, nayo kainega, kabitila kumgwazo.
Lakini Msamalia imoja yakalile muumwanza kavika aho hayakalile munhu ija. Nayo viyamone, kamonela bazi.
Kamcholela, kamgela mavuta na divai mna ivilonda vake na kavifunga goya. Abaho kamwika uchanha mwa mhunda wake, kamgala mbaka kuna ing'anda ya wageni na kumulolesa goya.
Imitondo yake kalava sente kamgwaa mwene ng'anda, kamulongela, ‘Mulolese goya munhu ino. Chochose chonda umsang'hanile, nahabwela nokugwaa fungu jako.’ ”
Abaho Yesu kamuuza, “Viukona gweye, mna iwanhu awo wadatu, nani yakalile miyage munhu ija yatoigwe na wabavi?”
Munhu ija kamwidika, “Ija yamonele bazi.” Yesu kamulongela, “Na gweye genda ukatende vivo.”
Yesu na wanahina zake viwakalile mnzila, wengila kuna ikijiji kimoja. Mtwanzi imoja twaga jake Mata kambokela ukayake.
Mata kakala na mdodo wake yakemigwe Malia, yakalile hasi behi na magulu ga Yesu na kutegeleza mafundizo gake.
Lakini Mata kakala yohunganika na sang'hano nyingi ziyalondeke kusang'hana, avo kamcholela Yesu, kamulongela, “Mndewa, vino hutonga bule kamba mdodo wangu kanilekela sang'hano zose nisang'hane niiyeka? Mulongele yeze yanitaze!”
Lakini Mndewa kamwidika, “Gwee Mata gwee! Kohunganika na kugaya kwa vinhu vingi,
lakini kimoja kiiyeka kilondeka. Malia kasagula kinhu kinogile, na honda kisegezigwe bule kumwake.”
Siku dimoja Yesu kakala hanhu kompula Mulungu. Viyamambukize, mwanahina wake imoja kamulongela, “Mndewa, tufundize kupula, kamba vija Yohana viyawafundize wanahina zake.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mwahampula Mulungu, longeni vino. ‘Tataetu uli kuulanga. Twaga jako ditogoligwe, Undewa wako wize.
Utugwee lelo lujo lwa kila siku.
Uzigele kumgongo nzambi zetu, kamba vija tweye vituzigela kumgongo nzambi za wanhu. Sekeutwingize kuna ukugezigwa.’ ”
Abaho Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Munhu gani kumwenu yeli na mbwiga yahamcholela kilo kikulu na kumulongela, ‘Mbwigangu, ng'hopeshe magate madatu,
kwavija mbwigangu keza, kalawa mwanza, na niye nabule lujo lwa kumgwaa!’
na ija yeli mng'anda yamwidike, ‘Sekeunigaze! Lwivi luhindigwa mwaka, na niye na wanangu tuwasa, avo sidaha kulamuka kukugwaa kinhu chochose.’
Nowalongela vino, hata yahalema kulamuka na kumgwaa magate kwavija mbwigake, lakini kwavija kaduhu kinyala kugendelela kumpula, kolamuka na kumgwaa kila kinhu kiyopula.
“Avo nowalongela, puleni na mweye mogweleligwa, zahileni na mweye movona, gong'ondeni ulwivi na mweye movugulilwa.
Kwavija waja wose wompula Mulungu wogweleligwa, na waja wozahila wopata, na lwivi lovuguligwa kwa munhu yoyose yogong'onda.
Vino kuna munhu yoyose kumwenu kamba mwanage yahampula somba, heyo komgwaa zoka?
Hebu yahampula finga komgwaa inge?
Kamba mweye wene nzambi mojuwa kuwagwaa wanenu vinhu vinogile, lakini Tataenu yeli kuulanga kowagwaa ng'hani Loho Yang'alile wanhu waja wompula.”
Siku dimoja Yesu kakala komulava kinyamkela yamtendile munhu imoja yalemelwe kulonga. Kinyamkela ayo viyamulawile, munhu ija kasonga kulonga. Lunhu lwa wanhu lukanganya ng'hani,
lakini wanhu wayagwe walonga, “Belizebuli, mkulu wa vinyamkela, ayo yomgwaa udahi wa kulava vinyamkela.”
Wanhu wayagwe walonda kumgeza Yesu, avo wampula yatende kilaguso kulawa kuulanga.
Lakini Yesu kakijuwa kiwakalile wokigesa, avo kawalongela, “Undewa wowose wahaigola mna ivibumbila na kuitowa, undewa awo wofa, na lubuga lumoja lwahaigola, lubuga lulo lofa.
Avo kamba undewa wa Mwenembago wahaigola mvibumbila na kuitowa, undewa awo wokwimaze? Mweye molonga niye nolava vinyamkela kwavija Belizebuli konigwaa udahi wa kutenda vivo.
Kamba nolava vinyamkela kwa udahi wa Belizebuli, avo wanhu wenu wolava vinyamkela kwa udahi wa nani? Kwa mbuli ayo wanhu wenu wenyego wowatagusa kamba mobananga!
Lakini kamba nowalava vinyamkela kwa udahi wa Mulungu, avo mujuwe kamba Undewa wa Mulungu uvika mwaka kumwenu.
“Munhu mwene nguvu viyokaliza ng'anda yake kwa silaha, vinhu vake havisoligwa bule.
Lakini yaheza munhu mwene nguvu kubanza heyo, komtowa na kumuhuma, komboka silaha zake ziyatamanile na koigolela na wayage vija viyasolile.
“Munhu yoyose heli ubanzi wangu konilema, na munhu yoyose yolema kunitaza kwika hamoja, ayo kopwililisa.
“Kinyamkela yahamulawa munhu, kochola mwiisi inyalile kuzahila hanhu ha kubwihila. Yahaswela, koilongela, ‘Nobwela ukayangu kunilawile.’
Yahabwela na kuivika ng'anda ifagiligwa na kila kinhu kikigwa goya,
baho kobwela na kuwagala vinyamkela wayagwe saba wehile kubanza heyo, awo wokwiza na kukala mumo. Avo ugima wa munhu ayo wokuwa wiha kubanza aho haichanduso.”
Yesu yang'hali yolonga, mtwanzi imoja kulawa kuna ulunhu kamulongela kwa sauti ng'hulu, “Kamweda mtwanzi yakulelile na kukukong'heza!”
Lakini Yesu kamwidika, “Wamweda ng'hani wanhu wose wohulika mbuli ya Mulungu na kuigoga!”
Wanhu viwakalile womsung'ha sung'ha, Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Lukolo luno lwa wanhu wotenda nzambi! Lolonda kilaguso, lakini kuduhu kilaguso chochose chonda wagweleligwe, ila kilaguso cha Yona.
Kamba vija mtula ndagu wa Mulungu Yona viyakalile kilaguso kwa wanhu wa Ninawi, vivo ili kwa Mwana wa Munhu vonda yawe kilaguso kwa wanhu wa lukolo luno.
Mna isiku ya nhaguso, Malikia wa Sheba kokwima na kuwatagusa mweye kamba mubananga, kwavija heyo kafunga mwanza kulawa mwiisi yake kachola kumtegeleza Mndewa Sulemani na mafundizo gake geli na nzewele. Nowalongela, hano hana munhu mkulu kubanza Sulemani.
Mna isiku ya nhaguso, wanhu wa Ninawi wokwima na kuwatagusa mweye, kwavija awo waleka nzambi Yona viyawapetele. Lakini nowalongela, hano hana munhu mkulu kubanza Yona!
“Kuduhu munhu yobwinha taa na kuigubika na kikalango, lakini koika kukingolobweda, muladi wanhu wokwingila mng'anda wone mulenge.
Meso gako mulukuli lwako gaigala na taa. Kamba meso gako magima, lukuli lwako lose lokuwa na mulenge, lakini meso gako gahabanangika, lukuli lwako lose lokuwa mdiziza.
Muiteganye, mulenge uli mgati mmwenu sekeuwe ziza.
Kamba lukuli lwako lose lwahawa na mulenge, na kuduhu hanhu heli na ziza, lukuli lwako lose lokuwa na lenge eka, kamba vija taa viimwemwesa mulenge wake.”
Yesu viyamambukize kulonga, Mfalisayo imoja kamgoneka ukayake wakaje hamoja, avo Yesu kengila mng'anda, kakala hasi, kasonga kuja.
Mfalisayo ayo kakanganya ng'hani viyamone Yesu koja bila kusunha makono gake.
Avo Mndewa kamulongela, “Mweye Mafalisayo mosunha vikasi na sahani kwa kunze, lakini mgati mmwenu mmema ubokaji na gehile.
Mweye mwa wabozi! Vino siyo Mulungu yavitendile va kunze na va mgati vivija?
Lakini laveni vili mgati na muwagwee wakiwa na kila kinhu chonoga kumwenu.
“Mogaya mweye Mafalisayo! Kwavija momgwaa Mulungu fungu da longo da majani gonung'hila goya kamba vija binzali na kalafuu, na mboga ziyagwe, lakini moleka kutenda ganogile kwa wanhu na kumnogela Mulungu. Molondeka kutenda gano na sekemugaleke gago gayagwe.
“Mogaya mweye Mafalisayo! Kwavija monogelwa kukala kuna ivigoda va haulongozi mzing'anda za kumpula Mulungu na kulamusigwa mna gamagulilo.
Mogaya mweye! Kwavija muigala na mapanga hagakoneka, wanhu wobita uchanha bila kugajuwa.”
Munhu imoja yagajuwile goya Malagizo ga Musa kamulongela Yesu, “Mfundiza, wahalonga avo, kotuliga tweye vivija!”
Yesu kamwidika, “Vivija mogaya mweye mugajuwile goya Malagizo ga Musa! Kwavija mowapapiza wanhu mizigo mikulu, lakini mweye wenyego hamulonda kugolosa makono kuwataza kupapa.
Mogaya mweye, kwavija mogazengela goya mapanga ga watula ndagu wa Mulungu, waja wakomigwe na wahenga zenu.
Mweye wenyego mokitogola kija kiwatendile wahenga zenu, kwavija wao wawakoma watula ndagu wa Mulungu, na mweye mogazengela goya mapanga gao.
Kwa mbuli ayo, nzewele ya Mulungu ilonga, ‘Nowatuma watula ndagu wa Mulungu na watumigwa, wayagwe wowakoma na wayagwe wowadununza!’
Avo wanhu wa lukolo luno wotagusigwa mbuli ya kuwakoma watula ndagu wose wa Mulungu, kulawa kuna ichanduso cha isi,
toka kukomigwa kwa Habili mbaka kukomigwa kwa Zakalia, ija yakomigwe hagati ha upango wa kulavila nhosa na Hanhu Hong'ala. Ona, nowalongela, wanhu wa lukolo luno wotagusigwa kwa kuwakoma wao!”
“Mogaya mweye wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa! Kwavija mofisa luvugulo lwa kuvugulila lwivi lwa ng'anda ya kuifunzila. Mweye wenyego hamwingila bule, abaho muwagomesa waja wakalile wolonda kwingila sekewengile!”
Yesu viyasegele hanhu aho, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wasonga kumulonga vihile na kumuuza mbuli nyingi,
wageza kumnamata kwa mbuli zake zonda yalonge.
Wanhu wengi waiting'hana hamoja mbaka wanhu wakala woikanyaga. Tanhu Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Iteganyeni na usasu wa Mafalisayo, nao ndo unafiki.
Kinhu chochose kigubikigwe chogubuligwa, na kija kifisigwe chojuwika.
Avo chochose kimulongile mdiziza chohulikigwa mmulenge, na chochose kimunyong'onye mwiiyeka mdigati dihindigwe chopetigwa mkiswili.
“Nowalongela mweye mbwiga zangu, sekemuwadumbe wanhu waja woukoma lukuli, abaho hawadaha kutenda kinhu kiyagwe chochose kihile.
Lakini nowalagusila wa kumdumba, mdumbeni Mulungu, heyo yahakoma, kana udahi wa kumwasa munhu muumoto wa jehanamu. Nowalongeleni, mdumbeni ayo!
“Vino nhongwa watano hawachuuzigwa kwa sente ndodo mbili? Lakini kuduhu hata imoja yosemwigwa na Mulungu.
Hata mvili zili mmapala genu zipetigwa zose. Avo sekemudumbe. Mweye munoga ng'hani kubanza nhongwa wengi!
“Nowalongeleni ukweli, munhu yoyose yonitogola niye mgameso ga wanhu, Mwana wa Munhu nayo komtogola mgameso ga wasenga wa Mulungu.
Lakini munhu yoyose yonibela niye mgameso ga wanhu, Mwana wa Munhu nayo kombela mgameso ga wasenga wa Mulungu.
“Munhu yoyose yomulonga vihile Mwana wa Munhu, nzambi zake zogeligwa kumgongo, lakini munhu yoyose yomuliga Loho Yang'alile, nzambi zake honda zigeligwe kumgongo bule.
“Wahawagala haulongozi wa ng'anda za kumpula Mulungu, na mgameso ga wakulu wa isi na wandewa, sekemunyawenyawe vija vonda mwidike hebu kija chonda mulonge.
Kwavija Loho Yang'alile kowafundiza saa iija kimulondeka kulonga.”
Munhu imoja muulunhu kamulongela Yesu, “Mfundiza, mulongele ndugu yangu tuigolele uhazi wa tataetu.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Mbwigangu, nani yanigwelele udahi wa kuwalamula hebu kuwagolela uhazi wenu?”
Abaho kagendelela kuwalongela wose, “Muiteganye na ugila! Kwavija ugima wa munhu hautamanila wingi wa vinhu viyalinavo.”
Abaho Yesu kawalongela lusimo luno, “Kukala na munhu imoja yakalile na mgunda uli na ndiya nyingi.
Kasonga kugelegeza mwenyego, ‘Nabule hanhu hakwika ndiya yangu yose. Nhendeze?’
Abaho kailongela, ‘Notenda vino, nogatula makanho gangu na kuzenga makulu ng'hani. Mumo nokwika ndiya yangu na vinhu vangu viyagwe.
Abaho noilongela, gweye moyo wangu! Kuna vinhu vose vinogile kwa miyaka heleketwaa. Bwihila, diya, ing'wa, na kudeng'helela!’
Lakini Mulungu kamulongela, ‘Gweye kwa mbozi! Kilo cha lelo noulonda ugima wako, abaho vinhu vose vino viuikile vokuwa va nani?’ ”
Abaho Yesu kamambukiza kulonga, “Vino vivo ili kwa waja woikila vinhu vao wenyego, lakini haweka vinhu vao kwa Mulungu.”
Abaho Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Nowalongela, sekemulugaiye lujo lumulonda muladi muwe wagima, hebu viwalo vimulonda kwa ng'huli zenu.
Kwavija ugima unoga kubanza lujo, na lukuli lunoga kubanza viwalo.
Waloleni bondwa, hawahanda, hawasenga, waduhu makanho, lakini Mulungu kowadima! Vino Mulungu hawanogela ng'hani mweye kubanza iwabondwa?
Nani kumwenu kwa kuigaza ng'hani kodaha kwengeza hata saa dimoja da ugima wake?
Kumbe hamudaha kutenda mbuli ndodo kamba ino, habali moigaza kwa mbuli ziyagwe?
Loleni maluwa vigokula. Hagasang'hana hebu hagaisonela viwalo. Lakini nowalongela kweli, hata mndewa Sulemani, hamoja na utajili wake wose kakala kaduhu viwalo vinogile viigalile na maluwa gano.
Kamba Mulungu heyo yodivaza jani da kumuhulo, lelo dabahano na mayo dokwasigwa muumoto, vino hondayawavaze ng'hani mweye? Mweye wanhu mutamanila kidogo!
“Avo sekemuigaze moja choni, hebu mong'wa choni.
Kwavija vinhu avo, vivo voogaiya wanhu haweli Wayahudi. Tataenu yeli kuulanga kojuwa molonda vinhu vose avo.
Lakini uzahileni tanhu Undewa wa Mulungu, nayo kowagwaa vinhu avo.
“Sekemudumbe mweye kibumbila kidodo cha wanahina zangu, kwavija Tataenu kanogelwa kuwagwaa mweye Undewa.
Chuuzeni vose vimulinavo na muwagwelele wakiwa zisente. Muitendele mikoba hailala, na muikile ngama yenu kuulanga. Ako hondaihunguke, kwavija kuduhu wabavi wodaha kuhavika na kuduhu ng'hobo wodaha kuibananga.
Kwavija kuko kuili ngama yako, vivija kuko kondauwe moyo wako.
“Muitande na kuifunga mikwiji mvigudi, na taa zenu ziwe zokwaka,
kamba wasang'hanaji viwombetela mkulu wao yabwele kulawa kuna idizengele. Yahabwela na kugong'onda ulwivi, himahima womvugulila.
Wamweda wasang'hanaji waja mkulu wao yahabwela kowavika meso! Nowalongeleni ukweli, mkulu ayo kosaula koti jake, kowalongela wakale hasi muulujo nayo kowasang'hanila.
Wamweda wasang'hanaji waja mkulu wao kowavika wang'hali meso, hata kamba yahabwela kilo kikulu hebu nzogolo zikwika!
Lakini mujuwe vino, kamba mwene ng'anda yahajuwile saa ya kwiza mbavi, yahakalile meso, na sambi yaileke ng'anda yake ituligwe na mbavi.
Na mweye vivija molondeka mwiitande, kwavija Mwana wa Munhu kokwiza mna isaa hamuigesile.”
Petulo kamulongela, “Mndewa, vino lusimo luno kutulongela tweye twiiyeka, hebu kuwalongela wanhu wose?”
Mndewa kamwidika, “Vino msang'hanaji gani yotamaniligwa na yeli na nzewele? Ayo ija mkulu wake komwika yalolese wasang'hanaji wayagwe, na yawagwee lujo mna isaa inogile.
Kamweda msang'hanaji ija mkulu wake yahabwela komvika kosang'hana vivo!
Nowalongela ukweli, mkulu wake komwika msang'hanaji ayo yawe mulolesaji wa vinhu vake vose.
Lakini msang'hanaji ija yahailongela mwenyego, ‘Mkulu wangu kokawa ng'hani kubwela.’ Baho kosonga kuwatowa wasang'hanaji wayagwe, wa kitwanzi na wa kimbigalo, kuno koja na kung'wa mbaka kokoligwa.
Abaho mkulu wake kobwela mna isiku msang'hanaji ija haigesile na mna isaa haijuwile bule. Mkulu ayo komtowa ng'hani na kumwika hamoja na wanhu hawatogola.
“Msang'hanaji ija yajuwile kija kiyolonda mkulu wake yakisang'hane, lakini hakisang'hana bule msang'hanaji ayo kotowigwa ng'hani.
Lakini msang'hanaji ija hakijuwile kiyolonda mkulu wake, abaho kotenda kinhu kihile, msang'hanaji ayo kotowigwa kidogo. Munhu yagweleligwe vingi kodaigwa vingi, na munhu yagweleligwe vingi ng'hani kodaigwa vingi ng'hani.
“Niza kubwinha moto mwiisi, vinondile niye wahakile mwaka!
Nina ubatizo nolondigwa niubokele, na niye nougaiya ng'hani mbaka umale!
Vino mweye mogesa niza kugala tindiwalo mwiisi? Bule! Sizile kugala tindiwalo, lakini kuwagola wanhu.
Kulawa sambi, wanhu watano wa ng'anda imoja woigola, wadatu kwa wabili, na wabili kwa wadatu.
Tata koigola na mwanage, na mwana koigola na tatake. Mama koigola na mndele wake, na mndele koigola na mamake. Mama mkwe koigola na mkwe wake wa kitwanzi, na mkwe wa kitwanzi koigola na mama mkwe wake.”
Yesu kawalongela wanhu kabili, “Mwahajona wingu dolawilila mwambu wa kudihongela zuwa, baho molonga, ‘Mvula kotowa,’ na kweli kotowa.
Na mwahajona beho da kusini nyukwanyukwa molonga, ‘Hokuwa na joto,’ na yokuwa vivo.
Mweye mwa wanafiki! Modaha kulola isi na ulanga na kulagula kamba mvula kotowa hebu hatowa, habali hamujuwile fambulo da kipindi kino?
“Habali hamudaha kujuwa wenyego mbuli zinogile za kusang'hana?
Kamba munhu kokugala mkitala, vinoga uilumbe nayo mung'hali mnzila. Wahalemelwa, kokugala kwa msemi, nayo msemi kokugala mmakono ga wakalizi, nao wokugodeka mkifungo.
Nokulongela, mumo humulawa ng'o, mbaka ulipe sente yose!”
Kipindi kikija wanhu wayagwe wakala aho, wamulongela Yesu mbuli ya Wagalilaya wakomigwe na Pilato kipindi viwakalile womulavila nhosa Mulungu.
Yesu kawedika, “Vino mogesa Wagalilaya awo wakala na nzambi nyingi kubanza Wagalilaya wayagwe lekaavo wadununzika vivo?
Bule! Nowalongela kweli, na mweye vivija mwahalema kuleka nzambi zenu, mose mofa kamba awo.
Hebu mogesa wanhu waja longo na wanane wafile kwa kulagaliligwa na lingo ako Siloamu wakala na nzambi nyingi kubanza wanhu wose kudibuga da Yelusalemu?
Bule! Nowalongela, mwahalema kuleka nzambi, mose mofa kamba awo.”
Abaho Yesu kawalongela lusimo luno, “Munhu imoja kahanda mbiki wa matunda mumgunda wake wa mizabibu. Kachola kuzahila matunda, lakini hapatile tunda jojose bule.
Avo kamulongela msang'hanaji wake, ‘Lola, mwaka uno wa kadatu nokwiza hano kuzahila matunda mumbiki uno, lakini sipata chochose. Ukanhe! Habali ugendelele kuibananga isi?’
Lakini msang'hanaji wake kamwidika, ‘Go mkulu, uleke mwaka uno uiyeka, nouhalilila na kuwikila mbolea.
Abaho kamba wahalela yokuwa goya, lakini wahaleka kulela, kodaha kuukanha!’ ”
Siku dimoja da Kubwihila, Yesu kakala yofundiza mng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu.
Baho kukala na mtwanzi imoja. Mtwanzi ayo kakala na kinyamkela yamtendile yalumwe miyaka longo na nane. Kakala yaveduke mgongo na hadahile kuigolosa bule.
Yesu viyamone, kamkema, kamulongela, “Mama, kuhonyigwa utamu wako!”
Yesu kamwikila makono, bahaja lukuli lwake lugoloka, nayo kamgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu.
Lakini mkulu wa ng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu kagevuzika kwavija Yesu kamuhonya munhu mwiisiku ya Kubwihila. Avo kawalongela wanhu, “Mnazo siku sita za kusang'hana. Mzisiku azo, mwize muhonyigwe, lakini sekemwize kudisiku da Kubwihila!”
Mndewa kamwidika, “Mweye mwa wanafiki! Vino, nani kumwenu yoleka kumfungula ng'ombe wake hebu mhunda wake kulawa mdizizi na kumulongoza yachole kung'wa mazi mwiisiku ya Kubwihila?
Mtwanzi ino kolawa mulukolo lwa Abulahamu. Nayo kakala yagogigwe na Mwenembago kwa miyaka longo na nane. Vino halondeke kulekesigwa mwiisiku ya Kubwihila?”
Mbuli azo ziyalongile Yesu ziwatenda waja wamwihile wagwe kinyala, lakini wanhu wayagwe wakala wodeng'helela kwa mbuli zose za unzonza ziyasang'hane Yesu.
Abaho Yesu kawauza, “Vino Undewa wa Mulungu uigala na choni? Vino niusimulile kwa lusimo gani?
Uigala na kija kilawilile kwa munhu yasolile mbeyu ndodo ya haladali na kuihanda mumgunda wake. Mbeyu ayo yota na kuwa mbiki mkulu, na ndege wazenga mvulu zao mna gamatambi gake.”
Yesu kawauza kabili, “Vino Undewa wa Mulungu uigala na choni?
Uigala na kija kilawilile kwa mtwanzi yasolile mela na kuditibwiliza hamoja na madebe mabili ga usage, abaho usage wose ugongomoka.”
Yesu kagendelela na mwanza wake kuchola Yelusalemu, kubitila kuna gamabuga na vijiji kowapetela wanhu.
Munhu imoja kamuuza, “Go mkulu, vino wonda wakomboligwe wanhu wadodo waiyeka?” Yesu kawedika,
“Gangamaleni mwingile kubitila ulwivi msisili, kwavija wanhu wengi wolonda kwingila lakini honda wadahe bule.
Mwene ng'anda kokwinuka na kuhinda ulwivi. Mweye mokwima kunze na kusonga kugong'onda ulwivi molonga, ‘Mndewa, tuvugulile!’ Nayo kowedika, ‘Sikujuwile kumulawa!’
Mweye momwidika, ‘Tuja na kung'wa hamoja na gweye, na gweye kutufundiza kudibuga jetu!’
Lakini heyo kolonga kabili, ‘Sikujuwile kumulawa! Segeleni kumwangu, mweye mose mutenda nzambi!’
Baho molila na kudafuna meno mwahawona Abulahamu na Isaka na Yakobo na watula ndagu wose wa Mulungu muundewa wa Mulungu, kuno mweye wenyego mwasigwa kunze!
Wanhu wokwiza kulawa mwambu wa kudilawila zuwa na mwambu wa kudihongela zuwa, kulawa mwambu wa kasikazini na mwambu wa kusini, wokala hasi muulujo muundewa wa Mulungu.
Abaho wanhu waja weli wa ikimambukizo sambi wokuwa wa ichanduso, na waja weli wa ichanduso sambi wokuwa wa ikimambukizo.”
Kipindi kikija Mafalisayo wayagwe wamcholela Yesu, wamulongela, “Segela hanhu hano uchole hanhu hayagwe, kwavija Helode kolonda kukukoma.”
Yesu kawedika, “Gendeni mkamulongele vino ija kizongo, ‘Nolava vinyamkela na kuhonya watamu lelo na mayo, na siku da kadatu nomambukiza sang'hano yangu!’
Hata avo lelo, mayo, na kisindo nogendelela na mwanza wangu, kwavija hailondeka mtula ndagu wa Mulungu yafile kunze ya buga Yelusalemu.
“Gweye Yelusalemu! Gweye Yelusalemu! Kowakoma watula ndagu wa Mulungu na kuwatowa kwa mabwe waja Mulungu yawatumile kumwako! Miyanza mingapi nilonda kuwahagata wanago kwa makono gangu, kamba vija nguku viyovihagata vinziya vake mna gamabawa gake, lakini hulondile bule!
Sambi lola, Ng'anda yenu ya Mulungu ilekigwa vihame! Na niye nowalongela, hondamumbone kabili mbaka siku dija vondamulonge, ‘Mulungu yamtambikile ija yokwiza kwa twaga da Mndewa!’ ”
Mwiisiku imoja ya Kubwihila, Yesu kachola kuja lujo mng'anda ya mkulu imoja wa Mafalisayo, wanhu wakala womulola goya Yesu.
Munhu imoja yakalile na utamu wa kuvimba lukuli keza kwa Yesu.
Yesu kawauza wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, “Vino, vinoga kumuhonya munhu mwiisiku ya Kubwihila hebu havinogile bule?”
Lakini wao hawalongile mbuli yoyose bule. Yesu kamsola mtamu ija, kamuhonya, abaho kamuleka yachole.
Abaho kawauza, “Vino nani kumwenu yeli na mwana hebu ng'ombe, yahadumbukila mdikolombo mwiisiku ya Kubwihila, hamulava mwiisiku ayo?”
Lakini wao hawadahile kumwidika mbuli ino.
Yesu kawona wanhu waja wagonekigwe viwakalile wosagula vigoda va kuulongozi. Avo kawalongela wose lusimo luno,
“Munhu yahakugoneka kuna idizengele, sekeukale mvigoda va haulongozi, kwavija kodaha kwiza munhu yagonekigwe yeli munhu mkulu kubanza gweye,
na munhu yawagoneke mose wabili kokwizila na kukulongela, ‘Segela aho haukalile umulekele miyago.’ Baho kogwa kinyala mgameso ga wanhu na kobwela kukala kuna ivigoda va kukisogo.
Lakini wahagonekigwa kuna ulujo, genda ukakale kuna ivigoda va kukisogo, muladi munhu yakugoneke yaheza yakulongele, ‘Mbwigangu, izo ukale kuna ivigoda va haulongozi.’ Baho kopata nhogolwa mgameso ga wanhu wose wagonekigwe.
Kwavija waja wose woitenda wenyego wanhu wakulu wotendigwa wanhu wadodo, na waja woitenda wenyego wanhu wadodo wotendigwa wanhu wakulu.”
Abaho Yesu kamulongela ija yamgoneke, “Kamba kowatanda wanhu lujo lwa imisi hebu lwa ichungulo, sekeuwagoneke mbwiga zako, hebu ndugu zako, hebu matajili hebu wanhu welibehi na gweye. Kwavija wahatenda avo, wao nao wokugoneka na avo wokulipa vija viuwatendele wao.
Lakini kamba wahatenda nyimwili nyimwili, wagoneke wakiwa,, mbetembete, waholole, na waja wasuwameso,
na gweye kotambikiligwa, kwavija awo hawadaha kukulipa. Mulungu kokulipa mwiisiku ya kuzilibuligwa kwa wanhu wanogile.”
Munhu imoja mna iwaja wakalile muulujo viyahulike avo, kamulongela Yesu, “Wamweda waja wonda waje lujo lwa nyimwili nyimwili muundewa wa Mulungu!”
Yesu kamulongela, “Munhu imoja katenda nyimwili nyimwili ng'hulu, kawagoneka wanhu wengi.
Viivikile saa ya nyimwili nyimwili, kamtuma msang'hanaji wake yakawalongele wanhu wagonekigwe weze, kwavija kila kinhu kitandigwa.
Lakini kila munhu kalava kitala chake. Munhu wa ichanduso kamulongela msang'hanaji ija, ‘Nigula mgunda, avo nolondeka nikaulole. Chonde, ndeka nyhole.’
Iyagwe kalonga, ‘Nigula ng'ombe longo wa kulimila, avo vino na muumwanza, nochola kuwageza. Chonde, ndeka nyhole.’
Iyagwe kalonga, ‘Sambi sambi nisola mwehe, avo sidaha kwiza.’
“Msang'hanaji ija kabwela na kumulongela mbuli zose zino mkulu wake. Mkulu wake kagevuzika ng'hani, kamulongela msang'hanaji wake, ‘Lopola ugende mzinzila mhanda na mna gamabuga, uwagale hano wanhu wakiwa, waholole, wasuwameso na mbetembete.’
Bahaja msang'hanaji ija kamulongela, ‘Go mkulu, gago gose gasang'hanigwa, lakini kuna gati disigala.’
Avo mkulu ija kamulongela msang'hanaji wake, ‘Lawa kunze uchole mzinzila na mna gamakulugumbi ukawalongele wanhu weze, muladi ng'anda yangu imeme.
Nowalongela kweli, kuduhu hata munhu imoja mna iwaja wagonekigwe walemile kwiza yonda yalanze lujo lwangu!’ ”
Baho lunhu lwa wanhu vilukalile lomkweleleza, Yesu kahinduka, kawalongela,
“Munhu yoyose yokwiza kumwangu na kuno kowanogela ng'hani tatake na mamake na mwehe wake na wanage na lumbu zake na ndugu zake na vivija kamba kounogela ng'hani ugima wake mwenyego kubanza kumnogela Kilisito, hadaha kuwa mwanahina wangu.
Na munhu yoyose haupapa msalaba wake na kunikweleleza, hadaha kuwa mwanahina wangu.
“Vino nani kumwenu yahalonda kuzenga lingo, tanhu hakala hasi na kugelegeza sente za kudizengela, muladi yajuwe kamba kana sente za kumambukiza sang'hano yake?
Buleavo, yahamambukiza kuzenga chandusilo, kolemelwa kumambukiza kuzenga dilingo, na wose wachone acho kilawilile womseka,
wolonga, ‘Munhu ino kasonga kuzenga, lakini kalemelwa kumambukiza sang'hano yake!’
“Hebu mndewa gani yahaitanda kuchola kuitowa na mndewa iyagwe, tanhu hakala hasi na kugelegeza kamba heyo na wakalizi zake elufu kumi kodaha kuitowa na mndewa miyage yeli na wakalizi elufu ishilini?
Kamba yahona hadaha, kowatuma wasenga zake wakaiting'hane na mndewa iyagwe, wampule wailumbe yang'hali kutali.”
Yesu kamambukiza kulonga, “Vivo ili kumwenu, kuduhu munhu yodaha kuwa mwanahina wangu mbaka yaleke kila kinhu kiyali nacho.
“Mkele unoga, lakini wahagiza ukali wake, kuduhu nzila ya kuubweza kabili.
Haufaya kwa isi hebu mna imbolea, lakini wokwasigwa. Yeli na magwiti yahulike!”
Siku dimoja wabokela kodi wengi na wanhu wayagwe wotenda nzambi wachola kumtegeleza Yesu.
Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wasonga kunung'unika, “Munhu ino kowabokela wanhu wotenda nzambi na kuja nao!”
Avo Yesu kawalongela lusimo luno.
“Vino kamba imoja wenu kana ng'hondolo gana, abaho ng'hondolo imoja kapotela, vino kotenda choni? Kowaleka waja malongo tisa na tisa kuluwala, na kuchola kumzahila ija yapotele mbaka yampate.
Yahampata, kodeng'helela na kumwika mmaega gake,
na kumgala ukae. Abaho kowakema hamoja mbwiga zake na wanhu weli behi nayo na kowalongela, ‘Miyenu nodeng'helela kwavija nimpata ng'hondolo wangu yapotele. Avo tudeng'helele hamoja!’
Nowalongela, avo vondaiwe, hokuwa na ndeng'helelo ng'hulu kuulanga mbuli ya munhu imoja mwene nzambi yahaleka nzambi zake, kubanza waja malongo tisa na tisa wogesa wanoga na hawalonda kuzileka nzambi zao.”
“Hebu mtwanzi yeli na sente longo yahagiza imoja, kotendaze? Kobwinha taa, kofagila ng'anda yake, na kulola goya kila hanhu mbaka yaipate.
Yahaipata, kowakema hamoja mbwiga zake na wanhu weli behi yake, kowalongela, ‘Nodeng'helela ng'hani kwavija niipata sente yangu ipotele. Avo tudeng'helele hamoja!’
Vivija nowalongela, wasenga wa Mulungu wodeng'helela mbuli ya munhu imoja mwene nzambi yahaleka nzambi zake.”
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Kukala na munhu imoja yakalile na wana wabili.
Ija imdodo kamulongela tatake, ‘Tata, nigwelele uhazi wangu sambi.’ Avo munhu ija kawagolela uhazi wao wanage awo wabili.
Hazibitile siku nyingi, ija imdodo kachuuza uhazi wake. Abaho kafunga mwanza na sente ziyapatile, kachola isi ya kutali, ako kazinanga sente zose ziyapatile.
Kamambukiza kila kinhu kiyakalile nacho. Abaho lufilili lwa nzala lulawilila mwiisi ija, nayo kakala kaduhu kinhu chochose kisigale.
Avo kachola kusang'hana kibaluwa kwa munhu imoja wa isi ija, munhu ayo kamtuma mumgunda wake yasusile nguluwe.
Kakala kosulukila kuja maganda gawadile nguluwe, lakini kuduhu munhu yamgwelele kinhu chochose cha kuja.
Abaho kagelegeza na kulonga, ‘Tatangu kana wasang'hanaji wengi, woja mbaka wosigaza na niye hano nofa na nzala!
Nosegela na kuchola kwa tatangu na kumulongela, Tata, nimtenda Mulungu nzambi, na vivija nikutendela gweye nzambi.
Sifaya kukemigwa mwanago. Nhende kamba imoja wa wasang'hanaji zako.’
Avo kafunga mwanza wa kubwela kwa tatake. “Viyakalile yang'hali kutali, tatake kamona. Kamonela bazi mwanage, avo kamkimbilila, kamuhagatila na kamnonela.
Mwanage kamulongela, ‘Tata, nimtenda Mulungu nzambi, na vivija nikutendela gweye. Sifaya kukemigwa mwanago.’
Lakini tatake kawakema wasang'hanaji zake. Kawalongela, ‘Lopoleni! Galeni kiwalo kinogile mumvaze. Mvazeni pete mkidole chake na vilatu mmagulu gake.
Abaho choleni mumgale bofu da ng'ombe dinonile mudichinje, wose tuje na kudeng'helela!
Kwavija mwanangu ino kakala yafile lakini sambi mgima. Kakala yapotele lakini sambi koneka.’ Avo wasonga kudeng'helela.
“Kipindi acho mwanage imkulu kakala kumgunda. Viyakalile behi na ing'anda, kahulika nyila na wanhu wovina.
Avo kamkema msang'hanaji imoja, kamuuza, ‘Ako kuna choni?’
Msang'hanaji ayo kamwidika, ‘Mdodo wako kabwela ukae, na tatako kamchinjila bofu da ng'ombe dinonile, kwavija kabwela mgima!’
“Ija imwana mkulu kagevuzika ng'hani, avo kalema kwingila mng'anda. Tatake kalawa kunze na kumpula yengile mng'anda.
Lakini kamwidika tatake, ‘Lola, miyaka yose ino niye nokusang'hanila kamba msang'hanaji, na silemile lagizo jako jojose. Kungwaa choni? Hunigwelele hata mbuzi nideng'helele na mbwiga zangu!
Lakini mwanago ino kananga vinhu vako mbuli ya ugoni, na viyabwelile ukae kumchinjila bofu da ng'ombe dinonile!’
Tatake kamwidika, ‘Mwanangu, kipindi chose kukala na niye, na vinhu vose vinilinavo vako.
Lakini tulondeka tudeng'helele na kusekelela, kwavija mdodo wako kakala yafile lakini sambi mgima, kakala yapotele lakini sambi koneka!’ ”
Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Kukala na tajili imoja yakalile na mulolesaji wa vinhu vake. Tajili ayo kalongeligwa kamba mulolesaji ayo konanga sente zake.
Avo kamkema mng'anda, kamuuza, ‘Mbuli gani zimhulika kumwako? Mhetela vinhu vose viubokele na vija viulavile, kwavija hudaha kuwa mulolesaji wa vinhu vangu kabili.’
Mulolesaji ija kailongela, ‘Mkulu wangu konilekesa usang'hano. Notenda choni? Kulima sidahile bule, na kupula nokona kinyala.
Sambi nojuwa choni chonda nhende muladi nahalavigwa mna isang'hano, niwe na mbwiga wa kunibokela mzikae zao!’
“Avo kawakema wanhu wose wakalile wodaigwa na mkulu wake. Kamuuza wa ichanduso, ‘Kodaigwa choni na mkulu wangu?’
Nayo kamwidika, ‘Madebe gana ga mavuta.’ Mulolesaji ija kamulongela, ‘Sola cheti chako, kala hasi, lopola wandike malongo matano.’
Abaho kamuuza iyagwe, ‘Na gweye kodaigwa choni?’ Nayo kamwidika, ‘Viloba gana va ngano.’ Mulolesaji ija kamulongela, ‘Sola cheti chako, wandike malongo nane.’
“Mkulu wa ija mulolesaji mbala kamtogola kwavija katenda vinhu kwa ubala. Kwavija wanhu wa mwiisi ino wabala ng'hani mna zimbuli zao kubanza wanhu wa kumulenge.”
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Avo nowalongeleni, itendeleni umbwiga kubitila vinhu va mwiisi, muladi vahamala mudahe kubokeligwa kuna ikae ya ugima wa mazuwa gose.
Munhu yoyose yotamaniligwa mna ivinhu vidodo, kotamaniligwa mna ivinhu vikulu. Na munhu yoyose hatamaniligwa mna ivinhu vidodo, vivija hatamaniligwa mna ivinhu vikulu.
Avo kamba mweye hamutamaniligwa kulolesa mali za mwiisi, modahaze kutamaniligwa kulolesa mali za kuulanga?
Na kamba hutamaniligwa kulolesa vinhu va munhu iyagwe, nani yonda yakugwee vinhu vako mwenyego?
“Kuduhu msang'hanaji yodaha kuwasang'hanila wakulu wabili. Kwavija komwihila imoja na kumnogela iyagwe, hebu koilumba na imoja na kumbeza iyagwe. Hamudaha kumsang'hanila Mulungu hamoja na mali.”
Mafalisayo viwazihulike mbuli zino zose, wamzeha Yesu, kwavija wakala wanogelwa na sente.
Yesu kawalongela, “Mweye awo wanhu muitenda munoga mgameso ga wanhu, lakini Mulungu kaijuwa mizoyo yenu. Kwavija vinhu vikoneka vinoga ng'hani kwa wanhu, mgameso ga Mulungu vokoneka viha.
“Malagizo ga Musa na maandiko ga watula ndagu wa Mulungu vikala vipetigwa mbaka kipindi cha Yohana Mbatizaji. Kusongela aho, Mbuli Inogile ya Undewa wa Mulungu yopetigwa, na kila munhu kowamba kokwingila.
Lakini vibuha ng'hani kwa ulanga na isi kupotela, kubanza kinhu kidodo ng'hani kupotela mna Gamalagizo.
“Mbigalo yoyose yomwasa mwehe wake na kusola mtwanzi iyagwe, kotenda ugoni. Na mbigalo yomsola mtwanzi ija yasigwe, nayo kotenda ugoni vivija.
“Kukala na tajili imoja yavalile viwalo va sente nyingi ng'hani na kuja goya kila siku.
Vivija kukala na munhu imoja mkiwa yakemigwe Lazalo, kamema vilonda lukuli lose, kakala yokwikigwa muulwivi lwa tajili ija.
Lazalo kakala yosulukila kuja vilagale muimeza ya tajili ayo. Na umbwa wakala wokwiza na kumulambita mvilonda vake.
“Abaho mkiwa ija kafa na kasoligwa na wasenga wa kuulanga mbaka behi ya Abulahamu. Tajili ayo nayo kafa na kazikigwa.
Ako kowochola wanhu wafile, kakala kodununzika ng'hani. Kenula meso gake, kamona Abulahamu kwa kutali na Lazalo kakala behi yake.
Avo kamkema kwa sauti ng'hulu, ‘Tata Abulahamu! Nyonele bazi! Mtume Lazalo yazabike kidole chake mgamazi, yaluhoze lulimi lwangu, kwavija nogaya ng'hani muumoto uno!’
“Lakini Abulahamu kamulongela, ‘Mwanangu, kumbuka muugima wako kubokela vinhu vinogile, nayo Lazalo kabokela vihile. Lakini sambi Lazalo kobwihila, na gweye kodununzika.
Hata avo, hagati yetu tweye na mweye hekigwa kolombo kulu, muladi munhu yolonda kuloka kulawa kuno kwiza kumwenu sekeyadahe, hebu munhu yoyose kulawa kumwenu sekeyaloke kwiza kumwetu!’
Tajili ija kalonga, ‘Nokupula gweye, tata Abulahamu, umtume Lazalo kuna ikae ya tatangu,
ako kuna ndugu zangu watano. Muleke yachole yakawazume muladi sekeweze hanhu hano ha kudununzika!’
“Abulahamu kalonga, ‘Ndugu zako wanago maandiko ga Musa na ga watula ndagu wa Mulungu ga kuwazuma. Wawategeleze wao kiwolonga!’
Tajili ija kamwidika, ‘Bule tata Abulahamu! Lakini kamba munhu yahazilibuka kulawa kwa wafile na kuwacholela, baho wozileka nzambi zao!’
Lakini Abulahamu kamulongela, ‘Kamba hawagagoga maandiko ga Musa na watula ndagu wa Mulungu, honda wategeleze hata kamba munhu yahazilibuka kulawa kwa wafile!’ ”
Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Vinhu vondaviwatende wanhu watende nzambi volawilila, lakini kogaya munhu ija yovitenda vilawilile!
Yokuwa vinoga kwa munhu ayo yagodekigwe dibwe kulu da kudugila msingo na yasigwe mbahali, kubanza kumuhonza imoja wa wadodo wano yatende nzambi.
Avo iteganyeni! “Ndugu yako yahakutendela nzambi, umzume. Yahatogola, gela kumgongo.
Yahakutendela nzambi miyanza saba kwa siku dimoja, na kila yaheza kumwako kolonga, ‘Ng'hosa,’ kolondeka ugele kumgongo.”
Watumigwa wamulongela Mndewa, “Twengezele tamanilo.”
Mndewa kawedika, “Maza tamanilo jenu dahakuwile dodo kamba mbeyu ndodo ya haladali, mwahadahile kuulongela mbiki uno wa mkuyu, ‘Ng'oka ukaihande mbahali!’ nao wahawatogolele.
“Vino nani kumwenu yeli na msang'hanaji yomulimila hebu kosusila ng'hondolo, yahabwela kumgunda, komulongela yalopole kuja lujo lwake?
Bule. Lakini komulongela, ‘Uitande, nitandile lujo lwangu, unisang'hanile mbaka ng'homeleze kuja na kung'wa, abaho na gweye koja na kung'wa.’
Vino komgwaa nhogolwa msang'hanaji ayo kwavija kasang'hana gaja galagilizigwe?
Vivo ili kumwenu mweye, mwahatenda vose vimulagilizigwe, longeni, ‘Tweye twa wasang'hanaji wadodo, tusang'hana kija kitulondigwe kusang'hana!’ ”
Yesu viyakalile mnzila kochola Yelusalemu, kabitila mzimbaka za vijiji va Samalia na Galilaya.
Viyakalile kokwingila mna ikijiji kimoja, mumo kukala na wanhu longo wakalile na utamu wa dikulu, wemile kutali.
Waguta, “Go mkulu! Yesu! Tonele bazi!”
Yesu kawona, kawalongela, “Gendeni mkailaguse kwa walava nhosa.” Viwakalile mnzila wochola, wahona.
Imoja wao viyone kahona, kabweleganya kwa Yesu kuno komgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu kwa sauti ng'hulu.
Kamgwila Yesu mmagulu kingubanguba, kamtogola. Munhu ayo kakala Msamalia.
Yesu kalonga, “Vino hawakalile wanhu longo wahonyigwe? Wayagwe tisa wa kwahi?
Vino kuduhu iyagwe yabwelile kumgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu, ila munhu ino hali muyahudi?”
Abaho Yesu kamulongela munhu ija, “Ima na uchole. Kutamanila kwako kukuhonya.”
Mafalisayo wayagwe wamuuza Yesu Undewa wa Mulungu vondawize. Yesu kawedika, “Undewa wa Mulungu hawiza kwa kukoneka kwa meso.
Kuduhu munhu yonda yalonge, ‘Lola, uno hano!’ hebu ‘Uja haja!’ Kwavija Undewa wa Mulungu wa mgati mmwenu.”
Abaho kawalongela wanahina zake, “Kipindi chokwiza vonda mulonde kuyona siku imoja mwiizisiku za Mwana wa Munhu, lakini hondamuyone bule.
Baho wanhu wowalongela, ‘Loleni kakuja!’ hebu ‘Loleni, kahano!’ Sekemuwakweleleze.
Kwavija kamba vija lumwesa vilulawilila kuulanga na kumwemwesa kulawa mwambu umoja mbaka mwambu uyagwe, vivo vondayawe Mwana wa Munhu mwiisiku yake.
Lakini tanhu kolondeka yadununzike ng'hani na kulemigwa na wanhu wa lukolo luno.
Kamba viikalile mna ikipindi cha Nuhu, vivo vondaiwe mzisiku za Mwana wa Munhu.
Kila munhu kakala koja na kung'wa, kusola na kusoligwa mbaka siku ija Nuhu viyengile mdisafina. Mvula ng'hulu itowa na kuwakoma wanhu wose.
Vivija kamba viilawilile mna ikipindi cha Lutu. Wanhu wagendelela kuja na kung'wa, kugula na kuchuuza, kuhanda na kuzenga.
Lakini siku ija Lutu viyasegele Sodoma, moto na mabwe gokwaka vilagala hasi na kuwakoma wose.
Vivo vondaiwe mwiisiku Mwana wa Munhu vonda yagubuligwe.
“Mwiisiku ayo, munhu yeli mkiswili cha ng'anda yake sekeyahumuluke mng'anda kusola vinhu vake, vivija munhu yeli kumgunda sekeyabwele ukayake.
Kumbukeni gampatile mwehe wake Lutu.
Munhu yoyose yolonda kuukombola ugima wake mwenyego, kowagiza, na yoyose yowagiza ugima wake, koukombola.
Nowalongela, kilo acho wanhu wabili wawasile mulusazi lumoja, imoja kosoligwa na iyagwe kolekigwa.
Watwanzi wabili woduga sembe hamoja, imoja kosoligwa na iyagwe kolekigwa.
Wanhu wabili wokuwa kumgunda, imoja kosoligwa na iyagwe kolekigwa.”
Wanahina zake wamuuza, “Vino, kwahi Mndewa?” Yesu kawedika, “Kokose kuli na mzoga, baho honda waiting'hane mhungu.”
Abaho Yesu kawafundiza wanahina zake kwa lusimo kamba siku zose wolondeka kumpula Mulungu na sekewadonhe.
Kalonga, “Kudibuga dimoja kukala na msemi yakalile hamdumba Mulungu hebu kuwatonga wanhu.
Vivija kudibuga dijo, kukala na mgane imoja yakalile komgendela msemi ayo baho kwa baho, kampula, ‘Ngwelele haki yangu kulawa kwa munhu yanitendele gehile.’
Siku nyingi msemi ayo hamtegeleze mgane ayo, lakini kumwande kailongela, ‘Hata kamba simdumba Mulungu hebu kuwatonga wanhu,
lakini kwavija mgane ino konigaza, nomgwaa haki yake, kwavija nahaleka, kogendelela kwiza hano na kunigaza!’ ”
Abaho Mndewa kagendelela kulonga, “Tegelezeni kiyalongile msemi ija yehile.
Vino, Mulungu honda yawagwee haki wanhu zake yawasagule, womulilila imisi na ikilo? Vino kokawa kuwategeleza?
Nowalongela, kowagwaa haki yao himahima. Lakini Mwana wa Munhu vondayeze, vino kodivika tamanilo mwiisi?”
Abaho Yesu kawalongela lusimo luno wanhu waja wakalile woitapa wanoga na kuwabeza wayagwe.
“Kukala na wanhu wabili wacholile kumpula Mulungu kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu. Imoja kakala Mfalisayo na iyagwe kakala mbokela kodi.
