“Mfalisayo ayo kainega kumgwazo na kumpula Mulungu, ‘Go Mulungu, nokugwaa nhogolwa kwavija niye sili kamba wanhu wayagwe, wabokaji, wotenda gehile, hebu wagoni. Wala sili kamba ino mbokela kodi.
Niye nofunga kuja miyanza mibili mzisiku saba, na nolava fungu da longo da vinhu vangu vose vinipata!’
“Lakini ija mbokela kodi kema kutali, hadahile hata kwinula meso gake kuulanga, lakini kaitowa mhambaga yake kwa usungu, kalonga, ‘Go Mulungu, nyonele bazi, niye notenda nzambi!’
Nowalongela, mbokela kodi ija kachola ukayake kuno katendigwa kanoga mgameso Mulungu kubanza ija Mfalisayo. Kwavija wose woitenda wanhu wakulu wohumulusigwa, na waja woihumulusa wotendigwa wanhu wakulu.”
Wanhu wayagwe wamgalila Yesu wana wadodo yawekile makono. Wanahina viwone avo, wawakomhokela.
Lakini Yesu kawakema iwana, kalonga, “Walekeni wana wadodo weze kumwangu, sekemuwagomese, kwavija Undewa wa Mulungu wa wanhu kamba wano.
Nowalongeleni ukweli! Munhu yoyose yolema kuubokela Undewa wa Mulungu kamba mwana mdodo, honda yengile ng'o!”
Mkulu imoja kamuuza Yesu, “Mfundiza Unogile, nhende choni niupate ugima wa mazuwa gose?”
Yesu kamuuza, “Habali kong'hema, ‘unogile’? Kuduhu yanogile, ila Mulungu yaiyeka.
Kugajuwa Malagizo, ‘Sekeutende ugoni, sekeukome, sekewibe, sekeulonge uvizi, wategeleze tatako na mamako.’ ”
Munhu ija kedika, “Gago gose nigagoga toka haudodo.”
Yesu viyahulike avo, kamulongela, “Kuhungukiligwa na kinhu kimoja. Chuuza vose viulinavo, uwagwee sente wanhu wakiwa, na gweye kokuwa na ngama yako kuulanga. Abaho wize unikweleleze.”
Lakini munhu ayo viyahulike avo, kanyunyuwala kwavija kakala tajili ng'hani.
Yesu viyamone kanyunyuwala, kalonga, “Vino avo vonda iwe vidala kwa wanhu matajili kwingila Muundewa wa Mulungu!
Kwavija vibuha kwa ngamiya kubita mna ikizonzo cha sanzia, kubanza tajili kwingila muundewa wa Mulungu.”
Wanhu wamuhulike, wamuuza, “Avo lelo nani yonda yadahe kukomboligwa?”
Yesu kawedika, “Vinhu havidahika kwa wanhu, kwa Mulungu vodahika.”
Abaho Petulo kalonga, “Lola! Tweye tuvileka vinhu vetu vose, tukukweleleza gweye.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela kweli, munhu yoyose yoleka kae yake hebu mwehe wake hebu ndugu zake hebu tatake na mamake hebu wanage mbuli ya Undewa wa Mulungu,
kobokela vinhu vingi ng'hani mna ikipindi kino na kobokela ugima wa mazuwa gose mna ikipindi chonda kize.”
Yesu kawagala hamgwazo wanahina zake longo na wabili, kawalongela, “Tegelezeni! Tochola Yelusalemu. Kuko kila kinhu chandikigwe na watula ndagu wa Mulungu mbuli ya Mwana wa Munhu cholawilila.
Kwavija kogeligwa mmakono ga wanhu haweli Wayahudi, nao womzeha, womuliga, na womtemela mate.
Womtowa mbalati na kumkoma, lakini siku da kadatu kozilibuka.”
Lakini wanahina hawazijuwile bule mbuli azo, kwavija wakala wafisigwe na hawakijuwile kija kiyakalile yokilonga Yesu.
Yesu viyakalile behi na kuvika Yeliko, munhu imoja yakalile msuwameso kakala hamgwazo mnzila, kopula.
Munhu ayo viyahulike lunhu lwa wanhu lobita, kauza, “Kuna choni?”
Wanhu wamulongela, “Yesu wa Nazaleti kobita.”
Nayo kakemelela, “Yesu! Mwana wa Daudi! Nyonele bazi!”
Wanhu walongole wamkomhokela, wamulongela yanyamale. Lakini heyo kagendelela kukemelela ng'hani, “Mwana wa Daudi! Nyonele bazi!”
Avo Yesu kema, kalagiza munhu ija yagaligwe kumwake. Viyavikile behi, Yesu kamuuza,
“Kolonda nikutendele choni?” Nayo kamwidika, “Go mkulu, nolonda kulola.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Lola! Kutamanila kwako kukuhonya.”
Bahaja munhu ija kadaha kulola, kamkweleleza Yesu kuno komgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu. Wanhu wose viwone avo, wamgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu.
Yesu kachola kudibuga da Yeliko, na kakala yobita mzinzila za buga dijo.
Kuko kukala na mkulu imoja wa wabokela kodi yakemigwe Zakayo, nayo kakala tajili.
Kakala kolonda kumona Yesu, lakini hadahile mbuli ya lunhu lwa wanhu na kwavija kakala mguhi.
Avo kakimbila haulongozi wa lunhu luja, kakwela mumbiki wa mkuyu muladi yamone Yesu, yakalile yochola kubitila nzila ija.
Yesu viyavikile hanhu aho, kalola uchanha, kamulongela, “Zakayo, himahima humuluka hasi, kwavija lelo nolondeka kukala mng'anda yako.”
Zakayo kahumuluka himahima, kamgoneka Yesu kwa kudeng'helela.
Wanhu wose wagone ago, wasonga kunung'unika, walonga, “Munhu ino kachola kukala mng'anda ya munhu mwene nzambi!”
Zakayo kema, kamulongela Yesu, “Go Mkulu, tegeleza! Nowagwaa wakiwa nusu ya vinhu vangu, na kamba nimboka munhu yoyose kinhu, nombwezela miyanza mine.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Lelo ukombozi uvika kwa wanhu wa lubuga luno, kwavija munhu ino nayo kolawa mulukolo lwa Abulahamu.
Kwavija Mwana wa Munhu keza kuwazahila na kuwakombola waja wapotele.”
Wanhu viwakalile wotegeleza gago, Yesu kagendelela kuwalongela lusimo. Baho kakala mmabehi na Yelusalemu, nao wagesa kamba Undewa wa Mulungu wa mmabehi kulawilila.
Avo kawalongela, “Kukala na munhu imoja wa lukolo lwa kindewa yafungile mwanza kuchola isi ya kutali yakatendigwe mndewa, abaho yabwele ukayake.
Avo yang'hali hanasegela, kawakema wasang'hanaji zake longo, kila imoja kamgwaa sente sawa, abaho kawalongela, ‘Tendeni biashala mbaka vondambwele.’
Lakini wanhu wa isi yake wakala wamwihile. Avo wawatuma wasenga wagende kwa wanhu waja wakalonge, ‘Hatumulonda munhu ino yawe mndewa wetu.’
“Munhu ija kaupata undewa, kabwela ukayake. Baho kawalagiza wasang'hanaji zake yawagwelele sente wachole kumwake yapate kujuwa kija kiwapatile.
Msang'hanaji wa ichanduso keza, kalonga, ‘Go mkulu, sente zako ziunigwelele zilela miyanza longo.’
Kamulongela, ‘Kutenda goya msang'hanaji unogile! Kwavija kutenda vinogile kulolesa mna ivinhu vidodo, nokutenda uwe munhu mkulu wa mabuga longo.’
Msang'hanaji wa kabili keza, kalonga, ‘Go mkulu, sente zako ziunigwelele zilela miyanza mitano.’
Nayo kamulongela, ‘Kokuwa munhu mkulu wa mabuga matano.’
“Msang'hanaji iyagwe keza, kalonga, ‘Go mkulu, sola sente zako. Nikala nizifungile goya mkikumbi.
Nikudumba, kwavija kuna gahigahi. Kosola vinhu va wayago kwa uvizi na kosenga vija huvihandile.’
Mkulu ija kamulongela, ‘Gweye kwa msang'hanaji yehile! Nokutagusa kwa mbuli zako mwenyego! Kunijuwa nina gahigahi, nisolaga vinhu va wayangu na kusenga vija sivihandile.
Habali huzikile sente zangu kwa wanhu wokwika sente muladi vimbwelile nyambulile zongezeke?’
“Abaho kawalongela waja wemile aho, ‘Mbokeni ayo zisente, mumgwelele msang'hanaji ija yapatile sente miyanza longo ya zija ziyagweleligwe.’
Lakini wao wamulongela, ‘Go mkulu, lakini heyo kanazo sente miyanza longo!’
Nayo kawedika, ‘Munhu yeli na kinhu kokongezelwa, lakini ija yeliduhu kinhu, kobokigwa hata kija kidodo kiyelinacho.
Na sambi, waja wanihile, wondema niye niwe mndewa wao, wagaleni hano, muwakome bahano mgameso gangu!’ ”
Yesu viyamambukize kulonga avo, kawalongolela kuchola Yelusalemu.
Viyakalile behi na kuvika Betifage na Betania, habehi na Lugongo lwa Mizeituni, kawatuma wanahina zake wabili,
kawalongela, “Gendeni kuna ikijiji kili kuulongozi wenu. Mwahengila, momvika mwana mhunda kafungigwa, nayo yang'hali hanakweligwa na munhu. Mfunguleni mumgale hano.
Munhu yoyose yahawauza habali momfungula, mulongeleni, ‘Mndewa komulonda.’ ”
Wanahina waja wachola, wamvika kamba vija Yesu viyawalongele.
Viwakalile womfungula imwana mhunda, wenyego wawauza, “Habali momfungula?”
Nao wawedika, “Mndewa komulonda.”
Wamgala imwana mhunda kwa Yesu. Abaho watandika viwalo vao mumgongo wa imwana mhunda, na wamtaza Yesu kukwela.
Yesu viyakalile kochola, wanhu wanzanza viwalo vao mnzila.
Viyakalile behi na kuvika Yelusalemu, hanhu hali na mtelemuko wa Lugongo lwa Mizeituni, lunhu mkulu lwa wanahina zake lusonga kudeng'helela na kumgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu kwa sauti ng'hulu mbuli ya unzonza wauwonile.
Walonga, “Mulungu yamtambikile Mndewa yokwiza kwa twaga da Mulungu, tindiwalo kuulanga na ukulu kwa Mulungu!”
Baho Mafalisayo wayagwe wakalile muulunhu wamulongela Yesu, “Mfundiza, walagize wanahina zako wanyamale!”
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongeleni, wahanyamala wano, mabwe goguta.”
Yesu viyavikile behi na buga da Yelusalemu na viyawone wanhu wa buga dijo, kawalilila,
kalonga, “Maza lelo mwahajuwile mbuli zilondeka kugala tindiwalo! Lakini sambi zifisigwa mgameso genu!
Kwavija kipindi chokwiza, wanhu wakwihile vonda wakuzengele luwa, wokuzunguluka na kukusung'ha sung'ha kila mwambu.
Wokuhondahonda gweye na wanhu zako weli muuluwa wako. Kuduhu hata dibwe dimoja donda disigazigwe uchanha ya diyagwe, kwavija hukijuwile kipindi kiyezile Mulungu kukukombola!”
Abaho Yesu kengila Mng'anda ya Mulungu, kasonga kuwawinga wanhu wakalile wochuuza vinhu,
kawalongela, “Yandikigwa mna Gamaandiko Gang'alile, Mulungu kalonga, ‘Ng'anda yangu yokuwa ng'anda ya kupulila.’ Lakini mweye muitenda mhango ya wabavi!”
Kila siku Yesu kakala kofundiza Mng'anda ya Mulungu. Wakulu wa walava nhosa, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, na walangulizi wa wanhu walonda kumkoma,
lakini hawadahile bule kutenda avo, kwavija wanhu wose wakala womtegeleza goya, hawalondile kuswela mbuli.
Siku dimoja Yesu kakala Mng'anda ya Mulungu kowafundiza wanhu na kuwapetela Mbuli Inogile. Wakulu wa walava nhosa na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa hamoja na wavele weza,
wamulongela, “Tulongele, vino kotenda mbuli zino kwa udahi wa nani? Nani yakugwelele udahi uno?”
Yesu kawedika, “Beteni na niye niwauze mbuli imoja. Nongeleni,
vino udahi wa Yohana wa kubatiza ulawa kuulanga hebu kwa wanhu?”
Wagesa, “Tulonge choni? Twahalonga, ‘Ulawa kuulanga,’ kotuuza, ‘Habali, hamumtogole Yohana?’
Na twahalonga, ‘Ulawa kwa wanhu,’ lunhu lose luno lotutowa mabwe, kwavija wose wotogola kamba Yohana kakala mtula ndagu wa Mulungu.”
Avo wamwidika, “Hatujuwile kuulawile.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Na niye siwalongela bule notenda mbuli zino kwa udahi wa nani.”
Abaho Yesu kawalongela wanhu lusimo luno, “Kukala na munhu imoja yahandile mizabibu mumgunda wake. Kawakodisha walimaji, abaho kachola mwiisi iyagwe na kakala siku nyingi.
Msimu wa kubawa zabibu viuvikile, munhu ija kamtuma msang'hanaji wake yachole kwa walimaji wamgwelele zabibu. Lakini walimaji waja wamtowa msang'hanaji ija, wamuwinga makono gaiyeka.
Avo kamtuma msang'hanaji iyagwe, lakini walimaji wamtowa vivija na kumuliga, wamuwinga makono gaiyeka.
Abaho kamtuma msang'hanaji wa kadatu. Ino nayo walimaji wamulumiza, wamwasa kunze.
Abaho mwene mgunda ija kalonga, ‘Nhende choni? Nomtuma mwanangu nimnogele. Lamda ino womtegeleza!’
Lakini walimaji viwamone, wailongela, ‘Ino ayo muhazi wake. Tumkome na uhazi wake wokuwa wetu.’
Avo wamulava kunze ya mgunda uja, wamkoma.” Yesu kawauza, “Vino, mwene mgunda kowatenda choni waja walimaji?
Kokwiza na kuwakoma walimaji wose awo na kowakodisha walimaji wayagwe mgunda awo wa mizabibu.” Wanhu viwahulike mbuli ayo, walonga, “Bule! Sekeilawilile avo!”
Lakini Yesu kawalola, kawauza, “Vino, ulonzi uno fambulo jake choni? ‘Dibwe wadilemile wazengaji kamba hadifaya, digalamuka dibwe kulu da kutamanila kubanza gose!’
Munhu yoyose yonda yaikwale mdibwe ajo kobeneka beneka munhu donda dimulagalile domuhonda tipitipi.”
Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na wakulu wa walava nhosa wajuwa kamba lusimo ulo kakala kowafumbila wao. Avo bahaja walonda kumgoga Yesu, lakini wawadumba wanhu.
Avo wazahila kipindi kinogile. Wawahonga wanhu wayagwe waitende wanoga, wawatuma wamgeze Yesu kwa kumuuza, muladi wadahe kumgoga na kumgala kwa mkulu wa Lumi.
Wanhu awo wamulongela Yesu, “Mfundiza, tokujuwa gweye kofundiza na kulonga ukweli, wala hutonga ukulu wa munhu, lakini kofundiza nzila za Mulungu mna ikweli.
Tulongele, vino vinoga kulipa kodi kwa mndewa mkulu wa Lumi hebu havinogile bule?”
Lakini Yesu kaujuwa mwaka ubala wao, kawalongela,
“Ndagusileni isente. Vino, kihanga kino na twaga dino va nani?” Wamwidika, “Va mndewa mkulu wa Lumi.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Vinoga. Vinhu va mndewa wa Lumi mgweleleni mndewa wa Lumi, na va Mulungu mgweleleni Mulungu.”
Avo, mgameso ga wanhu hawadahile kumgoga kwa mbuli yoyose. Wakanganya ulonzi wake, wanyamala huupi.
Abaho Masadukayo, wanhu wolonga kamba kuduhu kuzilibuka kulawa kwa wafile. Wayagwe wamcholela Yesu, wamulongela,
“Mfundiza, Musa katwandikila, ‘Munhu yahafa na kuleka mwehe wake bila wana, ndugu yake munhu ayo kolondeka yamsole imgane, yamulelele ndugu yake yafile wana.’
Kukala na ndugu saba. Ija imkulu kasola mwehe, lakini kafa bila kulela wana.
Wakabili kamsola mtwanzi ija, lakini nayo kafa bila wana.
Abaho wa kadatu kamsola. Vivo ilawilile kwa wose saba wamsola, lakini wafa bila wana.
Kukimambukizo, mtwanzi ija nayo kafa.
Lelo mwiisiku ya kuzilibuka, mtwanzi ayo kokuwa mwehe wa nani? Kwavija kakala yasoligwe na wose saba.”
Yesu kawedika, “Wanhu wa mwiisi ino wosola na kusoligwa,
lakini waja wasaguligwe kuzilibuka kulawa kwa wafile na kuupata ugima wondawize, hawasola hebu kusoligwa.
Woigala na wasenga wa kuulanga, na hondawafe bule. Wao ni wana wa Mulungu kwavija wazilibuka kulawa kwa wafile.
Lakini kwa mbuli ya kuzilibuka kwa wanhu wafile, hata Musa kalagusa avo mna imbuli ya ikisolo kikwaka baho kamkema Mndewa, ‘Mulungu wa Abulahamu na Mulungu wa Isaka na Mulungu wa Yakobo.’
Heyo ni Mulungu wa wanhu wagima, siyo wa wanhu wafile. Kwavija kumwake heyo wose wagima.”
Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wayagwe walonga, “Mfundiza, kulonga goya!”
Avo hawadahile kumuuza mbuli ziyagwe.
Yesu kawauza, “Vino habali wanhu wolonga kamba Kilisito Mkombola kolawa mulukolo lwa Daudi?
Kwavija Daudi mwenyego kolonga mna ikitabu cha Zabuli, ‘Mndewa Mulungu kamulongela Mndewa wangu, Kala hano mwambu wangu wa mkono wa kudila,
mbaka niwahume wanhu wakwihile na niweke hasi mmagulu gako.’
Daudi mwenyego kamkema ‘Mndewa.’ Yodahika vilihi Kilisito Mkombola yalawe mulukolo lwa Daudi?”
Wanhu wose viwakalile womtegeleza, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake,
“Muiteganye na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa. Wao wonogelwa kwanga kuno wavala mikanzu mitali, na kulamusigwa na wanhu mna gamagulilo na kukala mna ivigoda va haulongozi mzing'anda za kumpula Mulungu na mna izinyimwili nyimwili.
Wowonela wagane kwa kusola vinhu vao, na kuitenda wanoga kwa kumpula Mulungu kwa kulonga mbuli nyingi! Awo nhaguso yao yobanza ng'hani!”
Yesu kenula meso gake kawona matajili viwogela nhunza zao mkigelo cha kulavila nhuza.
Abaho kamona mgane mkiwa imoja kagela sente mbili ndodo.
Yesu kalonga, “Nowalongela ukweli, mgane ino kalava kinhu kikulu kubanza wose.
Kwavija matajili walava vija visigale muutajili wao, lakini mgane ino hamoja na ukiwa wake, kalava vose viyotamanila muugima wake.”
Wanahina wayagwe wakala wolonga mbuli ya Ng'anda ya Mulungu, viizengigwe kwa mabwe ganogile na sadaka za wanhu zilavigwe kwa Mulungu. Lakini Yesu kalonga,
“Mogona gano gose! Siku yokwiza kuduhu dibwe dondadisigale uchanha ya diyagwe, mabwe gose gobomoligwa.”
Wamuuza, “Mfundiza, vinhu avo volawilila lini? Choni chondakitendeke kulagusa kipindi cha kulawilila vinhu avo cha mmabehi?”
Yesu kawedika, “Muiteganye, munhu sekeyawavizile. Kwavija wanhu wengi wokwiza kwa twaga jangu, na kulonga, ‘Niye ayo Kilisito!’ na ‘Kipindi cha mmabehi!’ Lakini sekemuwakweleleze.
Mwahahulika ng'hondo na zumozumo, sekemudumbe, kwavija vinhu avo volondeka tanhu vilawilile, lakini kimambukizo king'hali hakinavika.”
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Wanhu wa isi imoja woitowa na wanhu wa isi iyagwe, undewa umoja woitowa na undewa uyagwe.
Kila hanhu hokuwa na migudemo mikulu ya isi, lufilili lwa nzala na mitamu, volawilila vinhu va kugela bwembwe na vilaguso kulawa kuulanga.
Lakini gang'hali haganalawila gano gose, mogogigwa na kudununzigwa. Mogaligwa mzing'anda za kumpula Mulungu na kuwagodeka mkifungo, mogaligwa haulongozi wa wandewa na wakulu wa isi mbuli ya twaga jangu.
Kino chokuwa kipindi chenu kinogile cha kuwapetela wanhu Mbuli Inogile.
Gangamaleni, sekemunyawenyawe mbuli ya vija vonda mwidike,
kwavija niye nowagwaa ubala na mbuli za kulonga. Kuduhu munhu mna iwanhu wamwihileni yodaha kuwahuma hebu kulema chonda mulonge.
Mohindukigwa na tata zenu na mama zenu na ndugu zenu na wanhu wa mulukolo, na mbwiga zenu, na wayagwe vimwili wowakoma.
Wanhu wose wowehila mweye mbuli ya twaga jangu.
Lakini kuduhu hata luvili lumoja lwa mmapala genu londa lupotele.
Mwahagangamala, moihonya wenyego.
“Mwahajona buga da Yelusalemu dizungulukigwa na wakalizi, baho mujuwe kipindi cha kubanangigwa cha mmabehi.
Baho, waja weli Yudea wakimbilile kuvigongo, waja weli kudibuga walawanye, waja weli kumigunda sekewabwele kudibuga.
Kwavija kino acho kipindi cha nhaguso kutenda gaja gandikigwe galawilile.
Mna izisiku azo wogaya watwanzi wali na zinda na waja wokong'heza! Kwavija hokuwa na magayo ng'hani mwiisi, na ng'hasiliki ya Mulungu yokuwa mna iwanhu wano.
Wayagwe wokomigwa kwa panga, na wayagwe wosoligwa na kugodekigwa mziisi zose, na wanhu haweli Wayahudi wodihondahonda buga da Yelusalemu, mbaka kipindi chao vonda kimale.
“Hokuwa na vilaguso mna dizuwa, mna umwezi, na mna zinhondo. Isi zose zokuwa mna ukugaya, wodumba mvumo wa bahali na ng'humbi.
Wanhu wosinduka kwa bwembwe, kwa kubetela chondakilawilile mwiisi, kwavija vinhu vili kuulanga votigisika.
Kipindi acho womona Mwana wa Munhu kokwiza, mna ga mawingu kwa nguvu ng'hulu na ukulu.
Avo vinhu vino vahasonga kulawilila, mwime na mwinule mapala genu uchanha, kwavija kukomboligwa kwenu kwa mmabehi.”
Abaho Yesu kawalongela lusimo luno, “Geseni mbiki wa mtini na mibiki yose iyagwe.
Mwahagona majani gake gosonga kuzuka, mojuwa kamba vuli da mmabehi.
Vivija, mwahavona vinhu avo volawilila, mujuwe kamba Undewa wa Mulungu wa mmabehi.
“Nowalongeleni ukweli, wanhu wa lukolo luno hawafa wose mbaka gano gose galawilile.
Ulanga na isi vobita, lakini mbuli zangu hondazibite.
“Iteganyeni! Mizoyo yenu sekeigogigwe na unovu wa mwiisi ino, kukoligwa, na kugaya mbuli ya ugima uno, kwavija siku ayo yowasinhusa
kamba mtego. Kwavija yowezila wanhu wose wokala kila hanhu mwiisi.
Muiteganye na mupule siku zose, muladi mudahe kuhonyeka mna zimbuli zose zino zondazilawilile na kwima haulongozi wa Mwana wa Munhu.”
Kila siku Yesu kakala kofundiza Mng'anda ya Mulungu, na yahavika ichungulo, kacholaga kuna Ulugongo lwa Mizeituni na kakala kuko kilo kigima.
Imitootondo ng'hani wanhu wose wakala wochola kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu kumtegeleza.
Kipindi cha Nyimwili nyimwili da Magate hagageligwe Mela, kikemigwe Pasaka kikala behi.
Wakulu wa walava nhosa na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wakala wozahila nzila ya kumkoma Yesu, lakini wawadumba wanhu.
Mwenembago kamkumba Yuda Isikaliote, imoja wa wanahina longo na wabili.
Yuda kachola kwa wakulu wa walava nhosa na wakulu wa wakalizi wa Ng'anda ya Mulungu, kawalongela vija vonda yamuhinduke Yesu kumwao.
Nao wadeng'helela na waitogolela kumgwaa sente.
Yuda katogola, na kasonga kuzahila nzila ya kumgela Yesu mmakono gao kwa kinyelegezi.
Siku ya Magate hagageligwe Mela ivika. Siku ayo bofu da ng'hondolo da Pasaka dolavigwa nhosa.
Avo Yesu kawatuma Petulo na Yohana, kawalongela, “Choleni mkatutandile lujo lwa Pasaka tuje.”
Nao wamuuza, “Kolonda tukalutandile kwahi ulujo lwa Pasaka?”
Yesu kawedika, “Mwahengila kudibuga, mnzila momting'hana mbigalo yapapile nongo ya mazi. Mkwelelezeni mbaka mng'anda yonda yengile,
na mulongeleni mwene kae, ‘Mfundiza kokuuza, dakwahi gati dondanidile lujo lwa Pasaka niye na wanahina zangu?’
Nayo kowalagusila gati kulu da uchanha dihambigwe, mumo mtutandile kila kinhu.”
Wasegela wavika kila kinhu kamba vija Yesu viyawalongele, nao watanda lujo lwa Pasaka.
Saa viivikile, Yesu kakala muulujo na watumigwa zake.
Kawalongela, “Nisulukila ng'hani kuja lujo luno lwa Pasaka hamoja na mweye ning'hali sinadununzika!
Avo nowalongela, honda nije kabili mbaka vonda ilawilile Muundewa wa Mulungu.”
Abaho Yesu kasola kikasi cha divai, kamgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu, kalonga, “Soleni kino mung'wile mose.
Nowalongela kulawa sambi, honda ning'we divai ino mbaka vondawize Undewa wa Mulungu.”
Abaho kasola gate, kamgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu, kadibanzula, kawagwaa, kalonga, “Uno ulo lukuli lwangu, ulavigwe mbuli ya mweye. Tendeni vino kwa kung'humbuka niye.”
Vivija, viwamambukize kuja lujo lwa ichungulo, kawagwaa kikasi, kalonga, “Kino acho kikasi cha lagano da sambi dilagusigwa kwa damu yangu, ikwitika mbuli ya mweye.
“Lakini, loleni! Munhu yonihinduka kabahano na niye muulujo!
Mwana wa Munhu kofa kamba Mulungu viyalondile, lakini kogaya munhu ija yomuhinduka!”
Abaho wasonga kuiuza, nani viweli yonda yatende vivo.
Wanahina wakala woibamilila wao kwa wao nani yokoneka munhu mkulu kubanza wose.
Yesu kawalongela, “Wandewa wa wanhu haweli Wayahudi wana udahi kwa wanhu, walangulizi woikema, ‘Mbwiga wa wanhu.’
Lakini kumwenu mweye haili vivo bule, munhu mkulu kumwenu yawe kamba munhu mdodo, na mulangulizi yawe kamba msang'hanaji.
Vino, nani yeli munhu mkulu, ija yakalile mmeza koja, hebu ija yotanda ulujo? Ona, ayo ija yakalile mmeza koja. Lakini niye na hagati yenu kamba munhu yosang'hana.”
“Mweye mukala na niye kipindi chose cha kugezigwa kwangu,
kamba Tatangu viyanigwelele Undewa na niye nowagwaa Undewa awo.
Moja na kung'wa mmeza yangu mna Undewa wangu, na mokala mna ivigoda va Undewa kugatawala makabila ga Izilaeli longo na mabili.”
Yesu kalonga, “Simoni, Simoni! Tegeleza! Mwenembago kampula Mulungu kuwageza mweye, kuwabagula wanogile na wehile, kamba vija mfolaji viyobagula fuya na hemba.
Lakini nikupulila kwa Mulungu gweye Simoni, muladi kumtamanila kwako Mulungu sekekupotele. Na vondaunibwelele, uwagangamize ndugu zako.”
Petulo kamwidika, “Mndewa, notogola kugodekigwa na gweye mkifungo na kufa!”
Yesu kalonga, “Petulo, nokulongela ukweli, kilo cha lelo nzogolo yang'hali hanakwika, konibela miyanza midatu.”
Abaho Yesu kawauza wanahina zake, “Vino, kipindi kija viniwatumile kuno mduhu kibindo hebu mkoba hebu vilatu, muhungukiligwa na kinhu chochose?” Wamwidika, “Aka, hatuhungukiligwe na kinhu.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Lakini sambi, munhu yoyose yeli na kibindo, hebu mkoba yausole, na munhu yoyose yeliduhu panga yakachuuze koti jake yakagule.
Kwavija nowalongela Maandiko Gang'alile galongile, ‘Kekigwa mdibumbila dimoja na wabananzi,’ golondigwa galawilile. Nowalongela, gaja gandikigwe mbuli ya niye golawilila.”
Wanahina walonga, “Mndewa, lola, hano hana mapanga mabili!” Nayo kawedika, “Gofaya!”
Yesu kasegela kudibuga dija kachola kuna Ulugongo lwa Mizeituni, kamba viyazowele, na wanahina zake wamkweleleza.
Viyavikile kuko, kawalongela, “Mpuleni Mulungu, sekemwingile mna ukugezigwa.”
Abaho kawaleka, kachola utali wa kwasa dibwe, kafugama, kampula Mulungu.
Kalonga, “Tata, wahalonda, unisegezele kikasi kino cha madununzo. Siyo kamba vinilonda niye, lakini kamba viulonda gweye.”
Msenga wa kuulanga kamulawilila, kamgangamiza.
Kwa usungu mkulu uyakalile nao kampula ng'hani, mbaka fuguti dimulawa, fuguti jake dikala kamba madondwe ga damu golagala hasi.
Viyamambukize kumpula Mulungu, kabwela kwa wanahina zake, kawavika wokuluza kwavija wakala wadonhile mbuli ya kunyunyuwala.
Kawalongela, “Habali mowasa? Lamukeni mumpule Mulungu, sekemwingile mna ukugezigwa.”
Yesu viyakalile yang'hali kolonga, lunhu lwa wanhu luvika lulongozigwe na Yuda, imoja wa wanahina zake longo na wabili. Yuda kamcholela Yesu kamulamusa kwa kumnonela.
Lakini Yesu kamulongela, “Yuda, komuhinduka Mwana wa Munhu kwa kumnonela?”
Wanahina wakalile hamoja na Yesu viwonile gaja gonda galawilile, wauza, “Mndewa, tuwakanhe na mapanga getu?”
Imoja wao kambiga kwa panga msang'hanaji wa Mkulu wa walava nhosa na kamkanha digwiti da mkono wa kudila.
Lakini Yesu kalonga, “Bule sekemutende avo!” Kadikwasa digwiti da munhu ija, kamuhonya.
Abaho Yesu kawalongela wakulu wa walava nhosa na wakulu wa wakalizi wa Ng'anda ya Mulungu na wavele wezile kumgoga, “Habali, mwiza kungoga kwa mapanga na malungu, kamba nambavi?
Siku zose ng'hala na mweye Mng'anda ya Mulungu hamngogile bule. Lakini kino acho kipindi chenu cha kusang'hana, muundewa wa ziza.”
Baho wamgoga Yesu, wengila nayo mng'anda ya mkulu wa walava nhosa. Petulo kamkweleleza kwa kutali.
Wabwinha moto hagati hana uluwa, wakala hamoja na Petulo kakala hamoja nao.
Msang'hanaji imoja wa kitwanzi viyamone Petulo kakala aho haumoto, kamulola bunhuu, kalonga, “Vivija munhu ino kakala hamoja na Yesu!”
Lakini Petulo kabela, kalonga, “Gwee, mtwanzi gwe, simjuwile bule!”
Hamwande kidogo munhu iyagwe kamona Petulo, kalonga, “Vivija na gweye kwa imoja wao!” Lakini Petulo kamwidika “Gwee munhu gwe, siyo niye!”
Vidibitile saa dimoja, munhu iyagwe kagangamiza ng'hani, “Kweli munhu ino kakala hamoja na Yesu, kwavija nayo mwenekae wa Galilaya!”
Lakini Petulo kamwidika, “Munhu gweye, sikijuwile kiulonga!” Bahaja, viyakalile yang'hali kolonga, nzogolo keka.
Mndewa kahinduka, kamulola Petulo, nayo Petulo kakumbuka Mndewa viyamulongele, “Kilo cha lelo nzogolo yang'hali hanakwika, konibela miyanza midatu.”
Petulo kalawa kunze kalila kwa usungu.
Wanhu wakalile womkaliza Yesu, wakala womzeha na kumtowa,
viwamgubike gameso na wamuuza, “Lagula! Nani yakutowile?”
Vivija walonga mbuli ziyagwe nyingi za kumuliga.
Imitondo yake, wavele, wakulu wa walava nhosa na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa waiting'hana hamoja na Yesu kagaligwa mkitala acho.
Walonga, “Tulongele! Vino, gweye ayo Kilisito Mkombola?” Yesu kawedika, “Nahawalongela, honda munitogole bule,
na nahawauza mbuli, honda mwidike bule.
Lakini kusongela sambi, Mwana wa Munhu kokala muukulu mwambu wa mkono wa kudila wa Mulungu yeli na Udahi.”
Wose walonga, “Vino gweye kwa Mwana wa Mulungu?” Yesu kawedika, “Molonga, iyo niye.”
Walonga, “Hatulonda usindila uyagwe! Tweye wenyego tumuhulika viyalongile!”
Abaho wanhu wose wenuka, wamgala Yesu kwa Pilato,
wasonga kumulavila vitala, walonga, “Tumvika munhu ino kowagiza wanhu zetu, kowagomesa wanhu sekewalipe kodi kwa mndewa mkulu wa Lumi na koikema heyo ayo Kilisito Mkombola na koikema Mndewa.”
Pilato kamuuza, “Gweye ayo Mndewa wa Wayahudi?” Yesu kamwidika, “Ona, vivo viulonga,”
Abaho Pilato kawalongela wakulu wa walava nhosa na ulunhu lwa wanhu, “Siyonile mbuli ya kumtagusa munhu ino.”
Lakini wao wagangamiza ng'hani, walonga, “Kwa mafundizo gake kowading'hula wanhu wose wa mwiisi ya Yudea. Kasongela Galilaya na sambi keza hano.”
Pilato viyahulike avo kauza, “Vino munhu ino mwenekae wa Galilaya?”
Viyajuwile kamba Yesu kalawa mwiisi ilongozigwa na Helode, kamgala kwa Helode, yakalile Yelusalemu kipindi acho.
Helode viyamone Yesu kadeng'helela ng'hani, kwavija kahulika mbuli zake na toka mwaka kakala yolonda kumona. Kakala kobetela kona unzonza utendigwa na Yesu.
Avo Helode kamuuza Yesu mbuli nyingi, lakini hamwidike mbuli.
Wakulu wa walava nhosa na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa walawilila kuulongozi wamulavila vitala Yesu vikulu vikulu.
Helode na wakalizi zake wamzeha Yesu na kumwehula, abaho wamvaza kiwalo cha undewa wambweza kwa Pilato.
Kipindi kikija Helode na Pilato wakala mbwiga, kwavija ako umwaka wakala waihile.
Pilato kawakema hamoja wakulu wa walava nhosa, walangulizi na wanhu,
kawalongela, “Mumgala munhu ino kumwangu mulonga kakala kowagiza wanhu. Lelo nimuuza mgameso genu na siyonile mbuli yoyose ihile yumumtagusile.
Vivija Helode hachonile kiyabanange, lekaavo kambweza kumwetu. Kwavija kuduhu mbuli yoyose yaitendile munhu ino imtende yakomigwe.
Avo nolagiza yatoigwe mbalati na kumuleka yachole.”
Chahavikaga kipindi cha Nyimwili nyimwili ya Pasaka, Pilato kalondeka yamfungulile mfungwa imoja.
Lunhu lose lukemelela, “Mkome munhu ayo! Tufungulile Balaba!”
Balaba kakala yagodekigwe mkifungo mbuli ya kuwading'hula wanhu kudibuga, na mbuli ya ukomaji.
Pilato kalonda kumulekesa Yesu, avo kalulongela ulunhu kabili.
Lakini wagendelela kukemelela, “Muwambe mumsalaba! Muwambe mumsalaba!”
Pilato kawalongela mwanza wa kadatu, “Vino, mbuli gani ihile yaitendile munhu ino? Siyonile mbuli yoyose yaitendile munhu ino imtende yakomigwe! Nolagiza yatoigwe mbalati na kumulekesa.”
Wagendelela kukemelela ng'hani, wolonga Yesu yawambigwe mumsalaba, kukimambukizo nyangi zao zihuma.
Avo Pilato katogola kija kiwalondile kumtendela Yesu.
Kamfungulila munhu iwamulondile, ija yagodekigwe mbuli ya kuwading'hula wanhu na ukomaji, na kamgela Yesu mmakono gao wamtendele kamba viwalondile.
Wakalizi wamulongoza Yesu, viwakalile womgala, wamting'hana munhu imoja kulawa Kilene, twaga jake Simoni, kakala kolawa kumgunda, wamgoga wamdikwa umsalaba, na wamulagiza yaupape kukisogo cha Yesu.
Lunhu mkulu lwa wanhu lumkweleleza, mmwanza awo wakala watwanzi wayagwe wakalile womulilila na kuiyalala.
Yesu kahinduka kawalongela, “Mweye kina mama wa Yelusalemu! Sekemunililile niye, lakini ililileni wenyego na wanenu.
Kwavija kipindi chokwiza wanhu wolonga, ‘Wamweda watwanzi hawalelile wana na hawakong'heze!’
Kipindi acho wanhu wovilongela vigongo, ‘Tulagalile!’ na wovilongela visugulu, ‘Tufiseni!’
kwavija kamba wanhu wotenda mbuli zino kipindi mbiki ung'hali mbisi, vino yokuwaze kipindi mbiki wahanyala?”
Wanhu wabili wayagwe wakalile wabananzi, wagaligwa wakomigwe hamoja na Yesu.
Viwavikile hanhu hakemigwe, “Fumvu da Pala,” wamuwamba Yesu mumsalaba, hamoja na waja wabananzi wabili, imoja mwambu wa mkono wake wa kudila na iyagwe mwambu wa mkono wake wa kumoso.
Yesu kalonga, “Tata, gela kumgongo nzambi zao, kwavija hawakijuwa kiwotenda.” Waigolela viwalo vake kwa kubwanha simbi.
Wanhu wema aho wolola, kuno wakulu wa Wayahudi womzeha Yesu, walonga, “Kawakombola wayagwe, leka yaikombole mwenyego, kamba heyo ayo Kilisito, yasaguligwe na Mulungu!”
Vivija wakalizi wamzeha, wamcholela wamgwaa divai ya ugwadu,
kuno wolonga, “Kamba gweye kwa Mndewa wa Wayahudi, ikombole mwenyego!”
Uchanha ya msalaba wake wandika vino, “Ino ayo Mndewa wa Wayahudi.”
Imoja wa waja wabananzi yawambigwe mumsalaba, kamuliga Yesu, kalonga, “Vino gweye siyo Kilisito Mkombola? Ikombole mwenyego na tweye!”
Lakini ija iyagwe kamkomhokela miyage, kalonga, “Vino, gweye humdumba Mulungu bule? Na gweye kutagusigwa kamba heyo.
Gweye na niye totagusigwa goya, kwavija tobokela fungu da sang'hano zetu, lakini munhu ino hatendile mbuli yoyose ihile.”
Abaho munhu ija kamulongela Yesu, “Yesu, ung'humbuke wahengila Muundewa wako!”
Yesu kamulongela, “Nokulongela ukweli, lelo kokuwa na niye Paladiso.”
Ikala saa sita imisi, ziza diigubika isi yose mbaka saa tisa,
kwavija zuwa dileka kumwemwesa. Panziya da Ng'anda ya Mulungu digola gati da Ng'anda ya Mulungu na hanhu hong'ala ng'hani, didegeka mhande mbili.
Yesu kalila kwa sauti ng'hulu, “Tata, noika mmakono gako loho yangu!” Viyalongile avo, kafa.
Mkulu wa wakalizi wa Lumi viyagone gago galawilile, kamgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu, kalonga, “Munhu ino kweli kakala yanogile!”
Wanhu wose wakalile waiting'hane aho kulola mbuli azo, viwagone gago galawilile, wabwela ukayao, kuno wotowa mhambaga zao kwa kunyunyuwala.
Wanhu wose wamjuwile Yesu na watwanzi wamuwinzile kulawa Galilaya, wema kwa kutali wolola mbuli azo.
Kukala na munhu imoja twaga jake Yusufu, munhu wa Mkitala, kakala munhu yanogile na kutenda goyolonda Mulungu.
Keza kulawa Yudea buga da Alimataya na kakala kobeta kwiza kwa Undewa wa Mulungu. Hamoja kakala imoja wa wakulu wa mkitala, hagatogole gaja gawalondile wayage na gaja gawakalile wotenda.
Kachola kwa Pilato, kampula lukuli lwa Yesu.
Abaho kaluhumulusa hasi ulukuli, kaluzingiliza sitili, kalwika mdipanga disongoligwe mdibwe, dikalile hadinazikiligwa munhu.
Ikala ijumaa, siku ayo ikala siku ya kuitanda siku ya Kubwihila ikalile behi kusonga.
Watwanzi waja wamkweleleze Yesu kulawa Galilaya wachola na Yusufu, na wajona dipanga na vija vilwikigwe lukuli lwa Yesu.
Abaho wabwela ukae, watanda mavuta gonung'hila goya walubake lukuli lwa Yesu. Mna isiku ya Kubwihila wabwihila kamba Malagizo ga Musa vigalagize.
Jumapili imitootondo ng'hani, watwanzi waja wachola kudipanga, kuno wasola mavuta gonung'hila goya gawatandile.
Wadivika idibwe dibimbilisigwa hamgwazo wa umulomo wa dipanga,
avo wengila mdipanga, lakini hawaluwone lukuli lwa Mndewa Yesu.
Wema aho kuno woikanganya mbuli ayo, bahaja wanhu wabili wavalile viwalo vizelu chuwee wema behi nao.
Kuno wamema bwembwe, watwanzi waja waidulika hasi, wanhu waja wawalongela, “Habali momzahila munhu yeli mgima mna iwanhu wafile?
Hano kahaduhu, kazilibuka. Kumbukeni vija viyawalongele viyakalile Galilaya.
‘Mwana wa Munhu kolondeka yageligwe mmakono ga wanhu wotenda nzambi, awo womuwamba mumsalaba, na siku ya kadatu kozilibuka!’ ”
Baho watwanzi waja wazikumbuka mbuli zake,
Walawa mdipanga, na wawalongela wanahina longo na imoja mbuli zose zino na wanhu wayagwe.
Watwanzi awo wakala, Malia Magidalena, Yoana na Malia mamake Yakobo, awo hamoja na watwanzi wayagwe wawalongela watumigwa mbuli azo.
Lakini watumigwa wagesa kamba mbuli zilongigwe na iwatwanzi waja za ubozi, na hawawatogolele bule.
Lakini Petulo kenuka na kakimbila mbaka kudipanga, kasungulila mgati, kayona sitili iiyeka. Abaho kabwela ukae kuno kokanganya kija kilawilile.
Siku didija wanahina wabili wa Yesu wakala wochola kuna ikijiji kimoja kikemigwe Emau, kikala utali wa kilometa longo na imoja kulawa Yelusalemu,
wakala wosimulila usheha wa mbuli zose zilawilile.
Viwakalile wosimulila, Yesu mwenyego kakwesa behi kailongoza nao.
Wamona, lakini wafisigwa sekewamjuwe.
Yesu kawalongela, “Mosimulila usheha gani kuno mogenda?” Nao wema wanyamala tuluu, na vihanga vao vogela bazi kwa kunyunyuwala.
Imoja wao yakemigwe Kileopa, kamuuza, “Vino, gweye wiiyeka ayo huli mwenekae wa Yelusalemu hujuwile mbuli zilawilile kuko sambi sambi?”
Kawauza, “Mbuli gani?” Nao wamwidika, “Mbuli zimulawilile Yesu wa Nazaleti, munhu ayo kakala mtula ndagu wa Mulungu na kakala yokoneka mgameso ga Mulungu na wanhu wose kamba kana udahi kwa kila kinhu kiyalongile na kiyatendile.
Wakulu wa walava nhosa na walangulizi zetu wamgela mmakono yatagusigwe kufa, na yawambigwe mumsalaba.
Na tweye tutamanila kamba heyo ayo yonda yawakombole wanhu wa Izilaeli! Lakini lelo siku ya kadatu toka zilawilile mbuli zino.
Watwanzi wayagwe wa mdibumbila jetu watukanganya, imitootondo wachola kuna dipanga,
lakini hawaluvikile lukuli lwake. Wabwela walonga wawona wasenga wa kuulanga wawalongela kamba, Yesu mgima.
Abaho wanhu wayagwe wa mkibumbila chetu wachola kuna dipanga na wavika vivija viwawalongele watwanzi awo, lakini hawamonile bule.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mweye mwa wabozi, na mizoyo yenu midala kutogola gose galongigwe na watula ndagu wa Mulungu!
Vino, halondigwa Kilisito Mkombola yadununzike kamba avo, abaho yengile muukulu wake?”
Yesu kawasimulila gaja galongigwe na Maandiko Gang'alile mbuli yake mwenyego, kusongela mna ivitabu va Musa na maandiko ga watula ndagu wose wa Mulungu.
Viwavikile behi na ikijiji kiwakalile wochola, Yesu kaitenda kamba kogendelela na mwanza,
lakini wamgoma ng'hani, wolonga, “Ukale na tweye, zuwa dihonga na ziza dokwingila.” Avo kagenda na kukala nao.
Kakala hasi na kuja nao, kasola gate, kamgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu, abaho kadibanzula kawagwaa.
Bahaja, meso gao gagubuligwa na wamjuwa, lakini kapotela mgameso gao.
Wailongela, “Vino, mizoyo yetu hayakile na kimuhemuhe vitukalile mnzila kotulongela na kotusimulila Maandiko Gang'alile?”
Bahaja wenuka wabweleganya Yelusalemu, kuko wawavika wanahina longo na imoja wakala hamoja na wanhu wayagwe,
wolonga, “Mndewa kazilibuka kweli! Kamulawilila Simoni!”
Wanhu waja wawasimulila kija kiwalawilile mnzila, na vija viwamjuwile Yesu viyadibanzule gate.
Wanhu waja viwakalile wang'hali wowasimulila mbuli azo, bahaja Yesu kema hagati yao, kawalongela, “Zihozeni.”
Wasinhuka na kudumba wagesa wokona mzimu.
Lakini Yesu kawalongela, “Habali modumba na kunyawanyawa?
Loleni makono gangu na magulu gangu, na mojuwa kamba ayo niye. Mbabaseni mojuwa, kwavija mzimu waduhu lukuli na mizege, kamba vimnyona niye.”
Viyalongile avo, kawalagusila makono gake na magulu gake.
Wakala wang'hali hawatogola, kwavija wakala wodeng'helela na kukanganya, avo Yesu kawauza, “Mna kinhu chochose chakuja hano?”
Wamgwaa kihande cha somba yakokigwe,
kakisola, kakija mgameso gao.
Abaho kawalongela, “Mbuli zino azo ziniwalongeleni ving'halile hamoja na mweye, kamba gose gandikigwe mbuli ya niye mna Gamalagizo ga Musa, na gandikigwe na watula ndagu wa Mulungu, na Zabuli galondeka galawilile.”
Baho kazigubula nzewele zao wadahe kugajuwa Maandiko Gang'alile.
Kawalongela, “Vino avo yandikigwe, Kilisito Mkombola kolondeka yadununzike na siku da kadatu kozilibuka kulawa kwa wafile,
kwa twaga jake, usenga wopetigwa kwa wanhu wa isi zose, kusongela Yelusalemu, muladi waleke nzambi zao na Mulungu yazigele kumgongo.
Na mweye awo wasindila wa mbuli azo.
Na niye nowagalila ija iyalongile Tatangu. Lakini beteni kudibuga mbaka nguvu vonda iwezileni kulawa uchanha.”
Abaho kawalongoza kunze kudibuga mbaka Betania, ako kenula makono gake, kawatambikila.
Viyakalile kowatambikila, kawaleka kagaligwa kuulanga.
Wamtambikila na wabwela Yelusalemu kwa deng'ho kulu,
kipindi chose wakala Mng'anda ya Mulungu na kumgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu.
Baho kunaichanduso vinhu vose ving'hali havinaumbigwa kukala imoja yakemigwe Mbuli. Ayo kakala na Mulungu na ayo kakala Mulungu.
Toka kunaichanduso Mbuli kakala hamoja na Mulungu.
Kubitila heyo, Mulungu kaumba vinhu vose. Kuduhu kinhu chochose kiumbigwe bila heyo.
Mgati mmwake mumo ukalile mwanduso wa ugima, na ugima awo ukala mulenge kwa wanhu.
Mulenge awo wokwaka mdiziza, najo ziza hadiudaha kuuzima bule.
Kulawilila munhu imoja yatumigwe na Mulungu, twaga jake Yohana.
Ayo keza kuwalongela wanhu mbuli ya umulenge muladi wanhu wose wahulike na watogole.
Heyo mwenyego hakalile awo umulenge bule, lakini keza kuwalongela wanhu mbuli ya umulenge.
Uno ukala mulenge kweli, mulenge wizile mwiisi kuwamwemwesela wanhu wose.
Mbuli kakala mwiisi, na kubitila heyo Mulungu kaumba isi yose, lakini wanhu wa mwiisi hawamjuwile bule.
Keza mwiisi yake mwenyego, lakini wanhu zake mwenyego hawambokele bule.
Lakini waja wambokele na kumtogola, Mulungu kawatogolela kuwa wanage.
Si wana wa Mulungu bule kwa kuleligwa, hebu viwolonda wanhu hebu kwa udahi wa mbigalo yoyose, lakini Mulungu mwenyego heyo Tatao.
Na heyo yakemigwe Mbuli kawa munhu, kakala hamoja na tweye, na tweye tuwona ukulu wake, ukulu uyagweleligwe na Mulungu Tatake, nayo kamema ng'hekewa na ukweli.
Yohana kalava usindila uno yolonga, “Ino ayo iniwalongeleni kokwiza kukisogo changu yeli mkulu kubanza niye, kwavija kakala kuko toka umwaka niye sinavumbuka.”
Kwa ng'hekewa imemile iyalinayo, tweye wose tumweda ng'hani.
Mulungu kalava Malagizo kubitila Musa, lakini Yesu Kilisito katugalila ng'hekewa na ukweli.
Kuduhu munhu yamonile Mulungu, lakini Imwana yaiyeka yaigalile na Mulungu na kuilumba na Tata, ayo yatutendile tumjuwe Mulungu.
Wakulu wa Wayahudi kudibuga da Yelusalemu wawatuma walava nhosa na Walawi wachole kwa Yohana wakamuuze, “Gweye kwa nani?”
Yohana halemile bule kuwedika, lakini kalonga fulu ipile, “Niye sili Kilisito Mkombola.”
Wamuuza, “Gweye kwa nani? Kwa Eliya?” Yohana kawedika, “Ka, sili Eliya bule.” Wamuuza, “Gweye kwa mtula ndagu wa Mulungu?” Kawedika, “Ka, sili niye.”
Wamulongela, “Tulongele, gweye kwa nani? Tolonda tukawedike waja watutumile. Vino gweye mwenyego koikemaze?”
Yohana kawedika kwa kulonga gaja gayalongile mtula ndagu wa Mulungu Isaya, “Niye na ‘imoja yokema kuluwala. Tendeni goya nzila ya Mndewa, goloseni nzila yonda yabite!’ ”
Wasenga waja watumigwe na kibumbila cha Mafalisayo
wamuuza Yohana, “Kumbe gweye huli Kilisito, hebu huli Eliya, hebu huli mtula ndagu wa Mulungu, habali kobatiza wanhu?”
Yohana kawedika, “Niye nowabatiza mweye kwa mazi, lakini kabaho imoja kema hagati yenu, mweye hamumjuwile bule.
Kokwiza kukisogo changu, lakini niye sifaya hata kudohola nzabi za vilatu vake.”
Mbuli zose zino zilongigwa ako Betania mwambu wa kudilawila zuwa wa lwanda lwa Yolidani, kuyakalile Yohana yobatiza wanhu.
Imitondo yake Yohana kamona Yesu komwizila, kalonga, “Loleni, Mwanang'hondolo wa Mulungu yosegeza nzambi za wanhu wa mwiisi!
Ino ayo inilongile mbuli zake, ‘Kokwiza munhu kukisogo changu yeli munhu mkulu kubanza nene, kwavija kakala kuko toka umwaka niye sinavumbuka.’
Niye mwenyego simjuwile viyali, lakini niza kuwabatiza kwa mazi muladi kutenda yajuwigwe na wanhu wa Izilaeli.”
Yohana kalava usindila kwa kulonga, “Nimona Loho Yang'alile kohumuluka kuulanga kamba huwa na kwima uchanha yake.
Niye nikala sijuwile kamba ayo heyo, lakini Mulungu, yanhumile kuwabatiza kwa mazi kanongela, ‘Munhu yonda umone Loho Yang'alile komuhumulukila kulawa kuulanga na kwima uchanha kwa munhu ayo, heyo ayo yonda yawabatize kwa Loho Yang'alile.’ ”
Abaho Yohana kalonga, “Nichona kinhu acho, na nowalongeleni ukweli, heyo ayo Mwana wa Mulungu.”
Imitondo yake, Yohana kakala kabili hanhu aho na wanahina zake wabili.
Viyamone Yesu kobita, kalonga, “Loleni, ino ayo Mwanang'hondolo wa Mulungu!”
Wanahina awo wabili viwamuhulike Yohana kolonga avo, wamkweleleza Yesu.
Yesu kahinduka, kawona womkweleleza, kawauza, “Mozahila choni?” Wamwidika, “Labi, kokala kwahi?” Labi fambulo jake, “Mfundiza.”
Kawalongela, “Izoni mulole.” Avo wachola hamoja nayo na kuhona hayakalile yokala. Ikala saa kumi ya imisi, na wasinda nayo.
Andeleya, ndugu yake Simoni Petulo, kakala imoja wa awo iwabili wamuhulike Yohana na kumkweleleza Yesu.
Bahaja Andeleya viyamone Simoni ndugu yake, kamulongela, “Tumona Masihi.” Masihi fambulo jake “Kilisito Mkombola.”
Abaho Andeleya kamgala Simoni kwa Yesu. Yesu kamulola, kamulongela, “Twaga jako Simoni mwanage Yohana, lakini kokemigwa Kefa.” Kefa kwa Kigiliki Petulo, na Petulo fambulo jake dibwe.
Imitondo yake Yesu kachola isi ya Galilaya, kamvika Filipo, kamulongela, “Ng'holeleze!”
Filipo kakala mwenekae wa Betisaida kudibuga diwakalile Andeleya na Petulo.
Filipo kamvika Nasanaeli, kamulongela, “Tumona munhu ayo yandikigwe na Musa mna ikitabu cha Malagizo, na watula ndagu wa Mulungu wengi wandika mbuli zake. Heyo Yesu mwanage Yusufu, mwenekae wa Nazaleti.”
Nasanaeli kamuuza, “Vino mbuli yoyose inogile yodaha kulawa kudibuga da Nazaleti?” Filipo kamwidika, “Izo ulole.”
Yesu viyamone Nasanaeli komwizila, kasimulila, “Ino Mwiizilaeli kweli, mgati yake mduhu uvizi!”
Nasanaeli kamuuza, “Vino gweye kunjuwaze?” Yesu kamwidika, “Filipo yang'hali hanakukema viukalile hasi hana umbiki wa mtini, niye nikona.”
Nasanaeli kedika, “Mfundiza, gweye kwa Mwana wa Mulungu! Gweye kwa Mndewa wa Izilaeli!”
Yesu kamulongela Nasanaeli, “Vino kotogola kwavija nikulongela nikona viukalile hana umbiki wa mtini? Kokwiza kuvona vinhu vingi ng'hani kubanza vino!”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongeleni ukweli, mouwona ulanga ugubuka na wasenga wa kuulanga wokwela na kuhumuluka uchanha ya Mwana wa Munhu.”
Siku da kadatu kukala na zengele kudibuga da Kana mwiisi ya Galilaya. Mamake Yesu kakala aho,
Yesu na wanahina zake vivija wagonekigwa kudizengele.
Divai viimalile, mamake kamulongela Yesu, “Divai imala.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Mama, habali unongela vivo. Saa yangu hainavika.”
Abaho mamake Yesu kawalongela waja wasang'hanaji, “Chochose chonda yawalongele sang'haneni.”
Kukala na nongo sita za mabwe, kila nongo yomema madumu matano, zikigwa aho kamba viikalile mila ya Wayahudi ya kunawa.
Yesu kawalongela awo iwasang'hanaji, “Memezeni mazi nongo zose.” Nao wazimemeza mbaka uchanha.
Abaho Yesu kawalongela, “Deheni kidogo mumgalile mkulu wa dizengele.” Nao wamgalila.
Mkulu wa dizengele viyagalanzile gaja gamazi, gagaluka divai. Hajuwile kuilawile, lakini waja iwasang'hanaji wadehile gamazi wajuwa. Avo mkulu wa dizengele kamkema ayo yosola mwehe,
kamulongela, “Kila munhu kagolaga divai inogile hana ichanduso. Wanhu wagonekigwe wahang'wa ng'hani, kolava divai igwaduke wang'we, lakini gweye kuika divai inogile mbaka sambi!”
Yesu kasang'hana unzonza uno wa ichanduso ako Kana mwiisi ya Galilaya. Kuko kalagusa ukulu wake, na wanahina zake wamtogola.
Vigabitile gago, Yesu hamoja na mamake, ndugu zake, na wanahina zake wachola kudibuga da Kapelinaumu wakala aho siku ndodo.
Siku da Pasaka ya Wayahudi dikala behi, avo Yesu kachola Yelusalemu.
Kawavika wanhu Mng'anda ya Mulungu wochuuza ng'ombe, ng'hondolo, njiwa, na wayagwe wakala mmeza wovunja sente.
Yesu kabota balati da luzabi, kawawinga wose ng'hondolo, ng'ombe, na vivija kazibidula meza za wanhu wakalile wovunja sente na kuzipwililisa sente zao.
Abaho kawalongela wose wakalile wochuuza njiwa, “Wasegezeni hano! Lekeni kuitenda ng'anda ya Tatangu kamba gulilo!”
Wanahina zake wakumbuka kamba Maandiko Gang'alile golonga, “Unogelwa wangu wa ng'anda yako yakutambikila, wosoma mgati mmwangu kamba moto.”
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wamuuza Yesu, “Vino unzonza gani wonda utende kutulagusila gweye kuna udahi wa kutenda gano gose?”
Yesu kawedika, “Tuleni Ng'anda ino ya Mulungu, na niye noizenga kabili kwa siku ndatu.”
Wayahudi wamuuza, “Ng'anda ino ya Mulungu izengigwa kwa miyaka malongo mane na sita. Vino, gweye koizenga kwa siku ndatu?”
Lakini Ng'anda ya Mulungu iyakalile yolonga Yesu ikala lukuli lwake.
Viyazilibuke kulawa kwa wafile, wanahina zake wakumbuka kamba Yesu kawalongela mbuli ayo, wanahina zake wagatogola Maandiko Gang'alile na gaja gayalongile Yesu.
Yesu viyakalile kudibuga da Yelusalemu kuna inyimwili nyimwili ya Pasaka, wanhu wengi wamtogola viwonile mbuli nyingi za unzonza ziyatendile.
Lakini Yesu kakala hawatamanila bule, kwavija kawajuwa wanhu wose.
Hailondeke munhu yoyose yamulongele mbuli yao, kwavija mwenyego kagajuwa gakalile mmizoyo yao.
Kukala na mulangulizi imoja wa Wayahudi twaga jake Nikodemo, kakala imoja mna ikibumbila cha Mafalisayo.
Siku dimoja ikilo kamcholela Yesu na kumulongela, “Labi, tojuwa gweye kwa mfundiza kutumigwa na Mulungu. Kwavija kuduhu munhu yodaha kutenda unzonza kamba viutenda gweye kamba Mulungu hali hamoja nayo.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Nokulongela ukweli, kuduhu munhu yodaha kuwona Undewa wa Mulungu bila kuleligwa mwanza wa kabili.”
Nikodemo kamuuza, “Vino munhu mkulu kodahaze kuleligwa mwanza wa kabili? Havidahika bule munhu mkulu kwingila mna iinda ya mamake na kuleligwa mwanza wa kabili!”
Yesu kamwidika, “Nokulongela ukweli, kuduhu munhu yodaha kwingila Muundewa wa Mulungu bila kuleligwa kwa mazi na kwa Loho Yang'alile.
Munhu koleligwa kwa lukuli na tatake na mamake, lakini koleligwa kiloho na Loho Yang'alile.
Sekeukanganye kwavija nokulongela molondeka mweye mose muleligwe mwanza wa kabili.
Beho dobuma kokose kudilonda, kodihulika, lakini hudijuwa dolawa kwahi hebu dochola kwahi. Vivo viili kwa munhu yoyose yaleligwe na Loho Yang'alile.”
Nikodemo kauza, “Avo gano godahikaze?”
Yesu kamwidika, “Gweye kwa mfundiza mkulu wa Waizilaeli, huijuwile vilihi mbuli ino?
Nokulongela ukweli, tolonga kija tukijuwile tosimulila acho tuchonile, lakini haduhu munhu yoyose kumwenu yotogola usenga wetu.
Hamnhogola viniwalongeleni mbuli za mumuno mwiisi, vino monhogolaze nahawalongela mbuli za ako kuulanga?
Kuduhu munhu yoyose yacholile kuulanga ila Mwana wa Munhu, yezile kulawa kuko.”
Kamba Musa viyamwinule mumbiki nyoka wa shaba kuja kuluwala, vivo vonda yenuligwe Mwana wa Munhu,
avo munhu yoyose yonda yamtogole yawe na ugima wa mazuwa gose.
Avo, Mulungu kawanogela wanhu wa mwiisi mbaka kamulava Mwanage yeli yaiyeka, muladi munhu yoyose yonda yamtogole sekeyapotele lakini yawe na ugima wa mazuwa gose.
Mulungu hamtumile mwanage yeze mwiisi yawataguse wanhu, lakini kamtuma yeze kuwakombola.
“Wanhu wose wonda wamtogole Mwana honda watagusigwe bule, lakini wose womulema watagusigwa mwaka, kwavija hawamtogole Mwana yaiyeka yanogeligwe na Mulungu.
Vino vivo nhaguso vonda iwe, mulenge wiza mwiisi, lakini wanhu wanogelwa na ziza kubanza mulenge, kwavija gago goyosang'hana ganyolodoka.
Wanhu wose wotenda gehile hawaulonda mulenge na haweza kumulenge, kwavija hawalonda gehile gao gowotenda goneke.
Lakini wanhu wotenda ganogile wokwiza kumulenge muladi woneke wosang'hana goyolonda Mulungu.”
Vigabitile gago, Yesu na wanahina zake wachola kuna iisi ya Yudea, kuko kakala nao siku ndodo na kabatiza wanhu.
Nayo Yohana kakala kobatiza ako Ainoni, siyo kutali ng'hani kulawa Salimu, kwavija hanhu aho kukala na mazi mengi. Wanhu wakala womcholela, nayo kawabatiza.
Gano gose gatendeka Yohana yang'hali hanagodekigwa mkifungo.
Wanahina wayagwe wa Yohana wasonga kuibamilila na Muyahudi mbuli ya jadi ya kunawa ili wamtambikile Mulungu.
Avo wamcholela Yohana na kumulongela, “Mfundiza, vino komkumbuka munhu ija yuukalile nayo mwambu wa kudilawila zuwa wa lwanda lwa Yolidani, ija yuulongile mbuli zake? Hambe sambi kobatiza na kila munhu komcholela!”
Yohana kawedika, “Kuduhu munhu yodaha kuwa na kinhu chochose kamba Mulungu hamgwelele.
Mweye wenyego awo wasindila zangu kamba nonga, ‘Niye sili Kilisito Mkombola, lakini nhumigwa nimulongolele.’
Mtwanzi yosoligwa ni wa mbigalo yosola. Lakini mbwiga wa mbigalo yosola, yemile na kutegeleza, kodeng'helela yahahulika sauti ya mbigalo yosola. Vivo ili kumwangu, deng'ho jangu divika.
Heyo kolondeka yawe mkulu na niye niwe mdodo.”
Heyo yolawa uchanha ni mkulu kubanza wose. Heyo yolawa mwiisi ni wa mwiisi na kolonga mbuli za mwiisi, lakini heyo yolawa kuulanga ni mkulu wa gose.
Heyo kolonga mbuli ziyone na zija ziyahulike, lakini kuduhu munhu yotogola mbuli zake.
Lakini munhu yoyose yozitogola mbuli zake kosindila kamba Mulungu kolonga ukweli.
Heyo yatumigwe na Mulungu kolonga mbuli za Mulungu, kwavija Mulungu kamgwaa ng'hani Loho wake Yang'alile.
Tata kamnogela Mwanage na keka kila kinhu mmakono gake.
Munhu yoyose yomtogola Mwana kana ugima wa mazuwa gose, na munhu yoyose yomulema Mwana kaduhu ugima, lakini kosigala mwiinhaguso ya Mulungu.
Mafalisayo wahulika kamba Yesu kakala kopata na kobatiza wanahina wengi kubanza Yohana,
lakini ukweli Yesu hambatize munhu yoyose ila wanahina zake wao wabatize.
Yesu viyahulike avo, kasegela mwiisi ya Yudea na kubwela mwiisi ya Galilaya.
Mmwanza wake kalondeka yabitile Samalia.
Kavika mwiisi ya Samalia kudibuga da Sikali, behi na mgunda wa Yakobo uyamgwelele mwanage yakemigwe Yusufu.
Hanhu aho kukala na sima da Yakobo. Yesu viyadonhile na mwanza mtali, kakala aho kudisima. Ikala imisi.
Mtwanzi wa kisamalia keza kudeha mazi. Yesu kamulongela, “Nigwelele mazi ning'we.”
Kipindi acho wanahina zake wakala wacholile kudibuga kugula chakuja.
Mtwanzi ayo kamwidika, “Gweye kwa Muyahudi na niye na Msamalia. Kodahaze kumhula mazi ga kung'wa?” Kwavija Wayahudi hawajaga hamoja na Wasamalia.
Yesu kamwidika, “Maza ujuwile choolava Mulungu, na maza ujuwile nani yokupula mazi ga kung'wa, wahampulile, nayo yahakugwelele mazi gogala ugima.”
Mtwanzi ayo kamulongela, “Go mkulu, gweye kuduhu doo, na sima dino dingila ng'hani. Wahagapatile kwahi mazi gago gogala ugima?
Vino gweye kwa mkulu kubanza tata yetu Yakobo yatugwelele sima dino? Heyo mwenyego hamoja na wanage na fugo yake yose wang'wa mazi ga mdisima dino!”
Yesu kamwidika, “Wanhu wose wong'wa mazi gano wokona ng'hilu kabili,
lakini munhu yoyose yong'wa mazi gonda nimgwelele, honda yaone ng'hilu kabili. Mazi gonda nimgwelele niye gokuwa nzasa ya mazi gogala ugima wa mazuwa gose mgati mmwake.”
Mtwanzi ayo kalonga, “Go mkulu, nigwee mazi gago muladi sekeniwe na ng'hilu kabili, na ndeke kwiza hano kudeha mazi.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Genda kamkeme mkasano wako, na wize nayo.”
Mtwanzi ayo kamwidika, “Naduhu mkasano.” Yesu kamulongela, “Kulonga goya kuduhu mkasano.
Kusoligwa na wakasano watano, na mbigalo yuukala nayo sambi siyo mkasano wako. Kunongela goya.”
Mtwanzi ayo kalonga, “Go mkulu, vinikona gweye kwa mtula ndagu.
Wahenga zetu wamtambikila Mulungu kuna ulugongo luno, lakini mweye Wayahudi molonga Yelusalemu aho hanhu holondeka tumtambikile Mulungu.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Mama, togola gano gonikulongela, kipindi chokwiza baho wanhu honda wamtambikile Tata kuna ulugongo luno hebu ako Yelusalemu.
Mweye Wasamalia hamumjuwile goya ayo imumtambikila, lakini tweye Wayahudi tumjuwa itumtambikila, kwavija ukombozi wolawa kwa Wayahudi.
Lakini kipindi chokwiza na sambi chabahano, aho awo wotambikaga kweli, womtambikila Tata kwa loho na kweli, kwavija Tata kolonda wanhu womtambikila kamba vivo.
Mulungu ni Loho, avo wanhu womtambikila wolondeka wamtambikile kwa loho na kweli.”
Mtwanzi ayo kamulongela Yesu, “Nojuwa Mkombola kokwiza, yokemigwa Kilisito, yaheza kotulongela mbuli zose.”
Yesu kamwidika, “Iyo nene, inilonga na gweye.”
Kipindi acho wanahina zake Yesu wabwela, wakanganya ng'hani viwamvikile Yesu kolonga na mtwanzi ayo. Lakini kuduhu imoja wao yamuuzile mtwanzi ayo, “Kolonda choni?” hebu yamuuze Yesu, “Habali kolonga na mtwanzi ino?”
Abaho mtwanzi ayo kaleka nongo yake ya mazi, kabweleganya kudibuga na kuwalongela wanhu,
“Izoni mumulole munhu yanongele gaja gose ganhendile. Vino hadaha kuwa Kilisito Mkombola?”
Avo wanhu wasegela kudibuga na kumgendela Yesu.
Mna ikipindi kikija wanahina zake wamnanahiza Yesu, “Mfundiza, chonde, diya tanhu!”
Lakini Yesu kawedika, “Ninao lujo mweye hamulujuwile.”
Avo wanahina wasonga kuiuza, “Vino hana munhu kamgalila chakuja?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Ujaji wangu, ni kutenda goyolonda ija yanhumile na kuimambukiza sang'hano iyanigwelele.
Mweye mulongaga vino, ‘Ing'hali miezi mine tosonga kusenga.’ Lakini nowalongeleni, inuleni meso genu mulole mmigunda! Vihandigwe vikangala volondeka visengigwe!
Msengaji kolipigwa, na kwika hamoja indiya kwa ugima wa mazuwa gose. Avo muhandaji na msengaji wose wadeng'helele hamoja.
Ulonzi uno wa kweli, ‘Imoja kohanda iyagwe kosenga.’
Niwatuma mkasenge mumgunda kinhu kija hamkisang'hanile, wanhu wayagwe awo wasang'hane, na mweye momweda kwa sang'hano yao.”
Wasamalia wengi wa buga dija wamtogola Yesu kwa gaja gayalongile mtwanzi ayo, “Kanongela gose ganhendile.”
Avo Wasamalia viwamcholele Yesu, wampula yakale nao. Yesu kakala nao siku mbili.
Wanhu wengi watogola mbuli ya usenga wa Yesu.
Wamulongela mtwanzi ayo, “Sambi totogola, siyo mbuli ya gaja gaulongile gaiyeka, lakini tweye wenyego tumuhulika, na tojuwa heyo ayo Mkombola wa wanhu wa mwiisi yose.”
Vizibitile siku mbili, Yesu kachola isi ya Galilaya.
Kwavija Yesu mwenyego kalonga, “Mtula ndagu hapata nhogolwa mwiisi yake.”
Viyavikile mwiisi ya Galilaya, wanhu wengi wambokela, kwavija wakala wacholile mna ulujo lwa Pasaka mwiisi ya Yelusalemu na wachona kila kinhu kiyatendile kipindi cha Pasaka.
Yesu kachola kabili kudibuga da Kana mwiisi ya Galilaya, aho hayagaluse mazi kuwa divai. Aho kukala na mkulu imoja yakalile na mbwanga wake mtamu kudibuga da Kapelinaumu.
Mkulu ayo viyahulike kamba Yesu keza kulawa mwiisi ya Yudea kwiza mwiisi ya Galilaya, kamcholela Yesu, kampula yachole kudibuga da Kapelinaumu yakamuhonye mbwanga wake, yakalile kolonda kufa.
Yesu kamulongela, “Kuduhu munhu yoyose hagati yenu yotogola mbaka yaone unzonza na vilaguso.”
Mkulu ayo kamulongela, “Go mkulu, tuchole wose mwanangu yang'hali hanakufa.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Genda, mwanago kohona!” Munhu ayo katogola mbuli za Yesu, kachola.
Mnzila ya kuchola ukayake kawating'hana wasang'hanaji zake wamulongela, “Mbwanga wako kahona!”
Kawauza mna ikipindi gani mwanage viyahonile, wamwidika, “Ikala jana saa saba imisi vivo homa viimulekile.”
Bahaja tata ayo kakumbuka ikala kipindi acho Yesu viyamulongele, “Mwanago kohona.” Avo heyo na wanhu wa mng'anda yake wamtogola Yesu.
Uno ukala unzonza wakabili yautendile Yesu viyalawile isi ya Yudea kwiza isi ya Galilaya.
Vigabitile gano, Yesu kachola kudibuga da Yelusalemu kuna inyimwili nyimwili ya Wayahudi.
Ako Yelusalemu behi na mulango ukemigwe Mulango wa Ng'hondolo kukala na kolombo dikemigwe kwa Kiebulania Betisaza. Mumgwazo wa kolombo dijo kukala na vihelengo vitano.
Lunhu mkulu lwa wanhu wolumwa lukala lutambalala mvihelengo vivo, wanhu wasuwameso, mbetembete na wanhu waholole. Wakala wobetela mazi gatibuligwe,
kwavija kuna kipindi msenga wa kuulanga kezaga na kugatibula gaja gamazi geli kudikolombo, na mtamu yoyose yahalongola kwingila mazi gahamala kutibuligwa, kohona utamu wowose uyali nao.
Aho kukala na munhu imoja mtamu kwa miyaka malongo madatu na nane.
Yesu viyamone katambalala aho, kajuwa kamba munhu ayo kana utamu wa siku nyingi, avo Yesu kamuuza, “Kolonda kuhona?”
Mtamu ayo kamwidika, “Go mkulu. Kuduhu munhu wa kuningiza kudikolombo mazi gahatibuligwa. Kila vinigeza kwingila, munhu iyagwe konilongolela.”
Abaho Yesu kamulongela, “Winuke, papa mkeka wako, utembele.”
Bahaja munhu ayo kahona, kapapa mkeka wake, kasonga kutembela. Mbuli ino ilawilila mwiisiku ya Kubwihila,
avo wakulu wa Wayahudi wamulongela munhu ija yahonyigwe, “Lelo ni siku ya Kubwihila, Malagizo getu gogomesa gweye sekeupape mkeka wako.”
Munhu ayo yahonyigwe kawedika, “Munhu heyo yanihonyile kanilongela nipape mkeka wangu nigende.”
Wamuuza, “Munhu gani heyo yakulongele utende vivo?”
Lakini munhu ayo yahonyigwe kakala hamjuwile Yesu viyali, kwavija hanhu aho kukala na lunhu, na Yesu kakala yasegele.
Abaho, Yesu kamvika munhu ayo yamuhonyile Mwiig'anda ya Mulungu. Kamulongela, “Tegeleza, gweye sambi kuhona. Sekeutende nzambi kabili, muladi sekegakupate gehile kubanza gano.”
Abaho munhu ayo kasegela, kachola kwa iwakulu wa Wayahudi, kawalongela, “Yesu ayo yanihonyile.”
Abaho Wayahudi wasonga kumwihila Yesu kwavija kamuhonya munhu siku ya Kubwihila.
Yesu kawedika, “Tatangu kosang'hana siku zose, na niye vivija nosang'hana.”
Ulonzi uno uwatenda wakulu wa Wayahudi wazahile nzila kwa nguvu zose wadahe kumkoma Yesu. Watenda avo siyo kwavija kabena lagizo da siku ya Kubwihila diiyeka, lakini vivija kamkema Mulungu Tatake, avo kaitenda kamba kaigala na Mulungu.
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongeleni ukweli, Mwana hatenda mbuli yoyose heyo mwenyego, kotenda gaja goyomona Tatake kotenda. Gaja goyotenda Tata, Mwana nayo kotenda.
Avo Tata komnogela Mwanage na komulagusila gaja gose goyotenda mwenyego. Komulagusila mbuli ng'hulu ng'hani kubanza zino, na mweye mose mokanganya.
Kamba vija Tata viyowazilibula wanhu wafile na kuwagwaa ugima, vivo ili kwa Mwana nayo kowagwaa ugima waja wose yawalondile.
Tata hamtagusa munhu yoyose. Kamgwelela Mwanage udahi wose wa kutagusa,
avo wanhu wose wamtegeleze Mwana, kamba vija viwomtegeleza Tata. Munhu yoyose yolema kumtegeleza Mwana kolema kumtegeleza Tata yamtumile.”
“Nowalongeleni ukweli, wanhu wose wozihulika mbuli zangu na kumtogola heyo yanhumile wanao ugima wa mazuwa gose. Awo honda watagusigwe bule, kwavija wamala kubita mkufa kwiza muugima.
Nowalongeleni ukweli, kipindi chokwiza tena kipindi kimala kwiza, baho waja wafile woihulika sauti ya Mwana wa Mulungu, na waja woihulika wokuwa wagima.
Kamba Tata mwenyego viyali chanduso cha ugima, vivo ili kwa Mwanage, kamtenda yawe chanduso cha ugima.
Kamgwelela Mwana udahi wa kutagusa, kwavija heyo ayo Mwana wa Munhu.
Sekemuikanganye mbuli ino, kipindi chokwiza baho waja wose wafile woihulika sauti yake
na wolawa mna gamapanga gao. Waja wose watendile ganogile wozilibuka na kupata ugima, na waja watendile gehile wozilibuka ili watagusigwe.”
“Niye mwenyego sitenda mbuli yoyose kwa udahi wangu, lakini notagusa kamba Mulungu viyonongela, avo notagusa goya, kwavija sitenda kija kinonda, lakini kija kiyolonda heyo yanhumile.”
“Nahalonga mbuli zangu mwenyego, ulonzi wangu wokuwa wa uvizi.
Lakini kabaho imoja yosindila mbuli ya niye, naniye nojuwa gaja goyolonga ga ukweli.
Mweye mutuma wasenga kwa Yohana, na mbuli ziyalongile mbuli yangu ni za ukweli.
Siulonda usindila wa munhu, lakini nonga vino ili mukomboligwe.
Yohana kakala kamba kiwenge kikwaka yangaduu, na mweye muudeng'helela mulenge wake kwa kipindi kidodo.
Lakini niye mwenyego ninao usindila mkulu kubanza wa Yohana, kija kinhenda acho kiyanigwelele Tatangu nikitende, gano gose golagusa kamba Tata ayo yanhumile.
Tata mwenyego yanhumile, vivija kosindila mbuli ya niye. Mweye hamunaihulika sauti yake hebu kuchona kihanga chake,
na mweye muilema mbuli yake kwavija hamumtogole ija iyamtumile.
Mogasoma Maandiko Gang'alile kwavija mogesa kulawa mumo moupata ugima wa mazuwa gose. Na kuno Maandiko gago gago gandika mbuli zangu!
Lakini hamulonda kwiza kumwangu mupate ugima.
“Sizahila nhogolwa kulawa kwa wanhu.
Lakini niye niwajuwa. Nojuwa mna imizoyo yenu hamumnogela Mulungu.
Niza kwa twaga da Tatangu, lakini hamunibokele, ila munhu iyagwe yaheza kwa twaga jake mwenyego, mombokela.
Munogelwa kubokela nhogolwa kulawa mweye kwa mweye, lakini hamulonda kupata nhogolwa kulawa kwa heyo yeli Mulungu yaiyeka, vino modahaze kunhogola niye?
Sekemugese nowalongeleza kwa Tatangu, lakini Musa, yumumtamanila ayo yonda yawalongeleze.
Kamba kweli mumtogola Musa, mwahanhogole na niye, kwavija Musa kandika mbuli zangu.
Kamba hamgatogole gaja gayandike Musa, modahaze kutogola gano gonilonga?”
Abaho, Yesu kaloka mwambu wa lamba da Galilaya, vivija dokemigwa Lamba da Tibelia.
Lunhu mkulu lumkweleleza, kwavija luwona unzonza wake wa kuhonya watamu.
Yesu kakwela mbaka uchanha kukigongo kakala hasi na wanahina zake.
Kipindi cha nyimwili nyimwili ya Wayahudi ikemigwe Pasaka kikala behi.
Yesu viyalolile kaluwona lunhu mkulu lomwizila, avo kamuuza Filipo, “Tukagule kwahi vinhu vingi vakuja muladi wanhu wano wose waje?”
Yesu kalonga vino kumgeza Filipo kwavija kakala yajuwile kinhu gani chonda yatende.
Filipo kamwidika, “Sente magana mabili hazidaha kugula magate kwa wanhu wose wano!”
Imoja wa wanahina zake Yesu yakemigwe Andeleya, ndugu yake Simoni Petulo, kalonga,
“Kabahano mbwanga kana magate matano ga ngano na somba wabili, lakini sikinhu chochose kwa lunhu lulihano.”
Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Walongeleni wanhu wakale hasi.” Kwavija hanhu aho hakala na mijani, wanhu wose wakala hasi. Kukala na wambigalo kamba elufu tano.
Yesu kasola gaja gamagate, kamgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu, kawagolela wanhu wose wakalile aho. Katenda vivo kwa waja iwasomba, kila munhu kapata viyalondile.
Viwamambukize kuja, Yesu kawalongela wanahina zake, “Dondoleni vihande visigale. Sekemuleke hata kimoja.”
Avo wanahina wadondola na kumemeza vigelo longo na vibili kulawa kuna gamagate matano gawadile wanhu.
Viwauwonile unzonza uno yautendile Yesu, wanhu walonga, “Kweli ino ayo mtula ndagu wa Mulungu yalondeke kwiza mwiisi!”
Yesu kajuwa kamba walonda kumgoga kwa nguvu na kumtenda mndewa wao, avo kabweleganya kuvigongo yaiyeka.
Viivikile ichungulo, wanahina wa Yesu wahumuluka kudilamba,
wakwela mwiingalawa, na kubwela umwambu wa lamba mwambu wa Kapelinaumu. Ikilo ivika lakini Yesu kakala yang'hali hanachola kumwao.
Beho kulu dibuma na kugatibula ga mazi.
Wanahina zake viwacholile utali wa kilometa tano mbaka sita, wamona Yesu kotembela uchanha mgamazi, kokwiza mwambu wao kuili ngalawa, wadumba ng'hani.
Yesu kawalongela, “Sekemudumbe. Iyo niye!”
Wanahina zake walonda kumsola Yesu mwiingalawa, bahaja wavika mwiisi kuwakalile wochola.
Imitondo iyagwe lunhu mkulu lukala lukalile mwambu uyagwe wa lamba wona aho hakala na ngalawa imoja iiyeka. Wao wajuwa kamba Yesu hacholile hamoja na wanahina zake, lakini wasegela waiyeka.
Ngalawa ziyagwe zilawile Tibelia zivika mbaka behi na hanhu hawadile magate Mndewa viyamambukize kumgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu.
Wanhu viwajuwile Yesu kahaduhu hanhu aho, hebu wanahina zake, wakwela mzingalawa na kuchola Kapelinaumu, kumzahila.
Wanhu viwamvikile Yesu umwambu uyagwe wa lamba, wamuuza, “Mfundiza, vino hano kwiza lini?”
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongeleni ukweli, monizahila niye kwavija muja magate mwiguta, siyo kwavija mona unzonza wangu.
Sekemulusang'hanile lujo lunangika, lakini mulusang'hanile lujo lugala ugima wa mazuwa gose. Uno awo lujo londa yawagwee Mwana wa Munhu, kwavija Mulungu Tata kamsagula.”
Avo wamuuza, “Vino kinhu gani tutende tudahe kugatenda goyolonda Mulungu?”
Yesu kawedika, “Kinhu choolonda Mulungu mweye mutende, mumtogole ija yamtumile.”
Wamwidika, “Vino unzonza gani wonda utende ili tuwone na kukutogola? Choni chonda utende?
Wahenga zetu waja lujo lukemigwa Mana kuluwala, kamba Maandiko Gang'alile vigalonga, ‘Kawagwelela lujo luhumuluke kuulanga.’ ”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongeleni ukweli, siyo Musa yawagwelele lujo lwa kuulanga, lakini Tatangu ayo yowagwaa lujo lwa ukweli kulawa kuulanga.
Lujo loowagwaa Mulungu ayo heyo yezile hasi kulawa kuulanga na kowagwaa ugima wanhu wa mwiisi.”
Wamulongela, “Go mkulu, tugwee lujo lulo siku zose.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Niye ayo lujo lugala ugima. Wose wonda weze kumwangu honda wone nzala, na waja wose wonhogola honda wone ng'hilu.
Niwalongeleni kamba munyona lakini hamtogola.
Wose iwonigwelela Tatangu wokwiza kumwangu. Na niye simwasa kunze munhu yoyose yokwiza kumwangu,
kwavija sizile hasi kulawa kuulanga kutenda gaja gonilonda lakini goyolonda Tata yanhumile.
Gano gago goyolonda ija yanhumile sekenimwagize hata imoja mna iwaja wose yangwelele, lakini nolondeka niwazilibule wose na kuwagwaa ugima siku ya kimambukizo.
Kwavija kiyolonda Tatangu acho kino, kila munhu yomulola Mwana na kumtogola heyo yawe na ugima wa mazuwa gose. Na niye nomzilibula munhu ayo mna isiku ya uhelelo.”
Avo, Wayahudi wasonga kumnung'unikila Yesu kwavija kalonga, “Niye ayo lujo luhumuluke kuulanga.”
Avo walonga, “Vino ino siyo Yesu mwanage Yusufu? Tumjuwa tatake na mamake. Yokuwaze kabili kolonga kahumuluka kuulanga?”
Yesu kawedika, “Lekeni kuinung'unikila.
Kuduhu munhu yodaha kwiza kumwangu bila kugaligwa na Tata yanhumile, na niye nomzilibula munhu ayo mna isiku ya uhelelo.
Watula ndagu wa Mulungu wandika, ‘Kila munhu kofundizigwa na Mulungu.’ Munhu yoyose yomtegeleza Tata na kuifunza kumwake kokwiza kumwangu.
Kuduhu munhu yoyose yamonile Tata, heyo yalawile kwa Mulungu ayo heyo yaiyeka yamonile Tata.
Nowalongeleni ukweli, heyo yotogola kanao ugima wa mazuwa gose.
Niye ayo lujo lugala ugima.
Wahenga zenu waja lujo Mana kuluwala, lakini wafa.
Lakini munhu yoyose yoluja lujo luhumuluke kuulanga honda yafe bule.
Niye ayo lujo lugala ugima luhumuluke kuulanga. Munhu yoyose yoja lujo luno, kokuwa mgima siku zose. Lujo londa nimgwee munhu ayo ni lukuli lwangu, awo uniwagwelela wanhu wa mwiisi ili wawe wagima.”
Mbuli ino iwatenda Wayahudi waibamilile. Waiuza, “Vino munhu ino kodahaze kutugwaa lukuli lwake tuluje?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongeleni ukweli, kamba hamuluja lukuli lwa Mwana wa Munhu na kuing'wa damu yake, honda muwe na ugima mgati mmwenu.
Munhu yoluja lukuli lwangu na kuing'wa damu yangu kanao ugima wa mazuwa gose, na niye nomzilibula mna isiku ya uhelelo.
Kwavija lukuli lwangu ulo lujo lwa kweli, na damu yangu acho king'waji cha kweli.
Wanhu woluja lukuli lwangu na kuing'wa damu yangu wokala mgati mmwangu, na niye nokala mgati mmwao.
Tata yeli mgima yanhumile, na kwa mbuli yake niye na vivija mgima. Vivo vonda iwe munhu yoyose yoluja lukuli lwangu kokuwa mgima mbuli ya niye.
Uno awo lujo luhumuluke kuulanga, haluigalile na lujo luja luwadile wahenga zenu, abaho wafa. Lakini yoyose yoluja lujo luno kokuwa mgima siku zose.”
Yesu kalonga mbuli zino viyakalile kofundiza mna ing'anda ya kumpula Mulungu ako Kapelinaumu.
Wanhu zake wengi wamkweleleze waihulika mbuli ino na kulonga, “Mafundizo gano madala ng'hani. Nani yodaha kugatogola?”
Bila kulongeligwa, Yesu kajuwa kamba wanhu zake wamkweleleze wakala woinung'unikila mbuli ino, avo kawalongela, “Vino mbuli ino yolonda kuwatenda mulemelwe?
Vino yokuwaze, mwahamona Mwana wa Munhu kobwela uchanha kuja kuyakalile ichanduso?
Loho wa Mulungu ayo yomgwaa munhu ugima, nguvu za munhu hazidaha kinhu chochose. Mbuli ziniwalongeleni ni za Loho wa Mulungu na zogala ugima.
Lakini wayagwe wenu hawatogola.” Yesu kawajuwa toka mwaka waja hawamtogola na kamjuwa ija yonda yamuhinduke.
Abaho kalonga, “Lekaavo niwalongeleni kuduhu munhu yodaha kwiza kumwangu bila Tata kutenda idahike kwa munhu ayo kutenda vivo.”
Kwa ulonzi uno, wanhu wengi wamkweleleze wabweleganya kukisogo na hawadahile kabili kuchola nayo.
Avo Yesu kawauza wanahina zake longo na wabili, “Na mweye vivija molonda kusegela?”
Simoni Petulo kamwidika, “Mndewa, tweye tuchole kwa nani? Gweye kunazo mbuli zigala ugima wa mazuwa gose.
Sambi tweye totogola na tojuwa kamba gweye ayo Yang'alile ija yalawile kwa Mulungu.”
Yesu kedika, “Vino siwasagule mweye longo na wabili? Lakini imoja wenu Mwenembago!”
Yesu kakala yolonga mbuli ya Yuda, mwanage Simoni Isikaliote. Yuda kakala imoja wa wanahina longo na wabili, ayo yonda yamuhinduke Yesu.
Vigabitile gano, Yesu kachola mwiisi ya Galilaya, halondile kuchola isi ya Yudea kwavija wakulu wa Wayahudi wakala wolonda kumkoma.
Siku ya nyimwili nyimwili ya Wayahudi ya viheha ikala behi,
avo ndugu zake Yesu wamulongela, “Segela hanhu hano uchole isi ya Yudea, muladi wanhu zako wokukweleleza wazone mbuli ziutenda.
Kuduhu munhu yofisa kija kiyotenda kamba yahalonda wanhu wamjuwe goya. Kwavija gweye kotenda mbuli zino, leka wanhu wose wamwiisi wakujuwe.”
Yesu hatogoligwe hata na ndugu zake.
Yesu kawalongela, “Kipindi changu niye hakinavika. Lakini kipindi chochose kinoga kumwenu.
Wanhu wa mwiisi hawawehila mweye, lakini wonihila niye, kwavija siku zose nowalongela gaja goyotenda ganyolodoka.
Mweye choleni kuna inyimwili nyimwili. Niye sichola bule, kwavija kipindi changu hakinavika.”
Yesu kalonga vino, abaho kagendelela kukala mwiisi ya Galilaya.
Ndugu zake Yesu viwacholile kuna inyimwili nyimwili, Yesu nayo kachola. Hacholile kunze kunze lakini kachola kinyelegezi.
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wakala womzahila Yesu hana inyimwili nyimwili. Walonga, “Munhu ija ka kwahi?”
Hakala na minong'ono hana ulunhu mbuli ya Yesu. Wanhu wayagwe walonga, “Kanoga,” lakini wayagwe walonga, “Bule, kokwagiza wanhu.”
Lakini kuduhu munhu yokala yolonga mbuli ya Yesu chaka chaka, kwavija wakala wowadumba wakulu wa Wayahudi.
Nyimwili nyimwili viikalile hagatigati, Yesu kengila Mng'anda ya Mulungu kasonga kufundiza.
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wakanganya ng'hani na kulonga, “Yokuwaze munhu ino kojuwa vinhu vingi na kuno haifunzile kokose?”
Yesu kawedika, “Mafundizo gano gonifundiza siyo gangu, lakini golawa kwa Mulungu yanhumile.
Munhu yoyose yolonda kutenda goyolonda Mulungu kojuwa gano gonifundiza golawa kwa Mulungu hebu nolonga gaja gonilonda.
Munhu ija yolonga mbuli zake kozahila nhogolwa yake mwenyego. Lakini heyo yozahila nhogolwa kumwake ija yamtumile munhu ayo mkweli, mduhu uvizi mumulomo mmwake.
Vino Musa hawagwelele Malagizo? Lakini kuduhu hata munhu imoja yogagoga. Vino habali molonda kung'homa?”
Lunhu lwa wanhu lumwidika, “Gweye kuna kinyamkela. Nani yolonda kukukoma?”
Yesu kawedika, “Nhenda unzonza umoja, mweye mose mukanganya.
Musa kawalagiza muwengize kumbi wanenu hamoja siyo Musa lakini wahenga zenu awo wasongile, na mweye momwingiza kumbi mwana mna isiku ya Kubwihila.
Kamba mwana kokwingizigwa kumbi mna isiku ya Kubwihila muladi sekemubene Malagizo ga Musa, habali monigevuzikila kwavija nimuhonya munhu mna isiku ya Kubwihila?
Lekeni kutagusa kwa meso, lakini mutaguse kwa ukweli.”
Wanhu wayagwe wa Yelusalemu walonga, “Vino ino siyo munhu ija iwakulu wolonda kumkoma?
Loleni! Kolonga kunze kunze na hawamulongela mbuli yoyose! Vino iwakulu wamjuwa ayo Kilisito Mkombola?
Lakini Kilisito Mkombola yaheza, kuduhu munhu yonda yajuwe kolawa kwahi, lakini tweye tukujuwa koolawa munhu ino.”
Yesu viyakalile kofundiza Mng'anda ya Mulungu, kalonga kwa sauti ng'hulu, “Vino mweye munjuwa goya niye na mukujuwa kuja kundawa? Sizile kwa udahi wangu mwenyego, heyo yanhumile, ni mkweli. Mweye hamumjuwile,
lakini niye nimjuwa, kwavija nolawa kumwake, nayo kanhuma.”
Abaho walonda kumgoga, lakini kuduhu hata munhu imoja yamgolosele mkono, kwavija saa yake ikala hainavika.
Lakini wanhu wengi hana ulunhu wamtogola na kulonga, “Vino Kilisito Mkombola yaheza, kotenda unzonza mkulu kubanza yautendile munhu ino?”
Mafalisayo waluhulika lunhu lonyong'onya mbuli ya Yesu, avo wao na iwakulu wa walava nhosa wawatuma wakalizi wamgoge.
Yesu kalonga, “Nokala na mweye kipindi kidodo, na abaho nochola kumwake ija yanhumile.
Monizahila, lakini honda munyone, kwavija hamudaha kwiza hanhu hanili.”
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wailongela, “Vino munhu ino kochola kwahi mbaka seketumone? Vino kochola kunagamabuga ga Wagiliki kuko kookala wanhu zetu na kuwafundiza Wagiliki?
Vino kofambula choni viyolonga, tomzahila lakini honda tumone, na hatudaha kuchola kuko konda yawe?”
Mna isiku ya uhelelo na siku ng'hulu ya inyimwili nyimwili, Yesu kema kakemelela, “Munhu yoyose yokona ng'hilu yeze kumwangu yang'we.
Kamba Maandiko Gang'alile vigalonga, ‘Munhu yonhogola niye, vizanda va mazi gogala ugima vokilima muumoyo wake.’ ”
Yesu kalonga vino mbuli ya Loho Yang'alile, ija wanhu wose womtogola wombokela. Kipindi acho Loho Yang'alile kakala yang'hali hanakwiza, kwavija Yesu kakala hanakwinuligwa muukulu.
Wanhu wayagwe mna ulunhu wamuhulika viyalongile avo na walonga, “Kweli munhu ino mtula ndagu wa Mulungu!”
Wanhu wayagwe walonga, “Heyo ayo Kilisito Mkombola!” Lakini wayagwe walonga, “Kilisito Mkombola hadaha kulawa mwiisi ya Galilaya!
Maandiko Gang'alile golonga kamba Kilisito Mkombola kolawa mulukolo lwa Daudi na kovumbukila Beselehemu kudibuga diyakalile Daudi.”
Avo lunhu luigola mbuli ya Yesu.
Wanhu wayagwe walonda kumgoga Yesu, lakini kuduhu hata munhu imoja yamgolosele mkono.
Wakalizi viwabwelile, wakulu wa walava nhosa na Mafalisayo wawauza, “Habali hamumgalile?”
Wakalizi wawedika, “Kuduhu munhu yolonga kamba munhu ayo!”
Mafalisayo wawauza, “Vino na mweye vivija muviziligwa?”
“Mumjuwa mkulu yoyose hebu Mfalisayo yomtogola?
Lunhu luno halugajuwile Malagizo ga Musa, avo waduiligwa na Mulungu!”
Nikodemo kakala imoja wa Mafalisayo wakalile aho, ayo yacholile kumulola Yesu ichanduso. Kawalongela wayage,
“Vino Malagizo getu godaha kumtagusa munhu yoyose bila tanhu kumuhulika na kukijuwa kija kiyatendile?”
Wamwidika, “Vino na gweye vivija kolawa mwiisi ya Galilaya? Gasome Maandiko Gang'alile na koifunza, kuduhu mtula ndagu wa Mulungu yalawile mwiisi ya Galilaya.”
Abaho kila munhu kachola ukayake.
Yesu kachola kuna Ulugongo lwa Mizeituni.
Imitootondo ng'hani Yesu kabwela kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu. Wanhu wose wamzunguluka, nayo kakala hasi kasonga kuwafundiza.
Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wamgala mtwanzi yagogigwe ugoni, wamwika haulongozi wa wanhu wose.
Wamulongela Yesu, “Mfundiza, mtwanzi ino kagogigwa ugoni.
Muna ga Malagizo getu Musa katulagiza kamba mtwanzi kamba ino yatoigwe mabwe mbaka yafe. Lelo gweye kolongaze?”
Walonga vino ili wamgoge Yesu kwa mbuli zake, muladi wapate kumtagusa. Lakini Yesu kainama kandika hasi kwa kidole chake.
Viwagendelele kwima aho kuno womuuza, Yesu kenuka kawalongela, “Munhu yoyose hatendile nzambi yasonge kumpigisila dibwe.”
Abaho Yesu kainama kabili kandika hasi.
Viwahulike avo, wose wasegela imoja imoja, wasonga iwavele. Yesu kalekigwa yaiyeka, na mtwanzi ija yang'hali yemile aho.
Yesu kenuka na kumulongela mtwanzi ija, “Wa kwahi wanhu waja? Kuduhu munhu yoyose yakutaguse?”
Mtwanzi ija kalonga, “Go mkulu, kahaduhu.” Yesu kalonga, “Vinoga. Na niye vivija sikutagusa. Genda lakini sekeutende nzambi kabili.”
Yesu kawalongela Mafalisayo kabili, “Niye ayo mulenge wa isi. Munhu yoyose yonikweleleza kokuwa na mulenge wa ugima na honda yagende mdiziza bule.”
Mafalisayo wamulongela, “Gweye koisindila mwenyego, avo gago goulonga hagatogoligwa kamba kweli.”
Yesu kawedika, “Aka, hata kamba nahaisindila mwenyego, gaja gonilonga ga ukweli kwavija nikujuwa kundawile na kuja kunichola. Mweye hamukujuwile kuja kundawile hebu kuja kunichola.
Mweye motagusa kwa nzila zoyotagusa wanhu, niye simtagusa munhu yoyose.
Lakini hata nahatagusa, notagusa goya kwavija sili niiyeka bule, nahamoja na Tata yanhumile.
Yandikigwa mna ga Malagizo genu kamba usindila wa wanhu wabili wahailumba, gaja gowolonga ga ukweli.
Niye noisindila mwenyego, na Tata yanhumile vivija konisindila.”
Wamuuza, “Tatako kakwahi?” Yesu kawedika, “Hamnijuwile niye hebu Tatangu. Maza munijuwile niye, vivija mwahamjuwile Tatangu.”
Yesu kalonga gano gose viyakalile kofundiza Mng'anda ya Mulungu, mdigati hakikigwe kiya cha kulavila sadaka. Kuduhu munhu yamgogile, kwavija saa yake ikala hainavika.
Yesu kawalongela kabili, “Niye nosegela, mweye monizahila, lakini mofa na nzambi zenu. Hamudaha kuchola kuja kunyhola.”
Avo wakulu wa Wayahudi wauza, “Kolonga hatudaha kuchola hanhu kuyochola. Vino kolonda kuikoma mwenyego?”
Yesu kawedika, “Mweye mwa wanhu wa mwiisi ino, lakini niye nolawa kuulanga. Mweye molawa mumuno mwiisi, lakini niye silawa mwiisi bule.
Lekaavo niwalongeleni mofa na nzambi zenu. Mofa na nzambi zenu kamba hamulonda kutogola kamba ‘Niye ayo Heyo.’ ”
Wamuuza, “Gweye kwa nani?” Yesu kawedika, “Niwalongeleni haichanduso.
Ninazo mbuli nyingi za kulonga kumwenu, nyingi za kuwatagusa. Hata ivo ija yanhumile ni mkweli, na niye nowalongela wanhu wa mwiisi kija kimhulike kumwake.”
Wakala hawajuwile kamba Yesu kakala kolonga mbuli ya Tata.
Avo kawalongela, “Mwahamwinula uchanha Mwana wa Munhu, mojuwa kamba, ‘Niye ayo Heyo,’ abaho mojuwa kamba sitenda mbuli yoyose kwa udahi wangu, lakini nolonga kija kiyanilagize Tata nonge.
Na heyo yanhumile kahamoja na nene, handekile niiyeka bule kwavija siku zose notenda kija kimnogele.”
Wanhu wengi wamuhulike Yesu yolonga mbuli zino wamtogola.
Avo Yesu kawalongela Wayahudi waja wamtogole, “Kamba mwahatogola mafundizo gangu, mwa wanahina zangu kweli.
Avo moijuwa kweli, na kweli yowatenda mulekesigwe.”
Wamwidika, “Tweye twa lukolo lwa Abulahamu na hatunakuwa watumwa wa munhu yoyose. Habali kotulongela ‘Tolekesigwa’?”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongeleni ukweli, munhu yoyose yotenda nzambi mtumwa wa nzambi.
Mtumwa hali munhu wa lukolo siku zose, lakini mwana ayo munhu wa lukolo siku zose.
Kamba Mwana yahawalekesa, na mweye molekesigwa kweli.
Nojuwa mwa lukolo lwa Abulahamu. Lakini molonda kunikoma, kwavija hamgatogola mafundizo gangu.
Nowalongela kija kiyanilagusile Tatangu, lakini mweye motenda kija kimulongeligwe na tata yenu.”
Wamwidika, “Tata yetu Abulahamu.” Yesu kawedika, “Maza mukalile wana wa Abulahamu, mwahatendile mbuli zizija ziyatendile heyo.
Niwalongela ukweli umhulike kwa Mulungu, lakini molonda kunikoma. Abulahamu hatendile kamba vivo!
Motenda kiyatendile tata yenu.” Wamwidika, “Mulungu yaiyeka ayo Tata itwilinayo hatuli wana wa kuvikila, tweye twa wanage too.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Maza Mulungu yakalile Tata yenu, mwahaninogele, kwavija niza kulawa kwa Mulungu na sambi nabahano. Sizile kwa udahi wangu mwenyego, lakini kanhuma.
Habali hamjuwa kinonga? Kwavija hamudaha kutegeleza usenga wangu.
Mweye mwa wana wa tataenu, Mwenembago, na mweye molonda kukweleleza kusulukila kwa tataenu. Kusongela mwaka kakala mkomaji na hemile muna ikweli, kwavija mduhu kweli mgati mmwake. Yahalonga uvizi, kolagusa viyali, kwavija heyo ni mvizi na tata wa uvizi.
Lakini nowalongeleni ukweli, lekaavo hamnitogola bule.
Nani imoja wenu yodaha kulagusa kamba nibananga? Kamba nolonga ukweli, habali hamunhogola?
Munhu wa Mulungu kotegeleza mbuli za Mulungu. Hata ivo, mweye hamuli wa Mulungu, lekaavo hamnitegeleza.”
Wayahudi wamuliga Yesu walonga, “Hatulongile goya kamba gweye kwa Msamalia na kuna kinyamkela?”
Yesu kawedika, “Nabule kinyamkela. Nomtegeleza Tatangu lakini mweye monibeza.
Sizahila nhogolwa yangu mwenyego. Lakini kabaho imoja yoizahila, heyo ayo yotagusa.
Nowalongeleni ukweli, munhu yoyose yotogola mafundizo gangu honda yafe bule.”
Avo, Wayahudi wamulongela, “Sambi tojuwa kamba gweye kuna kinyamkela! Abulahamu kafa, na watula ndagu wa Mulungu wafa, abaho gweye kolonga yoyose yotogola mafundizo gako honda yafe bule.
Vino gweye kwa mkulu kubanza tata yetu Abulahamu? Heyo kafa, na watula ndagu wa Mulungu vivija wafa. Kogesa gweye kwa nani?”
Yesu kawedika, “Nahaitogola mwenyego, nhogolwa ayo mduhu kinhu. Ija yonitogola niye ni Tatangu yumulonga Mulungu wenu.
Mweye hamumjuwile bule, lakini niye nimjuwa. Nahalonga simjuwile, nokuwa mvizi kamba mweye. Lakini nimjuwa, na nozigoga mbuli zake.
Tata yenu Abulahamu kadeng'helela viyachonile kipindi changu chakwiza, kachona na kadeng'helela.”
Wayahudi wamulongela Yesu, “Vino gweye hunapata hata miyaka malongo matano, kumonaze Abulahamu?”
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongeleni ukweli, Abulahamu yang'hali hana vumbuka, niye nabaha.”
Abaho wadondola mabwe wampigisile, lakini Yesu kaifisa kalawanya Mng'anda ya Mulungu.
Yesu viyakalile kogenda, kamona munhu yavumbuke msuwameso.
Wanahina zake wamuuza, “Mfundiza, nzambi gani imtendile munhu ino yavumbuke msuwameso? Vino heyo ayo yaitendile nzambi ayo hebu tatake na mamake?”
Yesu kawedika, “Ino hailawilile kwavija heyo katenda nzambi hebu tatake na mamake watenda nzambi. Lakini kavumbuka msuwameso muladi udahi wa Mulungu woneke kumwake.
Kwavija ing'hali imisi, tolondeka tusang'hane sang'hano ya ija yanhumile. Ikilo yovika, baho kuduhu munhu yodaha kusang'hana.
Kipindi ning'hali mwiisi, niye na mulenge wa isi yose.”
Viyamambukize kulonga vino, Yesu katema mate hasi, kabuluga nhope kwa mate gaja, abaho kambaka mgameso munhu ija msuwameso.
Yesu kamulongela, “Genda kasunhe kihanga chako hana dilamba da Siloamu.” Siloamu fambulo jake “Yatumigwe.” Avo munhu ija kachola, kasunha kihanga chake, kabwela yolola.
Wanhu weli mmabehi nayo, na wanhu wamonile aho umwaka yopula, ing'hali hainalawilila mbuli ino, wauza, “Vino ino siyo munhu ija yakalile na kupula?”
